analyzed: pramāṇavārtikam
prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ
vidhūta kalpanā jāla gambhīra udāra mūrtaye
namaḥ samanta bhadrāya samanta spharaṇa tviṣe
prāyas prākṛta saktiḥ apratibala prajñaḥ janaḥ kevalam
na anarthyā iva subhāṣitaiḥ parigataḥ vidveṣṭi apīrṣya amalaiḥ

original: tenāyaṃ na paropakāra iti naścintāpi cetaściram sūktābhyāsavivardhitavyasanamityatrānubaddhaspṛham // Pramāṇav_1.2 //
analyzed: tena ayam na para upakāraḥ iti naḥ cintā api cetaḥ ciram sūkta abhyāsa vivardhita vyasanam iti atra anubaddha spṛham
pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam artha kriyā sthitiḥ
avisaṃvādanam śābde pi abhiprāya nivedanāt
vaktṛ vyāapāra viṣayaḥ yaḥ rthaḥ buddhau prakāśate
prāmāṇyam tatra śabdasya nātha tattva nibandhanam
gṛhīta grahaṇāt na iṣṭam sāṃvṛtam dhī pramāṇa tā
pravṛtteḥ tad pradhāna tvāt heya upādeya vastuni
viṣaya ākāra bhedāt ca dhiyaḥ dhi gama bhedataḥ

original: bhāvādevāsya tadbhāve svarūpasya svato gatiḥ // Pramāṇav_1.6 //
analyzed: bhāvāt eva asya tad bhāve sva rūpasya svatas gatiḥ
prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa śāstram moha nirvatanam
ajñāta artha prakāśaḥ vā svarūpa adhigateḥ param
prāptam sāmānya vijñānam avijñāte sva lakṣaṇe
yat jñānam iti abhiprāyāt sva lakṣaṇa vicārataḥ
tadvat pramāṇam bhagavān abhūta vinivṛttaye

original: bhūtoktiḥ sādhanāpekṣā tato yuktā pramāṇatā // Pramāṇav_1.9 //
analyzed: bhūta uktiḥ sādhana apekṣā tatas yuktā pramāṇa tā
nityam pramāṇam na evā asti prāmāṇyāt vastu sat gateḥ
jñeya anitya tayā tasyāḥ adhrauvyāt krama janmanām
nityāt utpatti viśleṣāt apekṣāyāḥ ayogataḥ
kathañcid na uparka āya tvāt anitye pi apramāṇa tā
sthitvā apravṛttiḥ saṃsthāna viśeṣa artha kriyā ādiṣu
iṣṭa siddhiḥ asiddhiḥ vā dṛṣṭānte
siddham yādṛś adhiṣṭhātṛ bhāva abhāva anuvṛttimat
sanniveśa ādi tat yuktam tasmāt yat anumīyate
vastu bhede prasiddhasya śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ
na yukta anumitiḥ pāṇḍu dravyāt iva hutāśane
anyathā kumbhakāreṇa mṛd vikārasya kasyacid

original: ghaṭādeḥ karaṇāt sidhyed valmīkasyāpi tatkṛtiḥ // Pramāṇav_1.15 //
analyzed: ghaṭa ādeḥ karaṇāt sidhyet valmīkasya api tad kṛtiḥ
sādhyena anugamāt kārye sāmānyena api sādhane
sambandhi bhedāt bheda ukti doṣaḥ kāryasamaḥ mataḥ
jāti antare prasiddhasya śabda sāmānya darśanāt

original: na yuktaṃ sādhanaṃ gotvād vāgādīnāṃ viṣāṇavat // Pramāṇav_1.17 //
analyzed: na yuktam sādhanam go tvāt vāc ādīnām viṣāṇa vat
vivakṣā paratantra tvāt na śabdāḥ santi kutra vā

original: tadbhāvādarthasiddhau tu sarva sarvasya sidhyati // Pramāṇav_1.18 //
analyzed: tad bhāvāt artha siddhau tu sarvasya sidhyati
etena kāpila ādīnām acaitanya ādi cintitam
anitya ādeḥ ca caitanyam maraṇāt tvac apohataḥ
vastu svarūpe siddhe yam nyāyaḥ siddhe viśeṣaṇam
abādhakam asiddhau api ākāśa āśraya vat dhvaneḥ
asiddhau api śabdasya śiddhe vastuni sidhyati
aulūkyasya yathā bauddhena uktam mūrti ādi sādhanam
tasya eva vyabhicāra ādau śabde pi avyabhicāriṇa

original: doṣavat sādhanaṃ jñeyaṃ vastuno vastusiddhitaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.22 //
analyzed: doṣavat sādhanam jñeyam vastunaḥ vastu siddhitaḥ
yathā tat kāraṇam vastu tathā eva tat akāraṇam

original: yadā tatkāraṇaṃ kena mataṃ neṣṭamakāraṇam // Pramāṇav_1.23 //
analyzed: yadā tat kāraṇam kena matam na iṣṭam akāraṇam
śastra auṣadha abhisambandhāt caitrasya vraṇa rohaṇe

original: asambaddhasya kiṃ sthāṇoḥ kāraṇatvaṃ na kalpyate // Pramāṇav_1.24 //
analyzed: asambaddhasya kim sthāṇoḥ kāraṇa tvam na kalpyate
svabhāva bhedena vinā na yujyate
nityasya a vyatireki tvāt sāmarthya ca duranvayam
yeṣu satsu bhavati eva yat tebhyaḥ nyasya kalpane
tad hetu tvena sarvatra hetunām anavasthitiḥ
svabhāva pariṇāmena hetuḥ aṅkura janmani
bhūmi ādiḥ tasya saṃskāre tad viśeṣasya darśanāt
yathā viśeṣeṇa vinā viṣaya indriya saṃhatiḥ
buddheḥ hetuḥ tathā idam ced na tatra api viśeṣataḥ
pṛthak pṛthak aśaktānām svabhāva atiśaye sati
saṃhatau api asāmarthya syāt siddhaḥ atiśayaḥ tatas
tasmāt pṛthak aśakteṣu yeṣu sambhāvyate guṇaḥ
saṃhatau hetu tā teṣām na īśvara ādeḥ abhedataḥ
prāmāṇyam ca parokṣa artha jñānam yat sādhanasya ca
abhāvāt na asti anuṣṭhānam iti kecid pracakṣate
jñānavān mṛgyate kaścid tad ukta pratipattaye
ajña upadeśa karaṇe vipralambhana śaṅkibhiḥ
tasmāt anuṣṭheya gatam jñānam asya vicāryatām
kīṭa saṃkhyā parijñānam tasya naḥ kva upayujyate

original: yaḥ pramāṇamasāviṣṭo na tu savasya vedakaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.34 //
analyzed: yaḥ pramāṇam asau iṣṭaḥ na tu savasya vedakaḥ

original: dūraṃ paśyatu vā mā vā tattvamiṣṭaṃ tu paśyatu /
analyzed: dūram paśyatu vā mā vā tattvam iṣṭam tu paśyatu
pramāṇam dūradarśī ced eta gṛdhrān upāsmahe
sādhanam karuṇā abhyāsāt sā buddheḥ deha saṃśrayāt
bhyāsaḥ iti ced na āśraya pratiṣedhataḥ
prāṇa apāna indriya dhiyām dehāt eva na kevalāt
sajāti nirapekṣāṇām janma janma parigrahe
pratisandhāna śaktimat

original: kimāsīt tasya yannāsti paśyād yena na sandhimat // Pramāṇav_1.38 //
analyzed: kim āsīt tasya yat na asti paśyāt yena na sandhimat

original: na sa kaścit pṛthivyāderaṃśo yatra na jantavaḥ /
analyzed: na sa kaścid pṛthivī ādeḥ aṃśaḥ yatra na jantavaḥ

original: saṃsvedajādyā jāyante sarva bījātmakaṃ tataḥ // Pramāṇav_1.39 //
analyzed: saṃsveda ja ādyāḥ jāyante bīja ātmakam tatas
tat sajāti anapekṣāṇām akṣa ādīnām samudbhave
pariṇamaḥ yathā ekasya syāt sarvasya aviśeṣataḥ
pratyekam upaghāte na indriyāṇām manaḥ mateḥ
upaghātaḥ sti bhaṅge syāḥ teṣām bhaṅgaḥ ca dṛśyate
tasmāt sthiti āśrayaḥ buddheḥ buddhim eva samāśritaḥ
kaścid nimittam akṣāṇām tasmāt akṣāṇi buddhitaḥ
yādṛśī ākṣepikā sā āsīt paścāt api astu tādṛśī
tad jñānaiḥ upakārya tvāt uktam kāya āśritam manaḥ
yadi api akṣaiḥ vinā buddhiḥ na tāni api tayā vinā
tathā api anyaḥ nya hetu tvam tatas pi anyaḥ nyahetuke
na akramāt kramiṇaḥ bhāvaḥ na api apekṣya aviśeṣiṇaḥ

original: kramād bhavantī dhīḥ kāyāt kramaṃ tasyāpi śaṃsati // Pramāṇav_1.45 //
analyzed: kramāt bhavantī dhīḥ kāyāt kramam tasya api śaṃsati
pratikṣaṇam apūrvasya pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ kṣaṇaḥ bhavet

original: tasya heturato heturdṛṣṭa evāstu sarvadā // Pramāṇav_1.46 //
analyzed: tasya hetuḥ atas hetuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ evā astu sarvadā
citta antarasya sandhāne kaḥ virodhaḥ
tadvat api arhataḥ citta sandhānam kutas matam
asiddhārthaḥ pramāaṇena kim siddhāntaḥ nugamyate
hetoḥ vaikalyataḥ tat ced kim tat eva atra na uditam
tat dhī vat grahaṇa prāpteḥ manaḥ jñānam na sa indriyāt
jñāna utpādana sāmarthya bhedāt na sakalāt api
acetana tvāt na anyasmāt hetu abhedāt saha sthitiḥ
akṣa vat rūpa rasa vat artha dvāreṇa vikriyā
sattā upakāriṇī yasya nityam tad anubandhataḥ

original: sa hetuḥ saptamī tasmādutpādāditi cocyate // Pramāṇav_1.51 //
analyzed: sa hetuḥ saptamī tasmāt utpādāt iti ca ucyate
astu upakārakaḥ vā api kadācid citta santateḥ
vahnayā ādi vat ghaṭa ādinām vinivṛttiḥ na tāvatā
anivṛtti prasaṅśca dehe tiṣṭhati cetasaḥ

original: tadbhāvabhāvād vaśyatvāt prāṇāpānau tato na tat // Pramāṇav_1.53 //
analyzed: tad bhāva bhāvāt vaśya tvāt prāṇa apānau tatas na tat
preraṇa ākarṣaṇe vāyoḥ prayatnena vinā kutas
nirhrāsa aatiśaya āpattiḥ nirhrāsa atiśayāt tayoḥ

original: tulyaḥ prasaṅgo 'pi tayoḥ na tulyaṃ cittakāraṇe /
analyzed: tulyaḥ tayoḥ na tulyam citta kāraṇe
sthityā āvedhakam anyat ca yatas kāraṇam iṣyate
na doṣaiḥ viguṇaḥ dehaḥ hetuḥ vartī ādi vat yadi

original: mṛte śamīkṛte doṣe punarujjīvanaṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_1.56 //
analyzed: mṛte śamīkṛte doṣe punar ujjīvanam bhavet
nivṛtte pi anale kāṣṭha vikāra avinivṛtti vat
tasya anivṛttiḥ iti ced na cikitsā prayogataḥ
apunarbhāvataḥ kiñcad vikāra jananam kvacid
cit cit viparyayāt agniḥ yathā kāṣṭha suvarṇayoḥ
ādyasya alpaḥ pi asaṃhāryaḥ pratyāneyaḥ tu yat kṛtaḥ

original: vikāraḥ syāt punarbhāvaḥ tasya hemnikharatvavat // Pramāṇav_1.59 //
analyzed: vikāraḥ syāt punarbhāvaḥ tasya hema nikhara tva vat
durlabha tvāt samādhātuḥ asādhyam kiñcid īritam

original: āyuḥkṣayād vā doṣe tu kevale nāstyasādhyatā // Pramāṇav_1.60 //
analyzed: āyuḥ kṣayāt vā doṣe tu kevale nā asti asādhya tā
mṛte viṣa ādi saṃhārāt vā

original: vikārahetorvigame sa nocchavasiti sa nocchvasiti kiṃ punaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.61 //
analyzed: vikāra hetoḥ vigame sa na ucchavasiti sa na ucchvasiti kim punar
upādāna avikāreṇa na upādeyasya vikriyā

original: kartu śakyāvikāreṇa mṛdaḥ kuṇḍādike yathā // Pramāṇav_1.62 //
analyzed: kartu śakyā avikāreṇa mṛdaḥ kuṇḍa ādike yathā

original: avikṛtya hi yad vastu yaḥ padārtho vikāryate /
analyzed: a vikṛtya hi yat vastu yaḥ padārthaḥ vikāryate

original: upādānaṃ na tat tasya yuktaṃ gogavayādivat // Pramāṇav_1.63 //
analyzed: upādānam na tat tasya yuktam go gavaya ādi vat
cetaḥ śarīrayoḥ evam tad hetoḥ kārya janmanaḥ
sahakārāt saha sthānam agni tāmra drava tva vat
anāśrayāt sat asatoḥ na āśrayaḥ sthiti kāraṇam
sataḥ ced āśrayaḥ na asyāḥ sthātuḥ avyatirekataḥ
vyatireke tad hetuḥ tena bhāvasya kim kṛtam
sa nāśa hetoḥ mataḥ yadi
tulyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ tatra api kim punar sthiti hetunā

original: ā nāśakāgamāt sthānaṃ tataśced vastudharmatā // Pramāṇav_1.67 //
analyzed: ā na aśaka āgamāt sthānam tatas ced vastu dharma tā
nāśasya satyabādho sau iti ki sthiti hetunā

original: yathā jalāderādhāra iti cet tulyamatra ca // Pramāṇav_1.68 //
analyzed: yathā jala ādeḥ ādhāraḥ iti ced tulyam atra ca
prati kṣaṇa vināśe hi bhavānām bhāva santateḥ
tathā utpatteḥ sa hetu tvāt āśrayaḥ yuktam anyathā
syāt ādhāraḥ jala ādīnām gamana pratibandhataḥ
agatīnām kimādhāraiḥ guṇa sāmānya karmaṇām
etena samavāyaḥ ca samavāyi ca kāraṇam
vyavasthita tvam jāti ādeḥ nirastam anapāśrayāt
paratas bhāva anāśaḥ ced tasya kim sthiti hetunā
sa vinaśyet vinā api anyaiḥ aśaktāḥ sthiti hetavaḥ

original: sthitimān nāśrayaḥ sarvaḥ sarvotpattai ca sāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: sthitimān na āśrayaḥ sarvaḥ ca sa āśrayaḥ

original: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya na vināśaḥ kadācana // Pramāṇav_1.73 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya na vināśaḥ kadācana

original: svayaṃ vinaśvarātmā cet tasya kaḥ sthāpakaḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: svayam vinaśvara ātmā ced tasya kaḥ sthāpakaḥ paraḥ

original: svayaṃ na naśvarātmā cet tasya kaḥ sthāpakaḥ paraḥ // Pramāṇav_1.74 //
analyzed: svayam na naśvara ātmā ced tasya kaḥ sthāpakaḥ paraḥ
buddhi vyāpāra bhedena nirhrāsa atiśayau api
prajñā ādeḥ bhavataḥ deha nirhrāsa tiśayau vinā
idam dīpa prabhā ādīnām āśritānām na vidyate

original: syāt tato 'pi viśeṣo 'sya na citte 'nupakāriṇa // Pramāṇav_1.76 //
analyzed: syāt tatas pi viśeṣaḥ sya na citte
rāga ādi vṛddhiḥ puṣṭi ādeḥ kadācid sukha duḥkha jā
tayoḥ ca dhātu sāmya ādeḥ antar arthasya sannidheḥ
etena sannipāta ādeḥ smṛti bhraṃśa ādayaḥ gatāḥ
vikārayati dhīḥ eva hi antar artha viśeṣa jā
śārdū la śoṇita ādīnām santāna atiśaye kvacid
moha ādayaḥ sambhavanti śravaṇa īkṣaṇataḥ yathā
tasmāt svasya eva saṃskāram niyamena anuvartate
tat nāntarīyakam cittam atas citta samāśritam
yathā śruta ādi saṃskāraḥ kṛtaḥ cetasi cetasi

original: kālena vyajyate 'bhedāt syād dehe 'pi tato guṇaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.81 //
analyzed: kālena vyajyate bhedāt syāt dehe tatas guṇaḥ
an anya sattva neyasya hīna sthāna parigrahaḥ
ātma snehavataḥ duḥkha sukha tyāga āpti vāñchayā
duḥkhe viparyāsa matiḥ tṛṣṇā ca ābandha kāraṇam

original: janmino yasya te na sto na sa janmādhigacchati // Pramāṇav_1.83 //
analyzed: janminaḥ yasya te na staḥ na sa janma adhigacchati
gati āgatī na dṛṣṭe ced indriyāṇām apāṭavāt
adṛṣṭiḥ manda netrasya tanu dhūma āgatiḥ yathā
tanu tvāt mūrtam api tu kiñcid kvacid aśaktimat
jala vat sūta vat hemni na adṛṣṭena asat eva vā
pāṇi ādi kampe sarvasya kampa prāpteḥ virodhinaḥ

original: ekasmin karmaṇo 'yogāt syāt pṛthak siddhiranyathā // Pramāṇav_1.86 //
analyzed: ekasmin karmaṇaḥ yogāt syāt pṛthak siddhiḥ anyathā
ekasya ca āvṛtau sarvasya āvṛtiḥ syāt an āvṛtau

original: dṛśyeta rakte caikasmin rāgo 'raktasya vāgatiḥ // Pramāṇav_1.87 //
analyzed: dṛśyeta rakte ca ekasmin rāgaḥ raktasya vā āgatiḥ
na asti eka samudāyaḥ smāt aneka tve pi pūrvavat
aviśeṣāt aṇu tvāt ca na gatiḥ ced na sidhyati
aviśeṣaḥ viśiṣṭānām aindriya tvam atas naṇuḥ
etena āvaraṇa ādīnām abhāvaḥ ca nirākṛtaḥ
katham vā sūta hema ādi miśram tapta upala ādi vā
dṛśyam pṛthak aśaktānām akṣa ādīnām gatiḥ katham
saṃyogāt ced tra prasaṅgaḥ hema sūtayoḥ

original: dṛśyaḥ saṃyoga iti cet kuto 'dṛśyāśraye gatiḥ // Pramāṇav_1.91 //
analyzed: dṛśyaḥ saṃyogaḥ iti ced kutas dṛśya āśraye gatiḥ
rasa rūpa ādi yogaḥ ca saṃyogaḥ upacārataḥ

original: iṣṭaśced buddhibhedo 'stu paṃktirdirgheti vā katham // Pramāṇav_1.92 //
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ ced buddhi bhedaḥ stu paṃktiḥ dirghā iti vā katham
saṃkhyā saṃyoga karma ādeḥ api tadvat svarūpataḥ

original: abhilāpācca bhedena rūpaṃ buddhau na bhāsate // Pramāṇav_1.93 //
analyzed: abhilāpāt ca bhedena rūpam buddhau na bhāsate
śabda jñāne vikalpena vastu bheda anusāriṇā

original: guṇādiṣviva kalpyārthe naṣṭājāteṣu vā yathā // Pramāṇav_1.94 //
analyzed: guṇa ādiṣu iva kalpya arthe naṣṭa ajāteṣu vā yathā
mataḥ saḥ iṣṭaḥ yad nibandhanaḥ

original: sa eva sarvabhāveṣu hetuḥ ki neṣyate tayoḥ // Pramāṇav_1.95 //
analyzed: saḥ eva sarva bhāveṣu hetuḥ ki nā iṣyate tayoḥ
upacāraḥ na sarvatra yadi bhinna viśeṣaṇam

original: mukhyamityeva ca kuto 'bhinne bhinnārthateti cet // Pramāṇav_1.96 //
analyzed: mukhyam iti eva ca kutas bhinne bhinna artha tā iti ced
anartha antara hetu tve pi aparyāyaḥ sita ādiṣu
saṃkhyā ādi yoginaḥ śabdāḥ tatra api artha antaram yadi
guṇa dravya aviśeṣaḥ syāt bhinnaḥ vyāvṛtti bhedataḥ
syāt anartha antara artha tve pi akarma adravya śabda vat
vyatireki iva yat ca api sūcyate bhāva vācibhiḥ
saṃkhyā ādi tadvataḥ śabdaiḥ tad dharma antara bhedakam
śrutiḥ tanmātra jijñāsoḥ an ākṣiptā akhilā aparā

original: bhinnaṃ dharmamivācaṣṭe yogo 'ṅgulyā iti kvacit // Pramāṇav_1.100 //
analyzed: bhinnam dharmam iva ācaṣṭe yogaḥ ṅgulyāḥ iti kvacid
yuktā aṅ gulī iti sarveṣām ākṣepāt dharmi vācinī
khyāta eka artha abhidhāne tathā bihita saṃsthitiḥ
rūpa ādi śakti bhedānām anākṣepeṇa vartate

original: ato na rūpaṃ ghaṭa ityekādhikararaṇa śrutiḥ /
analyzed: atas na rūpam ghaṭaḥ iti eka adhikaraṇa śrutiḥ
bhedaḥ yam īdṛśaḥ jāti samudāya abhidhāyinoḥ
rūpa ādayaḥ ghaṭasya iti tad sāmānya upasarjanāḥ
tad śakti bhedāḥ khyāpyante vācyaḥ diśā anayā
hetu tve ca samastānām eka aṅga vikale pi na
pratyekam api sāmarthye yugapad bahu sambhavaḥ
na aneka tvasya tulya tvāt prāṇa apānau niyāmakau
eka tve pi bahu vyaktiḥ tad hetoḥ nitya sannidheḥ
na aneka hetuḥ iti ced na aviśeṣāt kramāt api
na eka prāṇe pi aneka artha grahaṇa niyamaḥ tatas
ekayā aneka vijñāne buddhyāḥ tu sakṛt eva tat
avirodhāt krameṇa api mā abhūt tad aviśeṣataḥ
bahavaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ prāṇāḥ asva jātīya kālikāḥ

original: tādṛśāmeva cittānāṃ kalpyante yadi kāraṇam // Pramāṇav_1.109 //
analyzed: tādṛśām eva cittānām kalpyante yadi kāraṇam

original: kramavantaḥ kathaṃ te syuḥ kramavaddhetunā vinā /
analyzed: kramavantaḥ katham te syuḥ kramavat hetunā vinā
pūrva sva jāti hetu tve na syāt ādyasya sambhavaḥ
tad hetuḥ tādṛśaḥ nā asti sati vā anekatā dhruvam
prāṇānām bhinna deśa tvāt sakṛjjanma dhiyām atas
yadi eka kālikaḥ na ikaḥ pi eka caitanya kāraṇam
ekasya api vaikalye syāt manda śvasita ādiṣu
atha hetuḥ yathābhāvam jñāne syāt viśiṣṭa tā

original: na hi tat tasya kārya yad yasya bhedānnna bhidyate // Pramāṇav_1.113 //
analyzed: na hi tat tasya kārya yat yasya bhedāt na bhidyate
vijñānam śakti niyamāt ekam ekasya kāraṇam
anya artha āsakti viguṇe jñāne ca artha antara agrahāt
śarīrāt sakṛt utpannā dhīḥ sva jātyā niyamyate

original: parataścet samarthasya dehasya viratiḥ kutaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.115 //
analyzed: paratas ced samarthasya dehasya viratiḥ kutas
anāśrayāt nivṛtte syāt śarīre cetasaḥ sthitiḥ
kevalasya iti ced citta santāna sthiti kāraṇam
tad hetu vṛtti lābhāya na aṅga tām yadi gacchati
hetuḥ deha antara utpattau pañca āyatanam aihikam
tad aṅga bhāva hetu tva niṣedhe nu upalambhanam
aniścaya karam proktam indriya ādi api śeṣa vat
dṛṣṭā ca saktiḥ pūrveṣām indriyāṇām sva jātiṣu
vikāra darśanāt siddham apara apara janma ca

original: śarīrād yadi tajjanma prasaṅgaḥ pūrvavad bhavet /
analyzed: śarīrāt yadi tat janma prasaṅgaḥ pūrva vat bhavet

original: cittāccet tata evāstu janma dehāntarasya ca // Pramāṇav_1.120 //
analyzed: cittāt ced tatas evā astu janma deha antarasya ca
tasmāt na hetu vaikalyāt sarveṣām antya cetasām

original: asandhirīdṛśaṃ tena śeṣavat sādhanaṃ matam // Pramāṇav_1.121 //
analyzed: asandhiḥ īdṛśam tena śeṣavat sādhanam matam
abhyāsena viśeṣe laṅghana udaka tāpa vat

original: svabhāvātikramo mā bhūditi ced āhitaḥ sa cet // Pramāṇav_1.122 //
analyzed: svabhāva atikramaḥ mā bhūt iti ced āhitaḥ sa ced
punar yatnam apekṣeta yadi syāt ca āsthita āśrayaḥ

original: viśeṣo naiva vardheta svabhāvaśca na tādṛśaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.123 //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ nā eva vardheta svabhāvaḥ ca na tādṛśaḥ
tatra upayukta śaktīnām viśeṣa anuttarān prati
sādhanānām asāmārthyāt nityam ca anāśraya sthiteḥ
viśeṣasya asvabhāva tvāt vṛddhau api āhitaḥ yadā

original: nāpekṣeta punaryatnaṃ yatno 'nyaḥ syād viśeṣakṛt // Pramāṇav_1.125 //
analyzed: na apekṣeta punar yatnam yatnaḥ nyaḥ syāt viśeṣa kṛt
kāṣṭha pārada hema ādeḥ agni ādeḥ iva cettasaḥ
abhyāsa jāḥ pravarttante svarasena kṛpā ādayaḥ

original: tasmāt sa teṣāmutpannaḥ svabhāvo jāyate guṇaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt sa teṣām utpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ jāyate guṇaḥ
tad uttarottaraḥ yatnaḥ viśeṣasya vidhāyakaḥ
yasmāt ca tulya jātīya pūrva bīja pravṛddhayaḥ
kṛpā ādi buddhayaḥ tāsām sati abhyāse kutas sthitiḥ
na ca evam laṅghanāt eva laṅghanam bala yatnayoḥ
tad hetvoḥ sthita śakti tvāt laṅ ghanasya sthita ātma tā
tasya ādau deha vaiguṇyāt paścāt vat avilaṅghanam

original: śanairyatnena vaiguṇye niraste svabale sthitiḥ // Pramāṇav_1.130 //
analyzed: śanais yatnena vaiguṇye niraste sva bale sthitiḥ
kṛpā sva bīja prabhavā sva bīja prabhavaiḥ na ced
vipakṣaiḥ bādhyate citte prayāti atyanta sātmatām

original: tathā hi mūlamabhyāsaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ parasya tu /
analyzed: tathā hi mūlam abhyāsaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ parasya tu
kṛpā vairāgya bodha ādeḥ citta dharmasya pāṭave
kṛpā ātmaka tvam abhyāsāt ghṛṇā vairāgya rāga vṛt
niṣpannaḥ karuṇā utkarṣaḥ para duḥkha akṣamā īritaḥ
dayāvān duḥkha hāna artham upāyeṣu abhiyujyate
parokṣa upeya tad hetoḥ tad ākhyānam hi duṣkaram
yukti āgamābhyām vimṛśan duḥkha hetu parīkṣate
tasya anitya ādi rūpam ca duḥkhasya eva viśeṣaṇaiḥ

original: yatastathā sthite hetau nivṛttirne ti paśyati /
analyzed: yatas tathā sthite hetau nivṛttiḥ nā iti paśyati
phalasya hetoḥ hāna artha tad vipakṣam parīkṣate
sādhyate hetoḥ rūpa avabodhataḥ
ātma ātmīya graha kṛtaḥ snehaḥ saṃskāra gocaraḥ
hetuḥ virodhi nairātma darśanam tasya bādhakam

original: bahuśo bahudhopāyaṃ kālena bahunāsya ca // Pramāṇav_1.138 //
analyzed: bahuśas bahudhā upāyam kālena bahunā asya ca
gacchanti abhyasyataḥ tatra guṇa doṣāḥ prakāśa tām
buddheḥ ca pāṭavāt hetoḥ vāsanātaḥ prahīyate
parārtha vṛttaiḥ khaḍga ādeḥ viśeṣaḥ yam mahā muneḥ
upāya abhyāsaḥ eva ayam tādarthyāt śāsanam matam
niṣpatteḥ prathamam bhāvāt hetuḥ uktam idam dvayam
hetoḥ prahāṇam triguṇam sugata tvam aniḥśrayāt
duḥkhasya śastam nairātmya dṛṣṭeḥ ca vā
punarāvṛttiḥ iti uktau janma doṣa samudbhavau
ātma darśana bījasya hānāt apunarāgamaḥ
tat bhūta bhinna ātma tayā śeṣam akleśa nirjvaram
kāya vāc buddhi vaiguṇyam mārga ukti apaṭu tā api vā
aśeṣa hānam abhyāsāt ukti ādeḥ doṣa saṃkṣayaḥ
na iti eke vyatirekaḥ sya sandigdhaḥ vyabhicāryataḥ
akṣayi tvam ca doṣāṇām nitya tvāt anupāyataḥ
upāyasya a parijñānāt api vā parikalpayet
hetumat tvāt viruddhasya hetoḥ abhyāsataḥ kṣayāt
hetu svabhāva jñānena tat jñānam api sādhyate

original: tāyaḥ svadṛṣṭamārgoktiḥ vaiphalyād vakti nānṛtam // Pramāṇav_1.147 //
analyzed: sva dṛṣṭa mārga uktiḥ vaiphalyāt vakti na anṛtam
dayālu tvāt para artham ca sarva ārambha abhiyogataḥ

original: tasmāt pramāṇam tāyo vā catuḥsatyaprakāśanam // Pramāṇav_1.148 //
analyzed: tasmāt pramāṇam tāyaḥ vā catur satya prakāśanam
duḥkham saṃsāriṇaḥ skandhāḥ rāga ādeḥ pāṭava īkṣaṇāt
abhyāsāt na yadṛcchātaḥ hetoḥ janma virodhataḥ
vyabhicārāt na prakṛti saṅkarāt

original: adoṣaścettadanyo 'pi dharmaḥ kiṃ tasya nekṣyate // Pramāṇav_1.150 //
analyzed: adoṣaḥ ced tad anyaḥ pi dharmaḥ kim tasya nā īkṣyate
na sarva dharmaḥ sarveṣām sama rāga prasaṅga tā
rūpa ādi vat adoṣaḥ ced tulyam tatra api codanam

original: ādhipatyaṃ viśiṣṭānāṃ yadi tatra na karmaṇām /
analyzed: ādhipatyam viśiṣṭānām yadi tatra na karmaṇām
viśeṣe ca doṣāṇām aviśeṣāt asiddha tā

original: na vikārād vikāreṇa sarveṣām na ca sarvajāḥ /
analyzed: na vikārāt vikāreṇa sarveṣām na ca sarvajāḥ

original: kāraṇe vardhamāne ca kāryahānirna yujyate // Pramāṇav_1.153 //
analyzed: kāraṇe vardhamāne ca kārya hāniḥ na yujyate
tāpa ādiṣu iva rāga ādeḥ vikāraḥ sukha ādi jaḥ
vaiṣamya jena duḥkhena rāgasya anudbhavaḥ yadi
vācyam kena udbhavaḥ sāmyāt mada vṛddhiḥ smaraḥ tatas

original: rāgī viṣamadoṣo 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ sāmye 'pi nāparaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.155 //
analyzed: rāgī dṛṣṭaḥ sāmye pi na aparaḥ
kṣayāt asṛj sru pi anye na eka strī niyataḥ madaḥ

original: tenaikasyāṃ na tīvraḥ syād aṅga rūpādyapīti cet // Pramāṇav_1.156 //
analyzed: tena ekasyām na tīvraḥ syāt aṅga rūpa ādi api iti ced
na sarveṣām anekāntāt na ca api aniyataḥ bhavet

original: aguṇagrāhiṇo 'pi syāt aṅgaṃ so 'pi guṇagrahaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.157 //
analyzed: a guṇa grāhiṇaḥ pi syāt aṅgam saḥ pi guṇa grahaḥ
yadi sarvaḥ guṇa grāhī syāt hetoḥ aviśeṣataḥ

original: yadavastho mato rāgī na dveṣī syācca tādṛśaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.158 //
analyzed: yad avasthaḥ mataḥ rāgī na dveṣī syāt ca tādṛśaḥ
tayoḥ asama rūpa tvāt niyamaḥ ca atra na īkṣyate
yasya rāga ādayaḥ tasya na ete doṣāḥ prasaṅginaḥ

original: etena bhūtadharmatvaṃ niṣiddham niḥśrayasya ca // Pramāṇav_1.160 //
analyzed: etena bhūta dharma tvam niṣiddham niḥśrayasya ca
niṣedhāt na pṛthivī ādi niḥśritāḥ dhavala ādayaḥ
tad upādāya śabdaḥ ca hetvarthaḥ svāśrayeṇa ca
a vinirbhāga varti tvāt rūpa ādeḥ āśrayaḥ vā

original: madādiśakteriva ced vinirbhāgaḥ na vastunaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.162 //
analyzed: mad ādi śakteḥ iva ced vinirbhāgaḥ na vastunaḥ
śaktiḥ artha antaram vastu naśyet na āśritām āśraye

original: tiṣṭhatyavikale yāti tattulyaṃ cenna bhedataḥ // Pramāṇav_1.163 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhati avikale yāti tad tulyam ced na bhedataḥ
bhūta cetanayoḥ bhinna pratibhāsa avabodhataḥ
āvikāram ca kāyasya tulya rūpam bhavet manaḥ
rūpa ādi vat vikalpasya kā eva artha paratantra tā
an apekṣya yadā kāyam vāsanā bodha kāraṇam

original: jñānaṃ syāt kasyacit kiñcit kutaścit tena kiñcina /
analyzed: jñānam syāt kasyacid kiñcid kutaścid tena
a vijñānasya vijñāna an upādānāt ca sidhyati
vijñāna śakti sambandhāt iṣṭam ced sarva vastunaḥ
etat sāṃkhya paśoḥ kaḥ nyaḥ sa lajjaḥ vaktum īhate
a dṛṣṭa pūrvam asti iti tṛṇa agre kariṇām śatam

original: yad rūpaṃ dṛśyatāṃ yātaṃ tad rūpaṃ prāṅ na dṛśyate // Pramāṇav_1.168 //
analyzed: yat rūpam dṛśyatām yātam tat rūpam prāk na dṛśyate

original: śatadhā viprakīrṇe 'pi hetau tad vidyate katham /
analyzed: śatadhā viprakīrṇe pi hetau tat vidyate katham
rāga ādi aniyamaḥ pūrva prādurbhāve prasajyate
bhūta ātma tā an atikrāntaḥ sarvaḥ rāga ādimān yadi

original: sarvaḥ samānarāgaḥ syād bhūtātiśayato na cet // Pramāṇav_1.170 //
analyzed: sarvaḥ samāna rāgaḥ syāt bhūta atiśayataḥ na ced
bhūtānām prāṇa tā bhede pi ayam bhedaḥ yad āśrayaḥ
tad nirhrāsa atiśayavat tad bhāvāt tāni hāpayet
na ced bhede pi rāga ādi hetu tulya ātma tā kṣayaḥ
sarvatra rāgaḥ sadṛśaḥ syāt hetoḥ sadṛśa ātmanaḥ
na hi go pratyayasya asti samāna ātma bhuvaḥ kvacid
tāratabhyam pṛthivī ādau prāṇita ādeḥ iha api vā
auṣṇyasya tāratamye na anuṣṇaḥ gniḥ kadācana
tathā iha api iti ced nā agneḥ auṣṇyāt bheda niṣedhataḥ
tāratamya anubhavinaḥ yasya anyasya sataḥ guṇāḥ

original: te kvacit pratihanyante tadbhede dhavalādivat // Pramāṇav_1.175 //
analyzed: te kvacid pratihanyante tad bhede dhavala ādi vat
rūpa ādi vat na niyamaḥ teṣām bhūta avibhāgataḥ

original: tat tulyaṃ cenna rāgādeḥ sahotpattiprasaṅgataḥ // Pramāṇav_1.176 //
analyzed: tat tulyam ced na rāga ādeḥ saha utpatti prasaṅgataḥ
vikalpya viṣaya tvāt ca viṣayāḥ na niyāmakāḥ
sa bhāga hetu virahāt rāga ādeḥ niyamaḥ na vā
sarvadā sarva buddhīnām janma vā hetu sannidheḥ
kadācid upalambhāt tad adhru vam doṣa niḥśrayāt
duḥkham hetu vaśa tvāt ca na ca ātmā na api adhiṣṭhitam

original: nākāraṇamadhiṣṭhātā nityaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ katham // Pramāṇav_1.179 //
analyzed: na akāraṇam adhiṣṭhātā nityam vā kāraṇam katham
tasmāt anekam ekasmāt bhinna kālam na jāyate
kārya anutpādataḥ nyeṣu hetuṣu
hetu antara anumānam syāt na etat nityeṣu vidyate
kādācitkatayā siddhā duḥkhasya asya sa hetutā
nityam sattvam asattvam vā hetoḥ bāhya anapekṣaṇāt

original: taikṣṇyādīnāṃ yathā nāsti kāraṇaṃ kaṇṭakādiṣu // Pramāṇav_1.182 //
analyzed: taikṣṇya ādīnām yathā nā asti kāraṇam kaṇṭaka ādiṣu

original: tathā kāraṇametat syād iti kecit pracakṣate /
analyzed: tathā kāraṇam etat syāt iti kecid pracakṣate

original: satyeva yasmin yajjanma vikāre vāpi vikriyā // Pramāṇav_1.183 //
analyzed: sati eva yasmin yat janma vikāre vā api vikriyā

original: tat tasya kāraṇaṃ prāhustat teṣāmapi vidyate /
analyzed: tat tasya kāraṇam prāhuḥ tat teṣām api vidyate
sparśasya rūpa hetu tvāt darśane sti nimitta tā
nityānām pratiṣedhena na īśvara ādeḥ ca sambhavaḥ
a sāmarthyāt atas hetuḥ bhava vāñchā parigrahaḥ
yasmāt deśa viśeṣasya tad prāpti āśā kṛtaḥ nṛṇām
sā bhavet śāpti anāpti icchoḥ pravṛttiḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: yato 'pi prāṇinaḥ kāmavibhavecche ca ta mate /
analyzed: yatas pi prāṇinaḥ kāma vibhava icche ca ta mate
sarvatra ca ātma snehasya hetu tvāt sampravartate
asukhe sukha saṃjñasya tasmāt tṛṣṇā bhava āśrayaḥ
virakta janma adṛṣṭeḥ iti ācāryāḥ sampracakṣate
adeha rāga adṛṣṭeḥ ca dehāt rāga samudbhavaḥ
nimitta upagamāt iṣṭam upādānam tu vāryate

original: imāṃ tu yuktimanvicchan vādhate svamataṃ svayam /
analyzed: imām tu yuktim anvicchan vādhate sva matam svayam
janmanā sahabhāvaḥ ced jātānām rāga darśanāt
sa bhāga jāteḥ prāk siddhiḥ kāraṇa tve pi na uditam

original: ajñānam uktā tṛṣṇaiva santānapreraṇād bhave // Pramāṇav_1.191 //
analyzed: ajñānam uktā tṛṣṇā eva santāna preraṇāt bhave
ānantaryāt ca karma api sati tasmin asambhavāt
tat anātyantikam hetoḥ pratibandha ādi sambhavāt
saṃsāri tvāt anirmokṣaḥ na iṣṭa tvāt aprasiddhitaḥ

original: yāvaccātmani na premṇo hāniḥ sa paritasyati // Pramāṇav_1.193 //
analyzed: yāvat ca ātmani na premṇaḥ hāniḥ sa paritasyati
tāvat duḥkhitam āropya na ca svasthaḥ vatiṣṭhate
mithyā adhyāropa hāna artha sati api moktari
avasthā vīta a rāgāṇām dayayā karmaṇā api vā
ākṣipte vinivṛtti iṣṭeḥ sahakāri kṣayāt alam
nā ākṣeptum aparam karma bhava tṛṣṇā vilaṅghinām
duḥkha jñāne viruddhasya pūrva saṃskāra vāhinī
vastu dharmaḥ dayā utpattiḥ na sā satva anurodhinī
ātma antara samāropat rāgaḥ dharme tad ātmake
duḥkha santāna saṃsparśa mātreṇa evam dayā udayaḥ

original: mohaśca mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sa ca sattvagraho vinā // Pramāṇav_1.198 //
analyzed: mohaḥ ca mūlam doṣāṇām sa ca sattva grahaḥ vinā

original: tanādyahetau na dveṣo na doṣo 'taḥ kṛpā matā /
analyzed: na dveṣaḥ na kṛpā matā
na amuktiḥ pūrva saṃskāra kṣaye
akṣīṇa śaktiḥ saṃskāraḥ yeṣām tiṣṭhanti te naghāḥ

original: mandatvāt karuṇāyāśca na yatnaḥ sthāpane mahān // Pramāṇav_1.200 //
analyzed: manda tvāt karuṇāyāḥ ca na yatnaḥ sthāpane mahān

original: tiṣṭhantyeva parādhīnā yeṣāṃ tu mahatī kṛpā /
analyzed: tiṣṭhanti eva para adhīnāḥ yeṣām tu mahatī kṛpā
satkāya dṛṣṭeḥ vigamāt ādyaḥ evā abhavaḥ bhavet

original: mārge cet sahajāhānerna hānau vā bhavaḥ kutaḥ /
analyzed: mārge ced sahaja ahāneḥ na hānau vā bhavaḥ kutas

original: sukhī bhaveyaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvamiti tṛṣyataḥ // Pramāṇav_1.202 //
analyzed: sukhī bhaveyam duḥkhī vā mā bhūvam iti tṛṣyataḥ
yā eva aham iti dhīḥ sā eva sahajam sattva darśanam
na hi a paśyan aham iti kaścid ātmani snihyati
na ca ātmani vinā premṇā sukha kāmaḥ abhidhāvati

original: duḥkhasyotpādahetutvaṃ bandho nityasya tat kutaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.204 //
analyzed: duḥkhasya utpāda hetu tvam bandho nityasya tat kutas
aduḥkha utpāda hetu tvam mokṣaḥ nityasya tat kutas

original: anityatvena yo 'vācyaḥ sa heturna hi kasyacit // Pramāṇav_1.205 //
analyzed: anitya tvena yaḥ vācyaḥ sa hetuḥ na hi kasyacid
bandha mokṣau api avācye na yujyete kathañcana

original: nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati // Pramāṇav_1.206 //
analyzed: nityam tam āhuḥ vidvāṃsaḥ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ na naśyati
tyaktvā imām hrepaṇīm dṛṣṭa mataḥ nityaḥ saḥ ucyatām
uktaḥ mārgaḥ tad abhyāsāt āśrayaḥ parivartate
sātmye doṣa bhāvaḥ ced mārga vat na a vibhu tvataḥ

original: viṣayagrahaṇaṃ dharmo vijñānasya yathāsti saḥ // Pramāṇav_1.208 //
analyzed: viṣaya grahaṇam dharmaḥ vijñānasya yathā asti saḥ
gṛhyate saḥ sya janakaḥ vidyamāna ātmanā iti ca
eṣā prakṛtiḥ asyāḥ tad nimitta antarataḥ skhalat
vyāvṛttau pratyaya apekṣam adṛḍham sarpa buddhi vat
prabhāsvaram idam cittam prakṛti āgantavaḥ malāḥ
tat prāk api asamarthānām paścāt śaktiḥ kva tad maye
na alam praroḍhum atyantam syandinyām agni vat bhuvi
bādhaka utpatti sāmarthya garbhe vastuni
nirupadrava bhūta artha svabhāvasya viparyayaiḥ
na bādhā yatnavat tve pi buddheḥ tad pakṣapātataḥ
ātma graha eka yoni tvāt kārya kāraṇa bhāvataḥ
bhede na parasparam
moha avirodhāt maitrī ādeḥ na atyantam doṣa nigrahaḥ

original: tanmūlāśca malāḥ sarve sa ca satkāyadarśanam /
analyzed: tad mūlāḥ ca malāḥ sarve sa ca sat kāya darśanam
vidyāyāḥ pratipakṣa tvāt caitta tvena upalabdhitaḥ
mithyā upalabdhiḥ ajñānam yukteḥ ca anyat ayuktimat

original: vyākhyeyo 'tra virodho yaḥ tadvirodhācca tanmayaiḥ // Pramāṇav_1.216 //
analyzed: vyākhyeyaḥ tra virodhaḥ yaḥ tad virodhāt ca tad mayaiḥ
virodhaḥ śūnyatā dṛṣṭeḥ satva doṣaiḥ prasidhyati
na akṣayaḥ prāṇi dharma tvāt rūpa ādi vat asiddhitaḥ
sambandhe pratipakṣasya tyāgasya adarśanāt api
na kāṭhinya vat utpattiḥ punar doṣa virodhinaḥ
sa ātma tvena anapāya tvāt anekāntāt ca bhasma vat
yaḥ paśyati ātmānam tatra asya aham iti śāśvataḥ snehaḥ

original: snehāt sukheṣu tṛṣyati tṛṣṇā doṣāṃstiraskurute // Pramāṇav_1.219 //
analyzed: snehāt sukheṣu tṛṣyati tṛṣṇāḥ doṣān tiraskurute
guṇa darśī paritṛṣyan mama iti tad sādhanāni upādatte

original: tenātmābhiniveśo yāvat tāvat sa saṃsāre // Pramāṇav_1.220 //
analyzed: tena ātma abhiniveśaḥ yāvat tāvat sa saṃsāre
ātmani sati para saṃjñā sva para vibhāgāt parigraha dveṣau

original: anayoḥ sampratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante // Pramāṇav_1.221 //
analyzed: anayoḥ sampratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante
niyamena ātmani snihyan tadīye na virajyate
na ca asti ātmani nirdoṣe sneha apagama kāraṇam

original: snehaḥ sadoṣa iti cet tataḥ kiṃ tasya varjanam // Pramāṇav_1.223 //
analyzed: snehaḥ sa doṣaḥ iti ced tatas kim tasya varjanam

original: adūṣite 'sya viṣaye na śakyaṃ tasya vajanam /
analyzed: a dūṣite sya viṣaye na śakyam tasya vajanam
prahāṇi ticcha dveṣa ādeḥ guṇa doṣa anubandhinaḥ

original: tayoradṛṣṭirviṣaye na tu bāhyeṣu yaḥ kramaḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ adṛṣṭiḥ viṣaye na tu bāhyeṣu yaḥ kramaḥ

original: na hi snehaguṇāt snehaḥ kintvarthaguṇadarśanāt // Pramāṇav_1.225 //
analyzed: na hi sneha guṇāt snehaḥ kintu artha guṇa darśanāt
kāraṇe vikale tasmin kārya kena nirvāryate

original: kā vā sadoṣatā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkhasamāśrayaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.226 //
analyzed: kā vā sa doṣa tā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkha samāśrayaḥ
tathā api na sva tva dṛṣṭeḥ yathā ātmani

original: na tairvinā duḥkhaheturātmā cet te 'pi tādṛśāḥ // Pramāṇav_1.227 //
analyzed: na taiḥ vinā duḥkha hetuḥ ātmā ced te tādṛśāḥ
nirdoṣam dvayam api evam vairāgyāt na dvayoḥ tatas
duḥkha bhāvanayā syāt ced ahi daṣṭa aṅga hāni vat
ātmīya buddhi hānyā atra tyāgaḥ na tu viparyaye
upabhoga āśraya tvena gṛhīteṣu indriya ādiṣu

original: svatvadhīḥ kena vāryeta vairāgyaṃ tatra tat kutaḥ /
analyzed: sva tva dhīḥ kena vāryeta vairāgyam tatra tat kutas
pratyakṣam eva sarvasya keśa ādiṣu kalevarāt
cyuteṣu sa ghṛṇā buddhiḥ jāyate nyeṣu sa spṛhā
samavāya ādi sambandha janitā tatra hi sva dhīḥ

original: sa tathaiveti sā doṣadṛṣṭāvapi na hīyate /
analyzed: sa tathā evā iti sā doṣa dṛṣṭau api na hīyate
samavāya ādi abhāve pi sarvatra asti upakāri tā
duḥkha upakārāt na bhavet aṃgulyām iva ced sva dhīḥ

original: na h yekāntena tad duḥkhaṃ bhūyasā saviṣānnavat // Pramāṇav_1.233 //
analyzed: na tat duḥkham bhūyasā sa viṣa anna vat
viśiṣṭa sukha saṅgāt syāt tad virudve virāgi tā
kiñcid parityajet saukhyam viśiṣṭa sukha tṛṣṇayā
nairātmye tu yathālābham ātma snehāt pravartate

original: alābhe mattakāsinyā dṛṣṭā tiryakṣu kāmitā // Pramāṇav_1.235 //
analyzed: alābhe mattakāsinyāḥ dṛṣṭā tiryakṣu kāmitā
yasya ātmā vallabhaḥ tasya sa nāśam katham icchiti
nivṛtta sarva anubhava vyavahāra guṇa āśrayam

original: icchet prema katham premṇaḥ prakṛtirna hi tādṛśī /
analyzed: icchet prema katham premṇaḥ prakṛtiḥ na hi tādṛśī
sarvathā ātma grahaḥ sneham ātmani draḍhayati alam
ātmīya sneha bījam tu tad avastham vyavasthitam
yatne pi ātmīya vairāgyam guṇa leśa samāśrayāt
vṛttimān pratibadhnāti tad doṣān saṃvṛṇoti ca
ātmani api virāgaḥ ced idānīm yaḥ virajyate
tyajati asau yathā ātmānam vyarthā atas duḥkha bhāvanā
duḥkha bhāvanayā api eṣa duḥkham eva vibhāvayet

original: pratyakṣaṃ pūrvamapi tat tathāpi na virāgavān /
analyzed: pratyakṣam pūrvam api tat tathā api na virāgavān

original: yadyapyekatra doṣeṇa tatkṣaṇaṃ calitā matiḥ // Pramāṇav_1.241 //
analyzed: yadi api ekatra doṣeṇa tad kṣaṇam calitā matiḥ
viraktaḥ nā eva tatra api kāmī iva vanitā antare
tyājya upādeya bhede hi saktiḥ yā evā eka bhāvinī
sā bījam sarva saktīnām paryāyeṇa samudbhave

original: nirdoṣaviṣayaḥ sneho nirdoṣaḥ sādhanāni ca // Pramāṇav_1.243 //
analyzed: nirdoṣa viṣayaḥ snehaḥ nirdoṣaḥ sādhanāni ca

original: etāvadeva ca jagat kvedānīṃ sa virajyate /
analyzed: etāvat eva ca jagat kva idānīm sa virajyate

original: sadoṣatāpi cet tasya tatrātmanyapi sā samā // Pramāṇav_1.244 //
analyzed: sa doṣa tā api ced tasya tatra ātmani api sā samā
tatra aviraktaḥ tad doṣe kva idānīm sa virajyate
guṇa darśana sambhūtam sneham bādhita doṣa dṛś

original: sa cendriyādau na tvevaṃ bālāderapi sambhavāt /
analyzed: sa ca indriya ādau na tu evam bāla ādeḥ api sambhavāt
doṣavatī api sadbhāvāt abhāvāt guṇavatī api
anyatra ātmīya tāyām vā api atīta ādau vihānitaḥ

original: tata eva ca nātmīyabuddherapi guṇekṣaṇam // Pramāṇav_1.247 //
analyzed: tatas eva ca na ātmīya buddheḥ api guṇa īkṣaṇam
kāraṇam hīyate sā api tasmāt na a guṇa darśanāt

original: api cāsadguṇāropaḥ snehāt tatra hi dṛśyate // Pramāṇav_1.248 //
analyzed: api ca asat guṇa āropaḥ snehāt tatra hi dṛśyate
tasmāt tad kāraṇa ābādhī bidhiḥ tam bādhate katham
para apara prārthanātaḥ vināśa utpāda buddhitaḥ
indriya ādau pṛthak bhūtam ātmānam vā iti ayam janaḥ

original: tasmānnaikatvadṛṣṭyāpi snehaḥ snihyan sa ātmani // Pramāṇav_1.250 //
analyzed: tasmāt na ekatva dṛṣṭyā api snehaḥ snihyan saḥ ātmani
upalambha antaraṅ geṣu prakṛtyā eva anurajyate

original: pratyutpannāt tu yo duḥkhānnirvedo dveṣa īdṛśaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.251 //
analyzed: pratyutpannāt tu yaḥ duḥkhāt nirvedaḥ dveṣaḥ īdṛśaḥ
na vairāgyam tadā api asya snehaḥ vasthā antara īṣaṇāt
dveṣasya duḥkha yoni tvāt sa tāvat mātra saṃsthitiḥ

original: tasmin nivṛtte prakṛtiṃ svāmeva bhajate punaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin nivṛtte prakṛtim svām eva bhajate punar
audāsīnyam tu sarvatra tyāga upādāna hānitaḥ
vāsī candana kalpānām vairāgyam nāma kathyate
saṃskāra duḥkha tām matvā kathitā duḥkha bhāvanā

original: sā ca naḥ pratyayotpattiḥ sā nairātmyadṛgāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: sā ca naḥ pratyaya utpattiḥ sā nairātmya dṛś āśrayaḥ
muktiḥ tu śūnyatā dṛṣṭeḥ tad arthāḥ śeṣa bhāvanāḥ
anityāt prāha tena eva duḥkham duḥkhāt nirātma tām
aviraktaḥ ca tṛṣṇāvān sarva ārambha samāśritaḥ
saḥ muktaḥ kleśa karmabhyām saṃsārī nāma tādṛśaḥ

original: ātmīyameva yo necched bhoktāpyasya na vidyate // Pramāṇav_1.257 //
analyzed: ātmīyam eva yaḥ nā icchet bhoktā api asya na vidyate

original: ātmāpi na tadā tasya kriyābhogau hi lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: ātmā api na tadā tasya kriyā bhogau hi lakṣaṇam
tasmāt anādi santāna tulya jātīya bījikām
utkhāta mūlām kuruta sattva dṛṣṭim mumukṣavaḥ
āgamasya tathābhāva nibandhanam apaśyatām
muktim āgama mātreṇa vadan na paritoṣa kṛt
na alam vīja ādi saṃsiddhaḥ vidhiḥ puṃsām ajanmane
taila abhyaṅga agni dāha ādeḥ api mukti prasaṅgataḥ

original: prāg gurorlāghavāt paścānna pāpaharaṇaṃ kṛtam // Pramāṇav_1.261 //
analyzed: prāk guroḥ lāghavāt paścāt na pāpa haraṇam kṛtam

original: mā bhūd gauravamevāsya na pāpaṃ gurvamūrttitaḥ /
analyzed: mā bhūt gauravam eva asya na pāpam guru amūrttitaḥ
mithyā jñāna tad udbhūta tarṣa sañcetanā vaśāt
hīna sthāna gatiḥ janma tatas tat chid na jāyate

original: tayoreva hi sāmarthya jātau tanmātrabhāvataḥ // Pramāṇav_1.263 //
analyzed: tayoḥ eva hi sāmarthya jātau tanmātra bhāvataḥ
te cetane svayam karma iti akhaṇḍam janma kāraṇam
gati pratītyoḥ karaṇāni āśrayāḥ tāni adṛṣṭataḥ
adṛṣṭa nāśāt agatiḥ tad saṃskāraḥ na cetanā
sāmarthya karaṇa utpatteḥ bhāva abhāva anuvṛttitaḥ

original: dṛṣṭaṃ buddherna cānyasya santi tāni nayanti kim /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam buddheḥ na ca anyasya santi tāni nayanti kim
dhāraṇa preraṇa kṣobha nirodhāḥ cetanā vaśāḥ
na syuḥ teṣām asāmarthye tasya dīkṣā ādi anantaram

original: atha buddhestadābhāvānna syuḥ sandhīyate malaiḥ // Pramāṇav_1.267 //
analyzed: atha buddheḥ tad abhāvāt na syuḥ sandhīyate malaiḥ
buddhaḥ teṣām asāmarthye jīvataḥ syuḥ akṣamāḥ
nirhrāsa atiśayāt puṣṭau pratipakṣa sva pakṣayoḥ
doṣāḥ sva bīja santānāḥ dīkṣite pi anivāritāḥ
nityasya nirapekṣa tvāt krama utpattiḥ virudhyate
kriyāyām akriyāyām ca kriyayoḥ sadṛśa ātmanaḥ
aikyam ca hetu phalayoḥ vyatirekaḥ tatas tayoḥ

original: kṛrtṛ bhoktṛtvahāniḥ syāt sāmarthya ca na sidhyati /
analyzed: bhoktṛ tva hāniḥ syāt sāmarthya ca na sidhyati
anya smaraṇa bhoga ādi prasaṅgāḥ ca na bādhakāḥ
asmṛteḥ kasyacid tena hi anubhūteḥ smṛta udbhavaḥ
sthiram sukham mama aham ca ityādi satya catuṣṭaye
abhūtān ṣoḍaśa ākārān āropya paritṛṣyati
tatra eva tad viruddha artha tattva ākāra anurodhinī
hanti sa anucarām tṛṣṇām samyak dṛṣṭiḥ su bhāvitā
tri hetoḥ na udbhavaḥ karma dehayoḥ sthitayoḥ api
eka abhāvāt vinā bījam na aṃkurasya iva sambhavaḥ

original: asambhavād vipakṣasya na hāniḥ karmadehayo // Pramāṇav_1.275 //
analyzed: asambhavāt vipakṣasya na hāniḥ karma dehayoḥ
aśakya tvāt ca tṛṣṇāyām sthitāyām punar udbhavāt

original: dvayakṣayārtha yatne ca vyarthaḥ karmakṣaye śramaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.276 //
analyzed: yatne ca vyarthaḥ karma kṣaye śramaḥ
phala vaicitrya dṛṣṭeḥ ca śakti bhedaḥ numīyate

original: karmaṇāṃ tāpasaṃkleśāt naikarūpāt tataḥ kṣayaḥ // Pramāṇav_1.277 //
analyzed: karmaṇām tāpa saṃkleśāt na eka rūpāt tatas kṣayaḥ
phalam kathañcid tad janyam alpam syāt na vijātimat
athā api tapasaḥ śaktyā śakti saṅkara saṃkṣayaiḥ
kleśāt kutaścid hīyeta aśeṣam akleśa leśataḥ

original: yadīṣṭamaparaṃ kleśāt tat tapaḥ kleśa eva cet // Pramāṇav_1.279 //
analyzed: yadi iṣṭam aparam kleśāt tat tapaḥ kleśaḥ eva ced
tat karma phalam iti asmāt na śakteḥ saṅkara ādikam
utpatsu doṣa nirghātāt ye pi doṣa virodhinaḥ

original: tajje karmaṇi śaktāḥ syuḥ kṛtihāniḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tad je karmaṇi śaktāḥ syuḥ kṛti hāniḥ katham bhavet

original: doṣā na karmaṇo duṣṭaḥ karoti na viparyayāt // Pramāṇav_1.281 //
analyzed: doṣāḥ na karmaṇaḥ duṣṭaḥ karoti na viparyayāt
mithyā vikalpena vinā nā abhilāṣaḥ sukhāt api
tāyat
bodha artha tvāt gameḥ bāhya śaikṣa aśaikṣa adhikaḥ tatas
parārtha jñāna ghaṭanam tasmāt tad śāsanam tatas
dayā para artha tantra tvam siddhārthasya avirāmataḥ

original: dayayā śreya ācaṣṭe jñānāt satyaṃ sasādhanam // Pramāṇav_1.284 //
analyzed: dayayā śreyaḥ ācaṣṭe jñānāt satyam sa sādhanam
tat ca abhiyogavān vaktum yatas tasmāt pramāṇa tā
upadeśa tathā abhāva stutiḥ tad upadeśataḥ
prayoga darśanāt vā asya yat kiñcid udaya ātmakam
nirodha dharmakam sarva tat ityādau anekadhā
anumāna āśrayaḥ liṅgam avinābhāva lakṣaṇam
vyāpti pradarśanāt hetoḥ sādhyena uktam ca tat sphuṭam
dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ
pratyakṣam
mānam dvividham vidhyāt śakti aśaktitaḥ
athaṃkriyāyām keśa ādiḥ na arthaḥ nartha adhimokṣataḥ
sadṛśa asadṛśa tvāt ca viṣaya aviṣaya tvataḥ
śabdasya anya nimittānām bhāve dhī sat asat tvataḥ
yat tat atra paramārtha sat

original: anyat saṃvṛtaisat proktam te svasāmānyalakṣaṇe // Pramāṇav_2.3 //
analyzed: anyat proktam te sva sāmānya lakṣaṇe
aśaktam sarvam iti ced bīja ādeḥ aṅkura ādiṣu

original: dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ matā sā cet saṃvṛtyā astu yathā tathā // Pramāṇav_2.4 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ matā sā ced saṃvṛtyā astu yathā tathā
sā asti sarvatra ced buddheḥ na anvaya vyatirekayoḥ
sāmānya lakṣaṇe dṛṣṭeḥ cakṣuḥ rūpa ādi buddhi vat
ghaṭa utkṣepaṇa samānya saṃkhyā ādiṣu dhiyaḥ gatāḥ
keśa ādayaḥ na sāmānyam anartha abhiniveśataḥ

original: jñeyatvena grahād doṣo nabhāveṣu prasajyate // Pramāṇav_2.7 //
analyzed: jñeya tvena grahāt doṣaḥ na bhāveṣu prasajyate
teṣām api tathā bhāve pratiṣedhāt sfuṭa ābha tā
jñāna rūpa tayā artha tvāt keśa ādi iti matiḥ punar
sāmānya viṣayā keśa pratibhāsam anarthakam
jñāna rūpa tayā artha tve sāmānye ced prasajyate
tathā iṣṭa tvāt adoṣaḥ artha rūpa tvena samāna tā
sarvatra sama rūpa tvāt tad vyāvṛtti samāśrayāt
na tat vastu a bhidyeya tvāt sāphalyāt akṣa saṃhateḥ
nāma ādi vacane vastṛ śrotṛ vācya anubandhini
a sambandhini nāma ādau arthe syāsa pravarttanam

original: sārūpyād bhrāntito vṛttirarthecet syānna sarvadā // Pramāṇav_2.12 //
analyzed: sārūpyāt bhrāntitaḥ vṛttiḥ artha iced syāt na sarvadā
deśa bhrāntiḥ ca na jñāne tulyam utpattitaḥ dhiyaḥ
tathāvidhāyāḥ anyatra tatra an upasamāt dhiyaḥ
bāhya artha pratibhāsāyāḥ upāye vā apramāṇa tā
vijñāna vyatiriktasya vyatireka aprasiddhitaḥ
sarva jñāna arthava tvāt ced svapna ādau anyathā īkṣaṇāt
ayuktam na ca saṃskārāt nīla ādi pratibhāsataḥ
nīla ādi apratighātāt na jñānam tat yogya deśakaiḥ

original: ajñātasya svayaṃ jñānāt nāmādyetena varṇitam // Pramāṇav_2.16 //
analyzed: ajñātasya svayam jñānāt nāma ādi etena varṇitam
sā evā iṣṭa arthavatī kena cakṣuḥ ādi matiḥ smṛtā
artha sāmarthya dṛṣteḥ ced anyat prāptam anarthakam
pravṛttiḥ syāt asambandhe pi artha sambandha vat yadi

original: atītānāgataṃ vācyaṃ na syādarthena tatkṣayāt // Pramāṇav_2.18 //
analyzed: atīta anāgatam vācyam na syāt arthena tad kṣayāt
sāmānya grahaṇāt śabdāt aprasaṅgaḥ mataḥ yadi
tat na kevala sāmānya agrahaṇāt grahaṇe vā
a tad samāna tā vyaktī tena nitya upalambhanam

original: nityatvācca yadi vyaktirvyakteḥ pratyakṣatāṃ prati // Pramāṇav_2.20 //
analyzed: nitya tvāt ca yadi vyaktiḥ vyakteḥ pratyakṣa tām prati
ātmani jñāna janane yat śaktam śaktam eva tat
atha aśaktam kadācid ced aśaktam sarvadā eva tat
tasya śaktiḥ aśaktiḥ vā yā svabhāvena saṃsthitā

original: nityatvādapi kiṃ tasya kastāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.22 //
analyzed: nitya tvāt api kim tasya kaḥ tām kṣapayitum kṣamaḥ
tat ca sāmānya vijñānam anurundhan vibhāvyate

original: nīlādyākāraleśo yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.23 //
analyzed: nīla ādi ākāra leśaḥ yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ
pratyakṣa pratyaya artha tvāt na akṣāṇām vyartha tā iti ced
sā eva eka rūpāt śabda ādeḥ bhinna ābhāsā matiḥ kutas
na jātiḥ jātimat vyakti rūpam yena apara āśrayam

original: siddham pṛthak cet kāryatvaṃ hyapekṣetyabhidhīyate // Pramāṇav_2.25 //
analyzed: siddham pṛthak ced kārya tvam hi apekṣā iti abhidhīyate
niṣpatteḥ apara adhīnam api kārya sva hetutaḥ
sambadhyate kalpanayā kim akārya kathañcana
anya tve tat asambaddham siddhātaḥ niḥsvabhāva tā
jāti prasaṅgaḥ bhāvasya na apekṣā bhāvataḥ tayoḥ
tasmāt arūpā rūpāṇām na āśrayeṇa upakalpitā
tad viśeṣa avagāha arthaiḥ jātiḥ śabdaiḥ prakāśyate
tasyām rūpa avabhāsaḥ yaḥ tattvena arthasya vā grahaḥ
bhrāntiḥ sā anādi kālīna darśana abhyāsa nirmitā
arthānām yat ca sāmānyam anya vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam

original: yanniṣṭhāsta ime śabdā na rūpaṃ tasya kiñcana // Pramāṇav_2.30 //
analyzed: yad niṣṭhāḥ te ime śabdāḥ na rūpam tasya kiñcana
sāmānya buddhau sāmānyena arūpāyām avīkṣaṇāt
artha bhrāntiḥ api iṣyeta sāmānyam sā api abhiplavāt
artha rūpa tayā tattvena abhāvāt ca na rūpiṇī
niḥsvabhāva tayā avācyam kutaścid vacanāt matam
yadi vastuni vastūnām avācya tvam kathañcana
nā eva vācyam upādāna bhedāt bheda upacārataḥ
atīta anāgate pi arthe sāmānya vinivandhanāḥ

original: śrutayo niviśante sadasaddharmaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.34 //
analyzed: śrutayaḥ niviśante sat asat dharmaḥ katham bhavet
upacārāt tat iṣṭam ced varttamāna ghaṭasya kā

original: pratyāsattirabhāvena yā paṭādau na vidyate // Pramāṇav_2.35 //
analyzed: pratyāsattiḥ abhāvena yā paṭa ādau na vidyate
buddheḥ askhalitā vṛttiḥ mukhya āropitayoḥ sadā

original: siṃhe māṇavake tadvad ghoṣaṇāpyasti laukikī // Pramāṇav_2.36 //
analyzed: siṃhe māṇavake tadvat ghoṣaṇā api asti laukikī
yatra rūḍhyā asat arthaḥ u pi janaiḥ śabdaḥ niveśitaḥ

original: sa mukhyastatra tatsāmyādū gauṇo 'nyatra skhaladgatiḥ // Pramāṇav_2.37 //
analyzed: sa mukhyaḥ tatra tad sāmyāt gauṇaḥ nyatra skhalat gatiḥ
yathā bhāve pi abhāva ākhyām yathā kalpanam eva vā

original: kuryādaśakte śakte vā pradhānādiśrutiṃ janaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.38 //
analyzed: kuryāt aśakte śakte vā pradhāna ādi śrutim janaḥ
yādṛśī buddhiḥ naṣṭe naṣṭe dṛśyate
tādṛśī eva sat arthānām na etat śrotra ādi cetasām
sāmānya mātra grahaṇāt sāmānyam

original: tasyāpi kevalasya prāg grahaṇaṃ vinivāritam // Pramāṇav_2.40 //
analyzed: tasya api kevalasya prāk grahaṇam vinivāritam
paraspara viśiṣṭānām aviśiṣṭam katham bhavet

original: tathā dvirūpatāyāṃ vā tad vastvekaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.41 //
analyzed: tathā dvi rūpatāyām vā tat vastu ekam katham bhavet

original: tābhyāṃ tadanyadeva syād yadi rūpaṃ samaṃ tayoḥ /
analyzed: tābhyām tat anyat eva syāt yadi rūpam samam tayoḥ

original: tayoriti na sambandho vyāvṛttistu na duṣyati // Pramāṇav_2.42 //
analyzed: tayoḥ iti na sambandhaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ tu na duṣyati
tasmāt samāna tā eva asmin sāmānte vastu lakṣaṇam

original: kārya cet tadanekaṃ syānnaścaraṃ ca na tanmatam // Pramāṇav_2.43 //
analyzed: ced tat anekam syāt naścaram ca na tat matam
vastu mātra anubandhi tvāt vināśasya na nitya tā
asambandhaḥ ca jātīnām akārya tvāt arūpa tā
yat ca vastu balāt jñānam jāyate

original: na saṃketa sa sāmānyabuddhuṣvetad vibhāvyate // Pramāṇav_2.45 //
analyzed: na saṃketa sa sāmānya buddhuṣu etat vibhāvyate
yāpya bheda anugā buddhiḥ kācid vastu dvaya īkṣaṇe
saṃketena vinā sārtha pratyāsatti nibandhanā
pratyas sattiḥ vinā jātyā yathā iṣtā cakṣuḥ ādiṣu
jñāna kāryeṣu jātiḥ vā yathā anveti vibhāgataḥ
vijñāne tad rupān avabhāsataḥ

original: yadi nāmendriyāṇāṃ syād draṣṭā bhāseta tadvapuḥ // Pramāṇav_2.48 //
analyzed: yadi nāma indriyāṇām syāt draṣṭā bhāseta tad vapuḥ
rūpava tvāt na jātīnām kevalānām adarśanāt
vyakti grahe ca tat śabda rupāt anyat na dṛśyate
jñāna mātra artha karaṇe pi ayogyam atas eva tat
tad ayogya tayā arūpam tat hi avastuṣu lakṣaṇam
yathā ukta viparītam yat tat sva lakṣaṇam iṣyate
sāmānyam trividham tat ca bhāva abhāva ubhaya āśrayāt
yadi bhāva āśrayam jñānam bhāve bhāva anubandhataḥ
na ukta uttara tvāt dṛṣṭa tvāt atīta ādiṣu ca anyathā
bhāva dharma tva hāniḥ ced bhāva grahaṇa pūrvakam
tat jñānam iti adoṣaḥ yam meyam tu ekam sva lakṣaraṇam
tasmāt artha kriyā siddheḥ sat asat tā vicāraṇāt
tasya sva para rūpābhyām gateḥ meya dvayam matam
ayathā abhiniveśena dvitīyā bhrāntiḥ iṣyate

original: gatiścet pararūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā // Pramāṇav_2.55 //
analyzed: gatiḥ ced para rūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇa tā
abhiprāya avisaṃvādāt api bhrānteḥ pramāṇa tā
gatiḥ api anyathā dṛṣṭā pakṣaḥ ca ayam kṛta uttaraḥ
maṇi pradīpa prabhayoḥ maṇi buddhyā abhidhāvatoḥ
mithyā jñāna aviśeṣe viśeṣaḥ ṛthakriyām prati
yathā tathā yathārtha tve pi anumāna tad ābhayoḥ
artha kriyā anurodhena pramāṇa tvam vyaya sthitam
buddhiḥ yatra artha sāmarthyāt anvaya vyatirekiṇī
tasya svatabtram grahaṇam atas vastu atīndriyam
tasya adṛṣṭa ātma rūpasya gateḥ anyaḥ rthaḥ āśrayaḥ

original: tadāśrayeṇa sambandhī yadi syād gamakastadā // Pramāṇav_2.60 //
analyzed: tad āśrayeṇa sambandhī yadi syāt gamakaḥ tadā
gamaka anuga sāmānya rūpeṇa eva tadā gatiḥ

original: tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣo 'rtho viśeṣeṇa na gamyate // Pramāṇav_2.61 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣaḥ rthaḥ viśeṣeṇa na gamyate

original: yā ca sambandhino dharmād bhūtirdharmiṇi jñāyate /
analyzed: yā ca sambandhinaḥ dharmāt bhūtiḥ dharmiṇi jñāyate
sa anumānam parokṣāṇām ekāntena eva sādhanam
na pratyakṣa ra parikṣābhyām meyasya anyasya sambhavaḥ
tasmāt prameya dvi tvena pramāṇa dvi tvam iṣyate
tri eka saṃkhyā nirāsaḥ vā prameya dvaya sarśanāt
ekam eva aprameya tvāt asataḥ ced matam ca naḥ
prameya tve sadbhāvasya niścayaḥ

original: tanniścyapramāraṇaṃ vā dvitīyam nākṣajā matiḥ // Pramāṇav_2.65 //
analyzed: vā dvitīyam na akṣa jā matiḥ
abhāve rtha balāt jāteḥ artha śakti anapekṣaṇe
vyavadhāna ādi bhāve pi jāyeta indriya jā matiḥ
abhāve vinivṛttiḥ ced pratyakṣasya eva niścayaḥ
viruddham sā eva vā liṅgam anvaya vyatirekiṇī
śiddham ca para caitanya pratipatteḥ pramā dvayam
vyavahāra ādau pravṛttaḥ ca siddhaḥ tad bhāva niścaḥ
pramāṇam avisaṃvādāt tat kvacid vyabhicārataḥ
na āśvāsaḥ iti ced liṅga durdṛṣṭiḥ etat īdṛśam
yatas kadācid siddhā asya pratītiḥ vastunaḥ kvacid

original: tadvaśya tato jātaṃ tatsvabhāvo 'pi vā bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.70 //
analyzed: tatas jātam vā bhavet

original: svanimittāt svabhāvād vā vinā nārthasya sambhavaḥ /
analyzed: sva nimittāt svabhāvāt vā vinā nā arthasya sambhavaḥ

original: yacca rūpaṃ tayordṛṣṭaṃ tadevānyatra lakṣaṇam // Pramāṇav_2.71 //
analyzed: yat ca rūpam tayoḥ dṛṣṭam tat eva anyatra lakṣaṇam
svabhāve sva nimitte vā dṛśye darśana hetuṣu

original: anyeṣu satsvadṛśye ca satta vā tadvataḥ katham // Pramāṇav_2.72 //
analyzed: anyeṣu satsu adṛśye ca vā tadvataḥ katham
aprāmāṇye ca sāmānya buddheḥ tad lopaḥ āgataḥ
pretyabhāva vat akṣaiḥ tat paryāyeṇa pratīyate
tat ca na indriya śakti ādau akṣa buddheḥ asambhavāt
abhāva pratipattau syāt buddheḥ janma ānittikam
sva lakṣaṇe ca pratyakṣam avikalpa tayā vinā
vikalpena na sāmānya grahaḥ tasmin tatas numā
prameya niyame varṇa anitya tā na pratīyate
pramāṇam anyat tat buddhuḥ vinā liṅgena sambhavāt
viśeṣa dṛṣṭe liṅgasya sambandhasya aprasiddhitaḥ

original: tat pramāṇāntaraṃ meyabahutvād bahutāpi vā // Pramāṇav_2.77 //
analyzed: tat pramāṇa antaram meya bahu tvāt bahu tā api vā
pramāṇānām anekasya vṛtteḥ ekatra vā tathā
viśeṣa da dṛṣṭeḥ eka tri saṃkhyā apohaḥ na vā bhavet
viṣaya aniyamāt anya prameyasya ca sambhavāt

original: yojanād varṇasāmānye nāyaṃ doṣaḥ prasajyate // Pramāṇav_2.79 //
analyzed: yojanāt varṇa sāmānye na ayam doṣaḥ prasajyate
na avastu rūpam tasya eva tathā siddheḥ prasādhanāt
anyatra na anya siddhiḥ ced na tasya eva prasiddhitaḥ

original: yo hi bhāvo yathābhūto sa tadṛgliṅ gacetasaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ hi bhāvaḥ sa tadṛgliṅ ga cetasaḥ

original: hetustajjā tathābhūte tasmād vastuni liṅigadhīḥ // Pramāṇav_2.81 //
analyzed: hetuḥ tad jā tathābhūte tasmāt vastuni liṅiga dhīḥ
liṅga liṅgi dhiyoḥ evam pāramparyeṇa vastuni
prativabdhāt tad ābhāsa śūnyayoḥ api avañcanam
tad rī pa adhyavasāyāt ca tayoḥ tad rūpa śūnyayoḥ
tad rūpa a vañcaka tve pi kṛtā bhrānti vyavasthitiḥ
tasmāt vastuni boddhavye vyāpakam vyāpya cetasaḥ

original: nimittaṃ tatsvabhāvo vā kāraṇam tacca taddhiyaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.84 //
analyzed: nimittam tad svabhāvaḥ vā kāraṇam tat ca tad dhiyaḥ
pratiṣedhaḥ tu sarvatra sādhyate nupalambhataḥ
siddhim pramāṇaiḥ vadatām arthāt eva viparyayāt
dṛṣṭā viriddha dharma uktiḥ tasya tad kāraṇasya vā
niṣedhe yā api tasya eva sā apramāṇa tva sūcanā
anyathā ekasya dharmasya svabhāva uktyā parasya tat

original: nāstitvaṃ kena gamyeta virodhācced asāvapi // Pramāṇav_2.87 //
analyzed: nāstitvam kena gamyeta virodhāt ced asau api

original: siddhaḥ kenāsahasthānāditi cet tat kuto matam /
analyzed: siddhaḥ kena a saha sthānāt iti ced tat kutas matam
dṛśyasya darśana abhāvāt iti ced sā apramāṇa tā
tasmāt sva śabdena uktā api sābhāvasya prasādhikā
yasya apramāṇam sā avācyaḥ niṣedhaḥ tena sarvathā
etena tad viruddha artha kārya uktiḥ upavarṇa tā

original: prayogaḥ kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ sarvatrārtho na bhidyate // Pramāṇav_2.90 //
analyzed: prayogaḥ kevalam bhinnaḥ sarvatra arthaḥ na bhidyate
viruddham tat ca sa upāyam a vidhāya apidhāya ca
pramāṇa uktiḥ niṣedhe yā na sāmnāya anusāriṇī
ukti ādeḥ sarva vid pretyabhāva ādi pratiṣedha vat
atīndriyāṇām arthānām virodhasya aprasiddhitaḥ
bādhya vādhaka bhāvaḥ kaḥ syātām yadi yukti saṃvidau
tādṛśaḥ nupalabdheḥ ced ucyatām sā eva sādhanam
proktam īdṛś ca anupalambhanam
tat na atyanta parokṣeṣu sat asat tā viniścayau

original: bhinno 'bhinno 'pi vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prayujjate /
analyzed: bhinnaḥ bhinnaḥ pi vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prayujjate

original: yathāgnirahime sādhye sattā vā janmabādhanī // Pramāṇav_2.95 //
analyzed: yathā agniḥ ahime sādhye sattā vā janma bādhanī

original: yathā vastveva vastūnāṃ sādhane sādhanaṃ matam /
analyzed: yathā vastu eva vastūnām sādhane sādhanam matam

original: tathā vastveva vastūnāṃ svanivṛttau nivarttakam // Pramāṇav_2.96 //
analyzed: tathā vastu eva vastūnām sva nivṛttau nivarttakam
etena kalpanā nyastaḥ yatra kvacana sambhavāt
dharmaḥ pakṣa sapakṣa anyatara tva ādiḥ apoditaḥ
tatra api vyāpakaḥ dharmaḥ nivṛtteḥ gamakaḥ mataḥ
vyāpaka sva nivṛttiḥ ced paricchinnā kathañcana
yat apramāṇa tā bhāve liṅgam tasya eva kathyate
tat atyanta vimūḍha artham āgopālam asaṃvṛteḥ
etāvat niścaya phalam abhāve na upalambhanam

original: tacca hetau svabhāve vā dṛśye dṛśyatā mate // Pramāṇav_2.100 //
analyzed: tat ca hetau svabhāve vā dṛśye dṛśyatā mate
anumānāt anitya ādeḥ grahaṇe yam kramaḥ mataḥ
prāmāṇyam eva na anyatra gṛhīta ghaṇāt matam

original: nānyāsyānityatā bhāvāt pūrva siddhaḥ sa cenidriyāt /
analyzed: bhāvāt siddhaḥ

original: nānekarūpo vācyo 'sau vācyo dharmo vikalpajaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.102 //
analyzed: na aneka rūpaḥ vācyaḥ sau vācyaḥ dharmaḥ vikalpa jaḥ
sāmānya āśraya saṃsiddhau sāmānyam siddham eva tat
tad asiddhau tathā asya eva hi anumānam pravartate
kvacid tad aparijñānam sadṛśa apara sambhavāt
bhrānteḥ apaśyataḥ bhedam māyā golaka bheda vat
tathā hi aliṅgam ābālam asaṃśliṣṭa uttara udayam

original: paśyan paricchinattyeva dīpādi nāśinaṃ janaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.105 //
analyzed: paśyan paricchinatti eva dīpa ādi nāśinam janaḥ
bhāva svabhāva bhūtāyām api śaktau phale dṛśaḥ
an ānantaryataḥ mohaḥ viniścetuḥ apāṭavāt
vinivṛtti artham anumāna upavarṇanam
vyasyanti īkṣaṇāt eva sarva ākārāt mahā dhiyaḥ
vyāvṛtte sarvatas tasmin vyāvṛtti vinivbandhanāḥ

original: buddhayo 'rthe pravarttante bhinne bhinnāśrayā iva // Pramāṇav_2.108 //
analyzed: buddhayaḥ rthe pravarttante bhinne bhinna āśrayāḥ iva
yathācodanam ākhyāḥ ca saḥ sati bhrānti kāraṇe
pratibhāḥ pratisandhatte sva anurūpāḥ svabhāvataḥ
dhvaṃsaḥ liṅgāt anupalambhanāt
prāk bhūtvā hi abhavan bhāvaḥ nityaḥ iti abhidhīyate
yasya ubhaya anta vyavadhi sattā sambandha vā
anitya tā śrutiḥ tena tāvantau iti kau smṛtau
prāk paścāt api abhāvaḥ ced saḥ evā anitya tā na kim

original: ṣaṣṭhayādyayogāditi cedū antayoḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.112 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhayā ādya yogāt iti antayoḥ sa katham bhavet
sattā sambandhayoḥ dhrauvyāt antābhyām na viśeṣaṇam
a viśeṣaṇam eva syāt antau ced kārya kāraṇe
asambandhāt na bhāvasya prāgabhāvam sa vāñchati

original: tadupādhisamākhyāne te 'pyasya ca na sidhyataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.114 //
analyzed: tad upādhi samākhyāne te pi asya ca na sidhyataḥ
sattā sva kāraṇa āśleṣa karaṇāt kāraṇam kila

original: sā sattā sa ca sambandho nityau kāryamatheha kim // Pramāṇav_2.115 //
analyzed: sā sattā sa ca sambandhaḥ nityau kāryam atha iha kim
yasya abhāvaḥ kriyeta asau na bhāvaḥ prāgabhāvavān
sambandha anabhyupagamāt nityam viśvam idam tatas
tasmāt anartha askandinyaḥ bhinna artha abhimateṣu api
śabdeṣu vācya bhedinyaḥ vyatireka āspadam dhiyaḥ
viśeṣa pratyabhijñānam na prati kṣaṇa bhedataḥ

original: na vā viśeṣaviṣayaṃ dṝṣṭasāmyena tadgrahāt // Pramāṇav_2.118 //
analyzed: na vā viśeṣa viṣayam dṝṣṭa sāmyena tad grahāt
nidarśanam tat evā iti sāmānya agrahaṇam yadi

original: nidarśanatvāt siddhasya pramāṇenāsya kiṃ punaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.119 //
analyzed: nidarśana tvāt siddhasya pramāṇena asya kim punar
vismṛta tvāt adoṣaḥ ced tatas eva anidarśanam
dṛṣṭe tad bhāva siddhiḥ ced pramāṇāt anya vastuni
tattva ārope viparyāsaḥ tad siddheḥ apramāṇa tā
pratyakṣa itarayoḥ aikyāt eka siddhiḥ dvayoḥ api
sandhīyamānam ca anyena vyavasāyam smṛtim viduḥ
tad liṅga apekṣaṇāt no ced smṛtiḥ na vyabhicārataḥ
pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣeṇa eva sidhyati
pratyātma vedyaḥ sarveṣām vikalpaḥ nāma saṃśrayaḥ
saṃhṛtya sarva tāḥ cintām stimitena antarātmanā

original: sthito 'pi cakṣuṣā rūpamīkṣate sākṣajā matiḥ // Pramāṇav_2.124 //
analyzed: sthitaḥ u pi cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate sā akṣajā matiḥ
punar vikalpayan kiñcid āsīt me kalpanā īdṛśī

original: vetti ceti na pūrvoktāvasthāyāmindriyād gatau // Pramāṇav_2.125 //
analyzed: vetti ca iti na pūrva ukta avasthāyām indriyāt gatau

original: ekatra dṛṣṭau bhedo hi kvacinnānyatra dṛśyate /
analyzed: ekatra dṛṣṭau bhedaḥ hi kvacid na anyatra dṛśyate

original: na tasmād bhinnamastyanyat sāmānyaṃ buddhyabhedataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.126 //
analyzed: na tasmāt bhinnam asti anyat sāmānyam buddhi abhedataḥ
tasmāt viśeṣa viṣayā sarvaiḥ vā indriya jā matiḥ

original: na viśeṣeṣu śabdānāṃ pravṛttāvasti sambhavaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.127 //
analyzed: na viśeṣeṣu śabdānām pravṛttau asti sambhavaḥ
ananvayāt viśeṣāṇām saṅketasya apravṛttitaḥ

original: viṣayo yaśca śabdānāṃ saṃyojyeta sa eva taiḥ // Pramāṇav_2.128 //
analyzed: viṣayaḥ yaḥ ca śabdānām saṃyojyeta saḥ eva taiḥ
asya idam iti sambandhe yau arthau pratibhāsinau

original: tayoreva hi sambandho na tadendriyagocaraḥ // Pramāṇav_2.129 //
analyzed: tayoḥ eva hi sambandhaḥ na tadā indriya gocaraḥ
viśada pratibhāsasya tadā arthasya a vibhāvanāt
vijñāna ābhāsa bhedaḥ hi padārthānām viśeṣakaḥ
cakṣuṣā artha avabhāse pi yam paras sya iti śaṃsati

original: sa eva yojyate śabdairna khalvindriyagocaraḥ // Pramāṇav_2.131 //
analyzed: saḥ eva yojyate śabdaiḥ na khalu indriya gocaraḥ
avyāpṛta indriyasya anya vāc mātreṇa a vibhāvanāt
na ca anudita sambandhaḥ svayam jñāna prasaṅgataḥ
manasaḥ yugapad vṛtteḥ sa vikalpa avikalpayoḥ
vimūḍhaḥ laghu vṛtteḥ vā tayoḥ aikyam vyavasyati
vikalpa vyavadhānena vicchinnam darśanam bhavet

original: iti ced bhinnajātīyavikalpe 'nyasya vā katham // Pramāṇav_2.134 //
analyzed: iti ced bhinna jātīya vikalpe nyasya vā katham
alāta dṛṣṭi vat bhāva pakṣaḥ ced balavān mataḥ

original: anyatrāpi samānaṃ tad varṇayorvā sakṛcchutiḥ // Pramāṇav_2.135 //
analyzed: anyatra api samānam tat varṇayoḥ vā sakṛt śutiḥ
sakṛt saṅga ta sarva artheṣu indriyeṣu iha satsu api
pañcabhiḥ vyavadhāne pi bhāti avyavahitā iva yā
sā matiḥ mām aparyanta kṣaṇika jñāna miśraṇāt

original: vicchinnābheti taccitraṃ tasmāt santu sakṛddhiyaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.137 //
analyzed: vicchinnā ābheti tat citram tasmāt santu sakṛt dhiyaḥ
pratibhāsa aviśeṣaḥ ca sa antara anantare katham

original: śuddhe manovikalpe ca na kramagrahaṇaṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.138 //
analyzed: śuddhe manaḥ vikalpe ca na krama grahaṇam bhavet
yaḥ grahaḥ pi arthe kvacid āsakta cetasaḥ
saktyā anya utpatti vaiguṇyāt codyam vai tat dvayoḥ api
śīghra vṛtteḥ alāta ādeḥ anvaya pratighātinī

original: cakrabhrāntiṃ dṛgādhatte na dṛśāṃ ghaṭanena sā // Pramāṇav_2.140 //
analyzed: cakra bhrāntim dṛś ādhatte na dṛśām ghaṭanena sā
kecid indriya ja tva ādeḥ bāla dhī vat akalpanām
āhuḥ bālā vikalpe ca hetum saṃketa manda tām
teṣām pratyakṣam eva syāt bālānām avikalpanāt
saṃketa upāya vigamāt paścāt api bhavet na saḥ
manaḥ vyutpanna saṃketam asti tena sa ced mataḥ
evam indriya je syāt śeṣavat ca idam īdṛśam
yat eva sādhanam bāle tat eva atrā api kathyatām
sāmyāt akṣa dhiyām uktam anena anubhava ādikam
viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyam ca sambandham laukikīm sthitim

original: gṛhītvā saṅkalayayaitat tathā pratyeti nānyathā // Pramāṇav_2.145 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā tathā pratyeti nā anyathā
yathā daṇḍini jāti ādeḥ vivekena anirūpaṇāt

original: tadvatā yojanā nāsti kalpanāpyatra nāstyataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.146 //
analyzed: tadvatā yojanā nā asti kalpanā api atra nā asti atas
yat api anvayi vijñānam śabda vyakti avabhāsi tat
varṇa ākṛti akṣara ākāra śūnyam go tvam hi varṇyate
samāna tve pi tasya eva netra gocare
pratibhāsa dvaya abhāvāt buddheḥ bhedaḥ ca durlabhaḥ
samavāya agrahāt akṣaiḥ sambandha adarśanam sthitam
paṭaḥ tantuṣu iha ityādi śabdāḥ ca ime svayam kṛtāḥ

original: śṛṅgaṃ gavīti loke syāt śṛṃge gaurityalaukikam /
analyzed: śṛṅgam gavi iti loke syāt śṛṃge gauḥ iti alaukikam
go ākhya pariśiṣṭa aṅga viccheda anupalambhanāt
taiḥ tantubhiḥ iyam śāṭī iti uttaram kāryam ucyate
tantu saṃskāra sambhūtam na eka kālam kathañcana
kāraṇa āropataḥ kaścid vā

original: tantvākhyāṃ vartayet kārye darśayan nāśrayaṃ śruteḥ // Pramāṇav_2.152 //
analyzed: tantu ākhyām vartayet kārye darśayan na āśrayam śruteḥ
upakārya upakāri tvam vicchedāt dṛṣṭiḥ eva vā
mukhyam yat askhalat jñānam ādi saṃketa gocaraḥ

original: anumānaṃ ca jātyādau vastuno nāsti bhedini /
analyzed: anumānam ca jāti ādau vastunaḥ nā asti bhedini

original: sarvatra vyapadeśo hi daṇḍādernāpi sāṃvṛtāt // Pramāṇav_2.154 //
analyzed: sarvatra vyapadeśaḥ hi daṇḍa ādeḥ na api sāṃvṛtāt
vastu prāsāda mālā ādi śabdāḥ ca anya anapekṣiṇaḥ

original: geho yadyapi saṃyogastanmālā kinnu tad bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.155 //
analyzed: gehaḥ yadi api saṃyogaḥ tat mālā kin nu tat bhavet
jātiḥ ced gehe ekā api mālā iti ucyeta vṛkṣa vat
mālā bahutve tad śabdaḥ katham jāteḥ ajātitaḥ
mālā ādau ca mahat tva ādiḥ iṣṭaḥ yaḥ ca aupacārikaḥ
mukhya a viśiṣṭa vijñāna grāhya tvāt na aupacārikaḥ
ananya hetutā tulyā sā mukhya abhimateṣu api

original: padārthaśabdaḥ kaṃ hetumanyaṃ ṣaṭsu samīkṣate // Pramāṇav_2.158 //
analyzed: padārtha śabdaḥ kam hetum anyam ṣaṭsu samīkṣate
yaḥ yathā rūḍhitaḥ siddhaḥ tad sāmyāt yaḥ tathā ucyate
mukhyaḥ gauṇaḥ ca bhāveṣu api abhāvasya upacārataḥ
saṃketa anvayinī rūḍhiḥ vaktuḥ icchā anvayī ca saḥ
kriyate vyavahāra artha chandaḥ śabda aṃśa nāma vat
vastu dharma tayā eva arthāḥ tādṛś vijñāna kāraṇam

original: bhede 'pi yatra tajjñānaṃ tāṃstathā pratipadyate // Pramāṇav_2.161 //
analyzed: bhede yatra tat jñānam tān tathā pratipadyate
jñānāni api tathā bhede bheda pratyavamarśane
iti a tad kārya viśleṣasya an bvayaḥ na eka vastunaḥ

original: vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tanniṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ /
analyzed: vastūnām vidyate tasmāt tad niṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ
bahya śakti vyavaccheda niṣṭha abhāve tad śrutiḥ
vikalpa pratibimbeṣu tad niṣṭheṣu nibadhyate
tatas nyā apoha niṣṭha tvāt uktā anya apoha kṛt śrutiḥ
vyatireki iva yat jñāne bhāti artha pratibimbakam

original: śabdāt tadapi nārthātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanodbhavā // Pramāṇav_2.165 //
analyzed: śabdāt tat api na artha ātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanā udbhavā
tasya abhidhāne śrutibhiḥ arthe koṃ śaḥ avagamyate

original: tasyāgato ca saṃketakriyā vyarthā tadarthikā // Pramāṇav_2.166 //
analyzed: ca saṃketa kriyā vyarthā tad arthikā
śabdaḥ rtha aṃśam kam āha iti tatra anya apohaḥ ucyate

original: ākāraḥ sa ca nārthe 'sti taṃ vadannarthabhāk katham // Pramāṇav_2.167 //
analyzed: ākāraḥ sa ca nā arthe sti tam vadan artha bhāj katham
śabdasya anvayinaḥ kāryam arthena anvayinā sa ca
ananvayī dhiyaḥ bhedāt darśana abhyāsa nirmitaḥ
tad rūpa āropa gatya anya vyāvṛtta adhigateḥ punar

original: śabdārtho 'rthaḥ sa eveti vacane na virudhyate // Pramāṇav_2.169 //
analyzed: śabda arthaḥ rthaḥ saḥ eva iti vacane na virudhyate
mithyā avabhāsinaḥ vā ete pratyayāḥ śabda nirmitāḥ
anuyānti imam artha āśam iti ca apoha kṛt śrutiḥ
tasmāt saṃketa kāle pi nirdiṣṭa arthena saṃyutaḥ
sva pratīti phalena anya apohaḥ sambadhyate śrutau
anyatra adṛṣṭi apekṣa tvāt kvacid tad dṛṣṭi apekṣaṇāt

original: śrutau sambadhyate 'poho naitad vastuni yujyate // Pramāṇav_2.172 //
analyzed: śrutau sambadhyate pohaḥ na etat vastuni yujyate

original: tasmād jātyāditadyogā nārthe teṣu ca na śrutiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt jāti ādi tad yogāḥ na arthe teṣu ca na śrutiḥ
saṃyujyate śabdānām eva yojanāt
saṃketa smaraṇa upāyam dṛṣṭa saṃkalana ātmakam
pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnye tat cākṣuṣe katham
anyatra gata cittaḥ pi cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate
tad saṃketa āgrahaḥ tatra spaṣṭaḥ tad jā ca kalpanā
jāyante kalpanāḥ tatra yatra śabdaḥ niveśitaḥ
tena icchātaḥ pravartteran na īkṣeran bāhyām akṣa jāḥ
rūpam rūpam iti īkṣeta tat dhiyam kim iti īkṣate

original: asti cānubhavastasyāḥ so 'vikalpaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.177 //
analyzed: asti ca anubhavaḥ tasyāḥ saḥ vikalpaḥ katham bhavet
tayā eva anubhave dṛṣṭam na viukalpa dvayam sakṛt
etena tulya kāla anya vijñāna anubhavaḥ gataḥ
smṛtiḥ bhavet atīte ca sā agṛhīte katham bhavet
syāt ca anya dhī pariccheda abhinna rūpā sva buddhi dhīḥ
atītam apadṛṣṭa abtam aliṅgam ca artha vedanam

original: siddhaṃ tatkena tasmin hi na pratyakṣaṃ na laiṅgikam // Pramāṇav_2.180 //
analyzed: siddham tat kena tasmin hi na pratyakṣam na laiṅgikam
tad svarūpa avabhāsinyā buddhayā anantarayā yadi

original: rūpādiriva gṛhyeta na syāt tatpūrvadhīgrahaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.181 //
analyzed: rūpa ādiḥ iva gṛhyeta na syāt tad pūrva dhī grahaḥ
saḥ vikalpaḥ sva viṣayaḥ vijñāna anubhavaḥ yathā
aśakya samayam tadvat anyat api avikalpakam
sāmānya vācinaḥ śabdāḥ tad eka arthā ca kalpanā
abhāve nirvikalpasya viśeṣa adhigamaḥ katham
asti ced nirvikalpam ca kiñcid tad tulya hetukam

original: sarva tathaiva hetorhi bhedād bhedaḥ phalātmanām // Pramāṇav_2.184 //
analyzed: tathā eva hetoḥ hi bhedāt bhedaḥ phala ātmanām
an apekṣita bāhya arthā yojanā samaya smṛteḥ
tathā an apekṣya samayam vastu śaktyā eva netra dhīḥ
saṃketa smaraṇa apekṣam rūpam yat yakṣa cetasi

original: anapekṣya na cecchaktaṃ syāt smṛtāveva liṃgavat // Pramāṇav_2.186 //
analyzed: an apekṣya na ced śaktam syāt smṛtau eva liṃga vat
tasyāḥ tad saṃgama utpatteḥ akṣa dhīḥ syāt smṛteḥ na vā

original: tataḥ kālāntare 'pi syāt kvacid vyākṣepasambhavāt // Pramāṇav_2.187 //
analyzed: tatas kāla antare pi syāt kvacid vyākṣepa sambhavāt
krameṇa ubhaya hetuḥ ced prāk eva syāt abhedataḥ
smṛtiḥ tatra api anarthikā
yathā samitā siddhi artham iṣyate samaya smṛtiḥ
bhedaḥ ca a samitaḥ grāhyaḥ smṛtiḥ tatra kimarthikā
sāmānya mātra grahaṇe bheda apekṣā na yujyate

original: tasmāccakṣuśca rūpaṃ ca pratītyodeti netradhīḥ // Pramāṇav_2.190 //
analyzed: tasmāt cakṣuḥ ca rūpam ca pratītya udeti netra dhīḥ
sākṣāt ca jñāna janane samarthaḥ

original: atha kasmād dvayādhīnajanma tat tena nocyate // Pramāṇav_2.191 //
analyzed: atha kasmāt dvaya adhīna janma tat tena nā ucyate
samīkṣya gamaka tvam hi vyapadeśaḥ niyujyate
tat ca akṣa vyapadeśe sti tad dharmaḥ ca niyojyatām
tatas liṃga svabhāvaḥ tra vyapadeśe niyojyatām
nivarttate vyāpakasya svabhāvasya nivṛttitaḥ

original: sañcitaḥ samudāyaḥ sa sāmānyaṃ tatra cākṣadhīḥ /
analyzed: sañcitaḥ samudāyaḥ sa sāmānyam tatra ca akṣadhīḥ
sāmānya buddhuḥ ca avaśyam vikalpena anubaddyate
artha antara abhisambandhāt jāyante ye ṇavaḥ pare

original: uktāste sañcitāste hi nimittaṃ jñānajanmanaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.195 //
analyzed: uktāḥ te sañcitāḥ te hi nimittam jñāna janmanaḥ
aṇū nām sa viśeṣaḥ ca na antareṇa apara naṇīn
tat eka aniyamat jñānam uktam sāmānya gocaram
atha eka āyatana tve pi na anekam dṛśyate sakṛt
sakṛt graha avabhāsaḥ ki viyukteṣu tila ādiṣu
prayuktam lāghavam ca atra teṣu eva krama pātiṣu
kim na ākrama grahaḥ tulya kālāḥ buddhayaḥ
kāścid tāsu akrama ābhāsāḥ parāḥ ca kim
sarva artha grahaṇe yam prasajyate

original: nai kaṃ citrapataṃgādi rūpaṃ vā dṛśyate katham /
analyzed: na e kam citra pataṃga ādi rūpam vā dṛśyate katham

original: citraṃ tadekāmiti cedidaṃ citrataraṃ tataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.200 //
analyzed: citram tat ekām iti ced idam citrataram tatas

original: naikasvabhāvaṃ citraṃ hi maṇirūpaṃ yathaiva tat /
analyzed: na eka svabhāvam citram hi maṇi rūpam yathā eva tat
nīla ādi pratibhāsaḥ ca tulyaḥ citra paṭa ādiṣu
tatra avayava rūpam ced kevalam dṛśyate tathā
nīla ādīni nirasya anyat citram citram yat īkṣase
tulya artha ākāra kāla tvena upalakṣita yar dvayoḥ
nānārthā kramavatī ekā kim eka arthā akramā aparā
vaiśvarūpyāt dhiyām eva bhāvānām viśva rūpa tā
tat ced anaṅga kena iyam siddhā bheda vyavasthitiḥ
vijātīnām anārambhāt ālekhya ādau na citra dhīḥ
arūpa tvāt na saṃyogaḥ citraḥ bhakteḥ ca na āśrayaḥ
pratyekam avicitra tvāt gṛhīteṣu krameṇa ca
na citra dhī saṅkalanam anekasya ekayā agrahāt
nānārthā ekā bhavet tasmāt pi avikalpikā
vikalpayan ekam artha yatas paśyati
yadi eka tvam na yujyate

original: saiva tāvat kathaṃ buddhirekā citrāvabhāsinī // Pramāṇav_2.208 //
analyzed: sā eva tāvat katham buddhiḥ ekā citra avabhāsinī
idam vastu bala āyātam yat vadanti vipaścitaḥ

original: yathā yathārthāścintyante viśīryante tathā tathā // Pramāṇav_2.209 //
analyzed: yathā yathā arthāḥ cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā

original: kiṃ syāt sā citrataikasyām na syāt tasyāṃ matāvapi /
analyzed: kim syāt sā citra tā ekasyām na syāt tasyām matau api

original: yadīdaṃ svayamarthānāṃ rocate tatra ke vayam // Pramāṇav_2.210 //
analyzed: yadi idam svayam arthānām rocate tatra ke vayam
tasmāt nā artheṣu na jñāne sthūla ābhāsaḥ tad ātmanaḥ

original: ekatra pratiṣiddhitvād bahuṣvapi na sambhavaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.211 //
analyzed: ekatra pratiṣiddhi tvāt bahuṣu api na sambhavaḥ
paricchedaḥ ntar anyaḥ yam bhāgaḥ bahis iva sthitaḥ

original: jñānasyābhedinau bhinnau pratibhāso h yupaplavaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.212 //
analyzed: jñānasya abhedinau bhinnau pratibhāsaḥ
tatra ekasya api abhāvena dvayam api avahīyate

original: tasmāt tadeva tasyāpi tattvaṃ yā dvayaśūnyatā // Pramāṇav_2.213 //
analyzed: tasmāt tat eva tasya api tattvam yā dvaya śūnyatā
tad bheda āśrayiṇī ca iyam bhāvānām bheda saṃsthitiḥ
ca teṣām
na grāhya grāhaka ākāra bāhyam asti ca lakṣaṇam
atas lakṣaṇa śūnya tvāt niḥsvabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ
vyāpāra upadhikam sarva skandha ādīnām viśeṣataḥ

original: lakṣaṇaṃ sa ca tattvaṃ na tenāpyete vilakṣaṇāḥ // Pramāṇav_2.216 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam sa ca tattvam na tena api ete vilakṣaṇāḥ
yathāsvam pratyaya apekṣāt avidyā upapluta ātmanām
vijñaptiḥ vitatha ākārā jāyate timira divat
ca sā sarva apara darśanaiḥ
asambhavāt vinā teṣām grāhya grāhaka viplavaiḥ
tad upekṣita tattva arthaiḥ kṛtvā gaja nimīlanam
kevalam loka buddhyā eva bāhya cintā pratanyate
nīla ādiḥ citra vijñāne jñāna upādhiḥ an anya bhāj

original: aśakyadarśanaḥ taṃ hi patatyarthe vivecayan // Pramāṇav_2.220 //
analyzed: aśakya darśanaḥ tam hi patati arthe vivecayan

original: yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathaiva prakāśate /
analyzed: yat yathā bhāsate jñānam tat tathā eva prakāśate
iti nāma eka bhāvaḥ syāt citra ākārasya cetasi
paṭa ādi rūpasya eka tve tathā syāt aviveki tā

original: vivekīni nirasyānyadā viveki ca nekṣate // Pramāṇav_2.222 //
analyzed: vivekīni nirasya anyadā viveki ca na īkṣate

original: ko vā virodho bahavaḥ sañjātātiśayāḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: kaḥ vā virodhaḥ bahavaḥ sañjāta atiśayāḥ pṛthak
bhaveyuḥ kāraṇam buddheḥ yadi na ātma indriya ādi vat

original: hetubhāvād ṛte nānyā grāhyatā nāma kācana /
analyzed: hetu bhāvāt ṛte nā anyā grāhya tā nāma kācana
tatra buddhiḥ yad ākārā tasyāḥ tat grāhyam ucyate

original: kathaṃ vāvayavī grāhyā sakṛt svāvayavaiḥ saha /
analyzed: katham vā avayavī grāhyā sakṛt sva avayavaiḥ saha

original: na hi gopratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ sāsnādīnāmadarśane // Pramāṇav_2.225 //
analyzed: na hi go pratyayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sāsnā ādīnām adarśane
guṇa pradhāna adhigamaḥ saha api abhimataḥ yadi

original: sampūrṇāṅgo na gṛhyeta sakṛnnāpi guṇādimān // Pramāṇav_2.226 //
analyzed: sampūrṇa aṅgaḥ na gṛhyeta sakṛt nā api guṇa ādimān
vivakṣā paratantra tvāt

original: yadṅgabhāvenopāttaṃ tat tenaiva hi gṛhyate // Pramāṇav_2.227 //
analyzed: yat ṅga bhāvena upāttam tat tena eva hi gṛhyate
svatas vastu antara abhedāt guṇa ādeḥ bhedakasya ca
agrahāt ekabuddhiḥ syāt paśyataḥ para aparam
guṇa ādi bheda graṇāt nānātva pratipad yadi

original: astu nāma tathāpyeṣāṃ bhavet sambandhisaṅkaraḥ // Pramāṇav_2.229 //
analyzed: astu nāma tathā api eṣām bhavet sambandhi saṅkaraḥ
śabda ādīnām aneka tvāt siddhaḥ na eka grahaḥ sakṛt
sanniveśa graha ayogāt agrahe sanniveśinām
sarvatas vinivṛttasya vinivṛttiḥ yatas yatas
tad bheda unnīta bhedā sā dharmiṇaḥ na eka rūpa tā
te kalpitāḥ rūpa bhedāt nirvikalpasya cetasaḥ

original: na vicitrasya citrābhāḥ kādācitkasya gocaraḥ // Pramāṇav_2.232 //
analyzed: na vicitrasya citra ābhāḥ kādācitkasya gocaraḥ
yadi api asti sita tva ādi yādṛś indriya gocaraḥ
na saḥ abhidhīyate śabdaiḥ jānayoḥ rūpa bhedataḥ
eka artha tve pi buddhīnām nānā āśraya tayā sa ced
śrotra ādi cittāni idānīm bhinna arthāni iti tat kutas
jātaḥ nāma āśrayaḥ nyaḥ nyaḥ cetasām tasya vastunaḥ

original: ekasyaiva kuto rūpaṃ bhinnākārāvabhāsi tat // Pramāṇav_2.235 //
analyzed: ekasya eva kutas rūpam bhinna ākāra avabhāsi tat
vṛtteḥ dṛ śya parāmarśena abhidhāna vikalpayoḥ
darśanāt pratyabhijñānam gavā ādīnām nivāritam
anvayāt ca anumānam yat abhidhāna vikalpayoḥ
dṛśye gavādau jāti ādeḥ tat api etena dūṣitam
darśanāni eva bhinnāni api ekām kurvanti kalpanām
pratyabhijñāna saṃkhyātām svabhāvena iti varṇitam
pūrva anubhūta grahaṇe mānasasya apramāṇa tā
adṛṣṭa grahaṇe ndha ādeḥ api syāt artha darśanam
kṣaṇaka tvāt atītasya darśanasya na sambhavaḥ
vācyam akṣaṇika tve syāt lakṣaṇam sa viśeṣaṇam
niṣpādita kriye kañcid viśeṣam a samādadhat
karmaṇi aindriyam anyat vā sādhanam kim iti iṣyate
sakṛt bhāvaḥ ca sarvāsām dhiyām tad bhāva janmanām
anyaiḥ akārya bhedasya tad apekṣā virodhataḥ
tasmāt indriya vijñāna anantara pratyaya udbhavam

original: mano 'nyameva gṛhṇāti viṣayaṃ nāndhadṛk tataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.243 //
analyzed: manaḥ gṛhṇāti viṣayam na andha dṛś tatas
svārtha anvaya artha apekṣā eva hetuḥ indriya jā matiḥ
tatas niyata grāhya tā matā
tad atulya kriyā kālaḥ katham sva jñāna kālikaḥ
sahakārī bhavet arthaḥ iti ced akṣa cetasaḥ
asataḥ prāk asāmarthyāt paścāt ca anupayogataḥ

original: prāgbhāvaḥ sarvahetūnāṃ nāti 'rtha svadhiyā saha // Pramāṇav_2.246 //
analyzed: prāc bhāvaḥ sarva hetūnām na ati sva dhiyā saha

original: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti ced grāhyātāṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: bhinna kālam katham grāhyam iti ced grāhyātām viduḥ
hetu tvam eva yukti jñāḥ jñāna ākāra arpaṇa kṣamam
kārya hi aneka hetu tve pi anukurvat udeti yat

original: tat tenāpyatra tadrūpaṃ gṛhītamiti cocyate // Pramāṇav_2.248 //
analyzed: tat tena api atra tat rūpam gṛhītam iti ca ucyate
aśakya samayaḥ hi ātmā rāga ādīnām anna nya bhāj
teṣām atas sva saṃvittiḥ na abhijalpa anuṣaṅgiṇī

original: avedakāḥ parasyāpi te svarūpaṃ kathaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: avedakāḥ parasya api te svarūpam katham viduḥ
eka artha āśrayiṇā vedyāḥ vijñānena iti kecana
tad a tad rū piṇaḥ bhāvāḥ tad a tad rū pa hetu jāḥ
tat sukha ādi kim ajñānam vijñāna abhinna hetu jam
sa arthe sati indriye yogye yathāsvam api cetasi

original: dṛṣṭaṃ janma sukhādīnāṃ tat tulyaṃ manasāmapi // Pramāṇav_2.252 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam janma sukha ādīnām tat tulyam manasām api

original: asatsu satsu caiteṣu na janmājanma vā kvacit /
analyzed: asatsu satsu ca eteṣu na janma ajanma vā kvacid

original: dṛṣṭaṃ sukhāderbuddhervā tat tato nānyaśca te // Pramāṇav_2.253 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam sukha ādeḥ buddheḥ vā tat tatas na anyaḥ ca te
sukha duḥkha ādi bhedaḥ ca tesām eva viśeṣataḥ
tasyāḥ eva yathā buddheḥ māndya pāṭava saṃśrayāḥ
yasya arthasya nipātena te jātāḥ dhī sukha ādayaḥ

original: multvā taṃ pratipadyeta sukhādīneva sā kathan // Pramāṇav_2.255 //
analyzed: tam pratipadyeta sukha ādīn eva sā
avicchinnā na bhāseta tad saṃvittiḥ krama grahe
tad lāghavāt ced tad tulyam iti asaṃvedanam na kim
na ca ekayā dvaya jñānam niyamāt akṣa cetasaḥ
sukha ādi abhāve pi arthāt ca jāteḥ tad śakti asiddhitaḥ

original: pṛthak pṛthak ca sāmarthye dvayornīlādivat sukham /
analyzed: pṛthak pṛthak ca sāmarthye dvayoḥ nīla ādi vat sukham
gṛhyeta kevalam tasya tad hetu artham agṛhṇataḥ

original: na hi saṃvedanaṃ yuktam arthenaiva saha grahe /
analyzed: na hi saṃvedanam yuktam arthena eva saha grahe

original: kiṃ sāmarthya sukhādīnāṃ neṣṭā dhīryat tadudbhavā // Pramāṇav_2.259 //
analyzed: kim sukha ādīnām na iṣṭā dhīḥ yat tad udbhavā
vinā arthena sukha ādīnām vedane cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ

original: rūpādiḥ stryādibhedo 'kṣraṇā na gṛhyeta kadācana // Pramāṇav_2.260 //
analyzed: rūpa ādiḥ kṣraṇā na gṛhyeta kadācana
na hi sati antaraṅge rthe śakte dhīḥ bāhya darśanī
artha grahe sukha ādīnām tad jānām syāt avedanam
dhiyoḥ yu gapat utpattau tad tad viṣaya sambhavāt
sukha duḥkha vidau syātām sakṛt arthasya sambhave
satya antare pi upādāne jñāne duḥkha ādi sambhavaḥ
na upādānam viruddhasya tat ca ekam iti ced matam
tat ajñānasya vijñānam kena upādānakāraṇam

original: ādhipatyaṃ tu kurvīta tadvirudve 'pi dṛśyate // Pramāṇav_2.264 //
analyzed: ādhipatyam tu kurvīta tad virudve pi dṛśyate
akṣraṇoḥ yathā ekaḥ ālokaḥ naktañcara tad anyayoḥ
rūpa darśana vaiguṇya avaiguṇye kurute sakṛt
tasmāt sukha ādayaḥ rthānām sva saṃkrānta avabhāsinām
vedakāḥ sva ātmanaḥ ca eṣām arthebhyaḥ janma kevalam
artha ātmā svātma bhūtaḥ hi teṣām taiḥ anubhūyate
tena artha anubhava khyātiḥ ālambaḥ tu tad ābha tā
kaścid bahis sthitān eva sukha ādīn apracetanān

original: grāhyānāha na tasyāpi sakṛd yukto dvayagrahaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.268 //
analyzed: grāhyān āha na tasya api sakṛt yuktaḥ dvaya grahaḥ
sukha ādi abhinna rūpa tvāt nīla ādeḥ ced sakṛt grahaḥ
bhinna avabhāsinoḥ grāhyam cetasoḥ tat abhedi kim
tasya aviśeṣe bāhyasya bhāvanā tāratamyataḥ
tāratamyam ca buddhau syāt na prīti paritāpayoḥ
sukha ādi ātma tayā buddheḥ api yadī avirodhi tā

original: sa idānīṃ kathaṃ bāhyāḥ sukhādyātmeti gamyate // Pramāṇav_2.271 //
analyzed: saḥ idānīm katham bāhyāḥ sukha ādi ātmā iti gamyate
agrāhya grāhaka tvāt ced bhinna jātīyayoḥ pumān

original: agrāhakaḥ syāt sarvasya tato hīyeta bhoktṛtā // Pramāṇav_2.272 //
analyzed: agrāhakaḥ syāt sarvasya tatas hīyeta bhoktṛ tā
kārya kāraṇa tā anena pratyuktā akārya kāraṇe
grāhya grāhaka tā bhāvāt bhāve nyatra api sā bhavet

original: tasmāt ta āntarā eva saṃvedyatvācca cetanāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt te āntarāḥ eva saṃvedya tvāt ca cetanāḥ

original: saṃvedanaṃ na yad rūpaṃ na hi tat tasya vedanam // Pramāṇav_2.274 //
analyzed: saṃvedanam na yat rūpam na hi tat tasya vedanam
atatsvabhāvaḥ nubhavaḥ baiddhān tān san avaiti ced
muktvā adhyakṣa smṛta ākārām saṃvitim buddhiḥ atra kā
tān tān arthān upādāya sukha duḥkha ādi vedanam

original: ekamāvirbhavad dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tvanyadantarā // Pramāṇav_2.276 //
analyzed: ekam āvirbhavat dṛṣṭam na dṛṣṭam tu anyat antarā
saṃsargāt avibhāgaḥ ced ayaḥ golaka vat ni vat
bheda abheda vyavasthā evam ucchinnā sarva vastuṣu
abhinna vedanasya aikyam yat nā evam tat vibheda vat
sidhyet asādhana tve sya na siddham bheda sādhanam
bhinna ābhaḥ sita duḥkha ādiḥ abhinnaḥ bhuddhi vedane

original: abhinnābhe vibhinne ced bhedābhedau kimāśrayau // Pramāṇav_2.279 //
analyzed: a bhinna ābhe vibhinne ced bheda abhedau kimāśrayau
tiraskṛtānām paṭunā api ekadā bheda darśanāt
pravāhe vitti bhedānām siddhā bheda vyavasthitiḥ

original: prāguktaṃ yogināṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhāvanāmayam /
analyzed: prāk uktam yoginām jñānam teṣām tat bhāvanā mayam
vidhūta kalpanā jālam spaṣṭam evā avabhāsate
kāma śoka bhaya unmāda caura svapna ādi upaplutāḥ
abhūtān api paśyanti puratas vasthitān iva
na vikalpa anubaddhasya asti

original: svapne 'pi smaryate smārta na ca tat tādṛgarthavat // Pramāṇav_2.283 //
analyzed: svapne smaryate smārta na ca tat tādṛś arthavat
aśubhā varṇyate
spaṣṭa ābham nirvikalpam ca
tasmāt bhūtam abhūtam vā yat yat eva atibhāvyate
bhāvanā pariniṣpattau tat sfuṭa a kalpa dhī phalam

original: tatra pramāṇaṃ saṃvādi yat prāṅ nirṇītavastuvat /
analyzed: tatra pramāṇam saṃvādi yat prāk nirṇīta vastu vat

original: tad bhāvānājaṃ pratyakṣamiṣṭam śeṣā upaplavāḥ // Pramāṇav_2.286 //
analyzed: tat bhāvānājam pratyakṣam iṣṭam śeṣāḥ upaplavāḥ

original: śabdārthagrāhi yad yatra tajjñānaṃ tatra kalpanā /
analyzed: śabda artha grāhi yat yatra tat jñānam tatra kalpanā
svarūpam ca na śabda arthaḥ tatra adhyakṣam atas khilam
trividham kalpam ājñānam āśraya upaplava udbhavam
ca pratyakṣa ābham caturvidham
an akṣa ja tva siddhi artham ukte dve bhrānti darśanāt
siddha anumā ādi vacanam sādhanāya eva pūrvayoḥ
saṃketa saṃśraya anya artha samāropa vikalpe
na pratyakṣa anuvṛtti tvāt kadācid bhrānti kāraṇam
yathā evā iyam parokṣa artha kalpanā smaraṇa ātmikā
pratyakṣam adhyavasāya api
tathā anubhūta smaraṇam antareṇa ghaṭa ādiṣu
na pratyayaḥ nuyan tat ca pratyakṣāt parihīyate
apavādaḥ caturthaḥ tra tena uktam upaghāta jam
kevalam tatra timiram upaghāta upalakṣaṇam
mānasam tat api iti eke teṣām granthaḥ virudhyate
nīla dvi candra ādi dhiyām hetuḥ akṣāṇi api iti ayam
pāramparyeṇa hetuḥ ced indriya jñāna gocare
vicāryamāṇe prastāvaḥ mānasasya iha kīdṛśaḥ
ki vā aindriyam yat akṣāṇām bhāva abhāva anurodhi ced

original: tat tulyaṃ vikriyāvaccet saiveyaṃ kiṃ niṣidhyate // Pramāṇav_2.296 //
analyzed: tat tulyam vikriyāvat ced sā evā iyam kim niṣidhyate
sarpa ādi bhrānti vat ca asyāḥ syāt akṣa vikṛtau api
nivṛttiḥ na nivarteta nivṛtte pi akṣa viplave
kadācid anya santāne tathā eva arpyeta vācakaiḥ
dṛṣṭa smṛtim apekṣeta na bhāseta parisfuṭam

original: suptasya jāgrato vāpi yaiva dhīḥ sphuṭabhāsinī /
analyzed: suptasya jāgrataḥ vā api yā eva dhīḥ sphuṭa bhāsinī
sā nirvikalpā ubhayathā api anyathā eva vikalpikā
tasmāt tasya avikalpe pi prāmāṇyam pratiṣidhyate

original: visaṃvādāt tadartha ca pratyakṣābhaṃ dvidhoditam // Pramāṇav_2.300 //
