analyzed: visaṃvādāt tad artha ca pratyakṣa ābham dvidhā uditam
kriyā sādhanam iti eva sarva sarvasya karmaṇaḥ

original: sādhanaṃ na hi tasya sādhanaṃ yā kriyā yataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.301 //
analyzed: sādhanam na hi tasya sādhanam yā kriyā yatas
tatra anubhava mātreṇa jñānasya sadṛśa ātmanaḥ

original: bhāvyaṃ tenātnamā yena pratikarma vibhajyate // Pramāṇav_2.302 //
analyzed: bhāvyam yena pratikarma vibhajyate
anātma bhūtaḥ bhedaḥ sya vidyamānaḥ pi hetuṣu

original: bhinne karmaṇyabhinnasya na bhedena niyāmakaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.303 //
analyzed: bhinne karmaṇi abhinnasya na bhedena niyāmakaḥ
tasmāt yatas syā ātma bhedāt asya adhigatiḥ iti ayam

original: kriyāyāḥ karmaniyamaḥ siddhā sā tatprasādhanā // Pramāṇav_2.304 //

analyzed: arthena ghaṭayati enām na hi muktvā artha rūpa tām
anyaḥ sva bhedāt jñānasya bhedakaḥ kathañcana
tasmāt prameya adhigateḥ sādhanam meya rūpa tā
sādhane nyatra tad karma sambandhaḥ na

original: sā ca tasyātmabhūtaiva tena nārthāntaraṃ phalam /
analyzed: sā ca tasya ātma bhūtā eva tena na artha antaram phalam
dadhānam tat ca tām ātmani artha adhigamana ātmanā
sa vyāpāram iva ābhāti vyāpāreṇa sva karmaṇi
tad vaśāt tad avyavasthānāt akārakam api svayam
yathā phalasya hetūnām sadṛśa ātma tayā udbhavāt
hetu rūpa grahaḥ loke kriyāvat tve pi kathyate
ālocanā akṣa sambandha viśeṣaṇa dhiyām atas

original: neṣṭaṃ prāmāṇyameteṣāṃ vyavadhānāt kriyāṃ prati // Pramāṇav_2.310 //
analyzed: na iṣṭam prāmāṇyam eteṣām vyavadhānāt kriyām prati
sarveṣām upayoge pi kārakāṇām kriyām prati

original: yadantyaṃ bhedakaṃ tasyāstat sādhakatamaṃ matam // Pramāṇav_2.311 //
analyzed: yat antyam bhedakam tasyāḥ tat sādhakatamam matam
sarva sāmānya hetu tva asakṣāṇām asti nā īdṛśam
tad bhede pi hi a tad rūpasya asya idam iti tat kutas
etena śeṣam vyākhyātam viśeṣaṇa dhiyām punar

original: atādrū pye na bhedo 'pi tadvadanyadhiyo 'pi vā // Pramāṇav_2.313 //
analyzed: na vā
na iṣṭaḥ kriyā sādhanayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: ekārthatve dvayaṃ vyartha na ca syāt kramabhāvitā // Pramāṇav_2.314 //
analyzed: eka artha tve dvayam na ca syāt krama bhāvi tā
sādhya sādhana tā bhāvaḥ sakṛdbhāve śayoḥ
tad vyavasthā āśraya tvena sādhya sādhana saṃsthitiḥ
sarva ātmanā api sambaddham kaiścid eva avagamyate

original: dharmeḥ sa niyamo na syāt sambandhasyāviśeṣataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.316 //
analyzed: sa niyamaḥ na syāt sambandhasya aviśeṣataḥ
tad abhede pi bhedaḥ yam yasmāt tasya pramāṇa tā
saṃskārāt ced a tādrūpye na tasya api a vyavasthiteḥ
kriyā karaṇayoḥ aikya virodhaḥ iti ced asat
dharma bheda abhyupagamāt vastu abhinnam iti iṣyate
evamprakārā sarvā eva kriyā kāraka saṃsthitiḥ
bhāvasya bhinna anabhimateṣu api āropeṇa vṛttitaḥ
kārtha saṃvid yat evā idam pratyekṣam prativedanam

original: tadarthavedanaṃ kena tādrū pyād vyabhicāri tat // Pramāṇav_2.320 //
analyzed: tad artha vedanam kena tādrū pyāt vyabhicāri tat
atha saḥ nubhavaḥ kva asya tat evā idam vicāryate

original: sarūpayanti tat kena sthūlābhāsaṃ ca te 'ṇavaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.321 //
analyzed: sarūpayanti tat kena sthūla ābhāsam ca te ṇavaḥ
tat nā artha rūpa tā tasya satyām sā vyabhicāriṇī
tad saṃvedana bhāvasya na samarthā prasādhane
tad sārūpya tad utpattī yadi saṃvedya lakṣaṇam

original: saṃvedya syāt samānārtha vijñānaṃ samanantaram // Pramāṇav_2.323 //
analyzed: saṃvedya syāt samāna artha vijñānam samanantaram

original: idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vedam iti yatrāvasāyadhīḥ /
analyzed: idam dṛṣṭam śrutam vedam iti yatra avasāya dhīḥ
na tasya anubhavaḥ sā eva pratyāsattiḥ vicāryate
dṛśya darśanayoḥ yena tasya tat darśanam matam
tayoḥ sambandham āśritya draṣṭuḥ eṣa viniścayaḥ

original: ātmā sa tasyānubhavaḥ s ca nānyasya kasyacit /
analyzed: ātmā sa tasya anubhavaḥ ca na anyasya kasyacid
pratyakṣa prativedya tvam api tasya tad ātma tā
na anyaḥ nubhāvyaḥ tena asti tasya paraḥ

original: tasyāpi tulyacodyatvāt svayaṃ saiva prakāśate // Pramāṇav_2.327 //
analyzed: tasya api tulya codya tvāt svayam sā eva prakāśate
nīla ādi rūpaḥ tasya asau svabhāvaḥ nubhavaḥ ca saḥ
nīla ādi anubhavāt khyātaḥ svarūpa anubhavaḥ san
prakāśamānaḥ tādātmyāt svarūpasya prakāśakaḥ
yathā prakāśaḥ bhimataḥ tathā dhīra ātma vedinī
tasyāḥ ca artha antare vedye durghaṭau vedya vedakau
avedya vedaka ākārā yathā bhrāntaiḥ nirīkṣyate
vibhakta lakṣaṇa grāhya grāhaka ākāra viplavā
tathā kṛta vyavastheyam keśa ādi jñāna bheda vat
yadā tadā na sañcodya grāhya grāhaka lakṣaṇā
tadā anya saṃvidaḥ bhāvāt sva saṃvid phalam iṣyate

original: yadi bahyo 'nubhūyeta ko doṣo naiva kaścana /
analyzed: yadi bahyaḥ nubhūyeta kaḥ doṣaḥ nā eva kaścana

original: idameva kimuktaṃ syāt sa bāhyo 'rtho 'nubhūyate // Pramāṇav_2.333 //
analyzed: idam eva kim uktam syāt sa bāhyaḥ rthaḥ nubhūyate
yadi buddhiḥ tad ākārā sā asti ākāra viśeṣiṇī
sā bāhyāt anyatas vā iti vicāram idam arhati
darśana upādhi rahitasya agrahāt tad grahe grahāt

original: darśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsaṃ nārtho bāhyo 'sti kevalam // Pramāṇav_2.335 //
analyzed: darśanam nīla nirbhāsam na arthaḥ sti kevalam
kasyacid kiñcid eva antar vāsanāyāḥ prabodhakam

original: tato dhiyāṃ viniyamo na bāhyārthavyapekṣayā // Pramāṇav_2.336 //
analyzed: tatas dhiyām viniyamaḥ na bāhya artha vyapekṣayā
tasmāt dvi rūpam asti ekam yat evam anubhūyate
smaryate ca ubhaya ākārasya asya saṃvedanam phalam
yadā vā paraḥ
vijñapti hetuḥ viṣayaḥ tasyāḥ ca anubhavaḥ tathā

original: tadā ya ātmānubhavaḥ sa evārthaviniścayaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.339 //
analyzed: tadā yaḥ ātmā anubhavaḥ saḥ eva artha viniścayaḥ
yadi iṣṭa ākāraḥ ātmā syāt anyathā vā anubhūyate

original: iṣṭo 'niṣṭo 'pi vā tena bhavatyarthaḥ praveditaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.340 //
analyzed: vā tena bhavati arthaḥ praveditaḥ
vidyamāne bāhye rthe yathānubhavam eva saḥ
niścita ātmā sva rūpeṇa na aneka ātma tva doṣataḥ

original: yadi bāhyaṃ na vidyeta ksya saṃvedanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: yadi bāhyam na vidyeta saṃvedanam bhavet

original: yadyagatyā svarūpasya bāhyasyaiva na kiṃ matam // Pramāṇav_2.342 //
analyzed: yadi agatyā svarūpasya bāhyasya eva na kim matam
abhyupāye pi bhedena na syāt anubhavaḥ dvayoḥ

original: adṛṣṭāvaraṇāt syāt cenna nāmārthāvaśo gatiḥ // Pramāṇav_2.343 //
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa āvaraṇāt syāt ced na nāma artha avaśaḥ gatiḥ
tam aneka ātmakam bhāvam eka ātma tvena darśayat

original: tadadṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ nāma bhavedarthasya darśakam // Pramāṇav_2.344 //
analyzed: tat adṛṣṭam katham nāma bhavet arthasya darśakam
iṣṭa aniṣṭa avabhāsinyaḥ kalpanāḥ nā akṣadhīḥ yadi
aniṣṭa ādau asandhānam dṛṣṭam tatra api cetasām

original: tasmāt prameye bāhye 'pi yuktaṃ svānubhavaḥ phalam /
analyzed: tasmāt prameye bāhye yuktam sva anubhavaḥ phalam
yatas svabhāvaḥ sya yathā tathā eva artha viniścayaḥ
tad artha ābhāsa tā eva asya pramāṇam na tu san api
grāhaka ātmā apara artha tvāt
yasmāt yathā niviṣṭaḥ saḥ artha ātmā pratyaye tathā
niścīyate niviṣṭaḥ sau evam iti ātma saṃvidaḥ
iti artha saṃvid sā eva iṣṭā yatas rtha ātmā na dṛśyate

original: tasmād buddhiniveśyārthaḥ sādhanaṃ tasya sā kriyā // Pramāṇav_2.349 //
analyzed: tasmāt buddhi niveśya arthaḥ sādhanam tasya sā kriyā

original: yathā niviśate so 'rtho yataḥ sā prathate tathā /
analyzed: yathā niviśate saḥ ṛthaḥ yatas sā prathate tathā
artha sthiteḥ tad ātma tvāt sva vid api artha vid matā
tasmāt na sva saṃvedanam phalam
uktam svabhāva cintāyām tādātmyāt artha saṃvidaḥ
tathā avabhāsamānasya vā
jñānasya hetuḥ arthaḥ pīti arthasya iṣṭā prameya tā
yathā kathañcid tasya artha rūpam muktvā avabhāsinaḥ

original: arthagrahaḥ katham satyaṃ na jāne 'hamapīdṛśam // Pramāṇav_2.353 //
analyzed: artha grahaḥ katham satyam na jāne ham api īdṛśam
avibhāgaḥ pi
grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bhedavān iva lakṣyate
mantra ādi u papluta akṣāṇām yathā mṛd śakala ādayaḥ
anyathā eva avabhāsante tad rūpa rahitāḥ api
tathā eva darśanāt teṣām an upapluta cakṣuṣā

original: dūre yathā vā maruṣu mahānalpo 'pi dṛśyate // Pramāṇav_2.356 //
analyzed: dūre yathā vā maruṣu mahān alpaḥ dṛśyate
yathā anudarhsanam ca iyam meya māna phala sthitiḥ
kriyate vidyamānā api grāhya grāhaka saṃvidām
anyathā ekasya bhāvasya nānā rūpa avabhāsinaḥ
satyam katham syuḥ ākārāḥ tad ekatvasya hānitaḥ
anyasya anya tva hāneḥ ca na abhedaḥ rūpa darśanāt

original: rūpābhedaṃ ca paśyanto dhīrabhedaṃ vyavasyati // Pramāṇav_2.359 //
analyzed: rūpa abhedam ca paśyantaḥ dhīra bhedam vyavasyati

original: bhāvā yena nirūpyante tadrūpaṃ nāsti tattvataḥ /
analyzed: bhāvāḥ yena nirūpyante tat rūpam nā asti tattvataḥ

original: yasmādekamanekaṃ ca rūpaṃ teṣāṃ na vidyate // Pramāṇav_2.360 //
analyzed: yasmāt ekam anekam ca rūpam teṣām na vidyate
sādharmya darśanāt loke bhrāntiḥ nāma upajāyate
a tad ātmani tādātmya vyavasāyena na iha tat
adarśanāt jagati asmin ekasya api tad ātmanaḥ
asti iyam api yā tu antar upaplava samudbhavā
doṣa udbhavā prakṛtyā sā vitatha pratibhāsinī
an apekṣita sādharmya dṛś ādiḥ taimira ādi vat
tatra buddheḥ paricchedaḥ grāhaka ākāra sammataḥ

original: tādātmyādātmavit tasya sa tasya sādhanaṃ tataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.364 //
analyzed: tādātmyāt ātma vid tasya sa tasya sādhanam tatas
tatra ātma viṣaye māne yathā rāga ādi vedanam
iyam sarvatra saṃyojyā māna meya phala sthitiḥ
tatra api anubhava ātma tvāt te yogyā sva ātma saṃvidi

original: iti sā yogyatā mānamātmā meyaḥ phalaṃ svavit // Pramāṇav_2.366 //
analyzed: iti sā yogyatā mānam ātmā meyaḥ phalam sva vid
grāhaka ākāra saṃkhyā tā pariccheda ātma tā ātmani

original: sā yogyateti ca proktaṃ pramāṇaṃ svātmavedanam // Pramāṇav_2.367 //
analyzed: sā yogyatā iti ca proktam pramāṇam sva ātma vedanam
sarvam eva hi vijñānam viṣayebhyaḥ samudbhavat
tad anyā asya api hetu tve kathañcid viṣaya ākṛti
yathā eva āhāra kāla ādeḥ hetu tve patya janmani
pitroḥ tat ekasya ākāram dhatte na anyasya kasyacid
tad hetu tvena tulye tad anyaiḥ viṣaye matam

original: viṣayatvaṃ tadaṃśena tadabhāve na tad bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.370 //
analyzed: viṣaya tvam tad aṃśena tad abhāve na tat bhavet
anartha ākāra śaṅkā syāt api arthavati cetasi
atīta artha grahe siddhe dvi rūpa tva ātma vedane
nīla ādi ābhāsa bhedi tvāt na arthaḥ jātiḥ ādvatī

original: sā cānityā na jātiḥ syānnityā cā janikā katham // Pramāṇav_2.372 //
analyzed: sā ca anityā na jātiḥ syāt nityā janikā katham
nāma ādikam niṣiddham prāk na ayam arthavatām kramaḥ
icchā mātra anurodhi tvāt artha śaktiḥ na sidhyati
smṛtiḥ ca īdṛgvidham jñānam tasyāḥ ca anubhavāt bhavaḥ

original: sa cārthākārarahitaḥ sedānīṃ tadvatī katham // Pramāṇav_2.374 //
analyzed: sa ca artha ākāra rahitaḥ sā idānīm tadvatī katham
na arthāt bhāvaḥ tadā abhāvāt syāt tathā anubhave saḥ

original: ākāraḥ sa ca nārthasya spaṣṭakāravivekataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.375 //
analyzed: ākāraḥ sa ca nā arthasya spaṣṭa kāra vivekataḥ
vyatiriktam tad ākāram pratīyāt aparaḥ tadā

original: nityamātmani sambandhe pratīyāt kathitaṃ ca na // Pramāṇav_2.376 //
analyzed: nityam ātmani sambandhe pratīyāt kathitam ca na
ekaikena abhisambandhe pratisandhiḥ na yujyate
eka artha abhiniveśa ātmā pravaktṛ śrotṛ cetasoḥ
tad eka vyavahāraḥ ced sādṛśyāt a tad ābhayoḥ
bhinna ātma artha katham grāhyaḥ tadā syāt dhīḥ anarthikā
tat ca anubhava vijñānena ubhaya aṃśa avalambinā
eka ākāra viśeṣeṇa tat jñānena anubadhyate
anyathā hi a tathārūpam katham jñāne dhirohati

original: ekākārottaraṃ jñānaṃ tathā h yuktaramuktaram // Pramāṇav_2.380 //
analyzed: eka ākāra uttaram jñānam tathā h yuktaram uktaram
tasya artha rūpeṇa ākārau ātma ākāraḥ ca kaścana

original: dvitīyasya tṛtīyena jñānena hi vivicyate // Pramāṇav_2.381 //
analyzed: dvitīyasya tṛtīyena jñānena hi vivicyate
artha kārya tayā jñāna smṛtau artha smṛteḥ yadi

original: bhrāntyā saṅkalanaṃ jyotirmanaskāre ca sā bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.382 //
analyzed: bhrāntyā saṅkalanam jyotiḥ manaskāre ca sā bhavet

original: sarveṣāmapi kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaiḥ syāt tathā grahaḥ /
analyzed: sarveṣām api kāryāṇām kāraṇaiḥ syāt tathā grahaḥ
kulāla ādi vivekena na smaryeta ghaṭaḥ tatas
yasmāt atiśayāt jñānam artha saṃsarga bhājanam

original: sārūpyāttat kimanyat syād dṛṣṭeśca yamalādiṣu // Pramāṇav_2.384 //
analyzed: sārūpyāt tat kim anyat syāt dṛṣṭeḥ ca yamalā ādiṣu
ādya anubhaya rūpa tve hi e ka rūpe vyavasthitam
dvitīyam vyatiricyet na parāmarśa cetasā
artha saṃkalana āśleṣā ṃdhīḥ dvitīyā avalambate
nīla ādi rūpeṇa dhiyam bhāsamānām puras tatas
anyathā yā ādyam eva ekam saṃyojyeta artha sambhavāt
jñānam na dṛṣṭa sambandham pūrva arthena uttarottaram
sakṛt saṃvedyamānasya niyamena dhiyā saha
viṣayasya tatas kena ākāreṇa sidhyati
bhedaḥ ca bhrānta vijñānaiḥ dṛ śyeta indau iva advaye
saṃvitti niyamaḥ na asti bhinnayoḥ nīla pītayoḥ
na artha asaṃvedanaḥ vā api vedanam

original: dṛṣṭaṃ saṃvedyamānaṃ tat tayornāsti vivekitā // Pramāṇav_2.390 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam saṃvedyamānam tat tayoḥ na asti viveki tā
tasmāt arthasya durvāram jñāna kāla avabhāsinaḥ
jñāna da vyatireki tvam hetu bheda anumā bhavet
abhāvāt kṣa buddhīnām satsu api anyeṣu hetuṣu

original: niyamaṃ yadi na bru yāt pratyayāt samanantarāt // Pramāṇav_2.392 //
analyzed: niyamam yadi na yāt pratyayāt samanantarāt
bījāt aṅkura janma agneḥ dhūmāt siddhiḥ iti īdṛśī
bahis ārtha āśrayiṇī kāraka jñāpaka sthitiḥ
sā api tad ru pa nirbhāsā tathā niyata saṅgamāḥ

original: buddhīrāśritya kalpyeta yadi kiṃ vā virudhyate // Pramāṇav_2.394 //
analyzed: buddhīḥ āśritya kalpyeta yadi kim vā virudhyate

original: anagnijanyo dhūmaḥ syāt tatkāryāt kāraṇe gatiḥ /
analyzed: anagni janyaḥ dhūmaḥ syāt tad kāryāt kāraṇe gatiḥ

original: na syāt kāraṇatāyāṃ vā kuta ekāntato gatiḥ // Pramāṇav_2.395 //
analyzed: na syāt kāraṇa tāyām vā kutas ekāntataḥ gatiḥ
tatra api dhūma ābhāsā dhīḥ prabodha paṭu vāsanām
gamayet agni nirbhāsām dhiyam eva na pāvakam
tad yogya vāsanā garbhe eva dhūma avabhāsinīm
vyanakti citta santāni dhiyam dhūmaḥ nitas tatas

original: astyeṣa viduṣāṃ vādo bāhyāṃ tvāśritya varṇyate /
analyzed: asti eṣa viduṣām vādaḥ bāhyām tu āśritya varṇyate
dvairūpyam saha saṃvitti niyamāt tat ca sidhyati
jñānam indriya bhedena paṭu manda āvila ādikām
pratibhāsa bhidām arthe bibhrat ekatra dṛśyate
arthasya abhinna rūpa tvāt eka rūpam bhavet manaḥ

original: sarvai tadarthamarthāccet tasya nāsti tadābhatā // Pramāṇav_2.400 //
analyzed: tad artham arthāt ced tasya na asti tad ābha tā
artha āśrayeṇa udbhavataḥ tad rūpam anukurvataḥ

original: tasya kenacidaṃśena parato 'pi bhidā bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.401 //
analyzed: tasya kenacid aṃśena paratas bhidā bhavet

original: tathā hyāśritya pitaraṃ tadrūpo 'pi sutaḥ pituḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi āśritya pitaram tad rūpaḥ pi sutaḥ pituḥ
bhedam kenacid aṃśena kutaścid avalambate
mayūra candraka ākāram nīlalohita bhāsvaram
sampaśyanti pradīpa ādeḥ maṇḍalam manda cakṣuṣaḥ
tasya tad bāhya a rūpa tve kā prasanna īkṣaṇe kṣamā

original: bhūtaṃ paśyaṃśca taddarśī kathaṃ copahatendriyaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.404 //
analyzed: bhūtam paśyan ca tad darśī katham ca upahata indriyaḥ
śodhitam timireṇa asya vyaktam cakṣuḥ atīndriyam
paśyataḥ nyākṣa dṛśye rthe tat avyaktam katham punar
āloka akṣa manaskārāt anyasya ekasya gamyate
śaktiḥ hetuḥ tatas nā anyaḥ hetuḥ ca viṣayaḥ katham

original: sa eva yadi dhīhetuḥ ki pradīpamapekṣate /
analyzed: saḥ eva yadi dhī hetuḥ ki pradīpam apekṣate
dīpa mātreṇa dhī bhāvāt ubhayam nā api kāraṇam
dūra āsanna ādi bhedena vyakta avyaktam na yujyate
tat syāt āloka bhedāt ced taptidhāna apidhānayoḥ
tulyā dṛṣṭiḥ adṛṣṭiḥ vā sūkṣmā ūm śastasya kaścan

original: ālokana na mandena dṛśyate 'to bhidā yadi // Pramāṇav_2.409 //
analyzed: na mandena dṛśyate bhidā yadi
eka tve rthasya bāhyasya dṛśya adṛśya bhidā kutas
aneka tve ṇuśas bhinne dṛśya adṛśyā bhidā kutas
māndya pāṭava bhedena bhāsaḥ buddha bhidā yadi
bhinne kutas bhedena bhāsanam

original: mandaṃ tadapi tejaḥ kimāvṛteriha sā na kim /
analyzed: mandam tat api tejaḥ kim āvṛteḥ iha sā na kim
tanu tvam tejasaḥ pi etat asti anyatra api atānavam
ati āsanne ca su vyaktam tejaḥ tat syāt tisfuṭam
tatra api adṛṣṭam āśritya bhavet rūpa antaram yadi
anyonya āvaraṇāt teṣām syāt tejaḥ vihatiḥ tatas
tatra ekam eva dṛśyet tasya an āvaraṇe sakṛt
paśyet sfuṭāsfuṭam rūpam ekaḥ dṛṣṭena vāraṇe

original: arthānarthau na yena stastadadṛṣṭaṃ karoti kim // Pramāṇav_2.415 //
analyzed: artha anarthau na yena staḥ tat adṛṣṭam karoti kim
tasmāt saṃvid yathāhetu jāyamānā artha saṃśrayāt
pratibhāsa bhidām dhatte śeṣāḥ kumati durnayāḥ
jñāna śabda pradīpānām pratyakṣasya itarasya vā
janaka tvena pūrveṣām kṣaṇikānām vināśataḥ
vyaktiḥ kutas satā jñānāt anyasya anupakāriṇaḥ
vyaktau vyajyeta sarvaḥ rthaḥ tad hetoḥ niyamaḥ yadi
kalpanā jñāne jñānam tu artha avabhāsataḥ

original: taṃ vyanaktīti kathyeta tadabhāve 'pi tatkṛtam // Pramāṇav_2.419 //
analyzed: tam vyanakti iti kathyeta tad abhāve pi tat kṛtam
na ākārayati ca anyaḥ rthaḥ n upakārāt saha uditaḥ

original: vyakto 'nākārayan jñānaṃ svākāreṇa kathaṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.420 //
analyzed: vyaktaḥ nā akārayan jñānam sva ākāreṇa katham bhavet
vajra upala ādiḥ api arthaḥ sthiraḥ saḥ nyān apekṣaṇāt

original: sakṛt sarvasya janayejjñānāni jagataḥ samam // Pramāṇav_2.421 //
analyzed: sakṛt sarvasya janayet jñānāni jagataḥ samam
kramāt bhavanti tāni asya

original: āhuḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedaṃ sa doṣo 'trāpi pūrvavat // Pramāṇav_2.422 //
analyzed: āhuḥ pratikṣaṇam bhedam sa doṣaḥ pūrvavat
saṃvedanasya tādātmye na vivādaḥ sti kasyacid
tasya artha rūpa tā siddhā sā api sidhyati saṃsmṛteḥ
bhedena ananubhūte smin avibhakte sva gocaraiḥ

original: evametanna khalvevamiti sā syānna bhedinī // Pramāṇav_2.424 //
analyzed: evam etat na khalu evam iti sā syāt na bhedinī
na ca anubhava mātreṇa kaścid bhedaḥ vivecakaḥ
vivekinī na ca aspaṣṭa bhede dhīḥ yamala ādi vat
dvairūpya sādhanena api prāyas siddham sva vedanam
sva rūpa bhūta ābhāsasya tadā saṃvedana īkṣaṇāt
dhiyā a tad rū payā jñāne niruddhe nubhavaḥ katham

original: svaṃ ca rūpaṃ na sā vettītyutsanno 'nubhavo 'khilaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.427 //
analyzed: svam ca rūpam na sā vetti iti utsannaḥ khilaḥ
ca tat jñānam bhāti artha pratibhāsa vat
buddheḥ ca grāhikā vittiḥ nityam antarmukha ātmani

original: yo yasya viṣayābhāsastaṃ vetti na tadipyapi /
analyzed: yaḥ yasya viṣaya ābhāsaḥ tam vetti na tat ipi api
prāptam saṃvedanam sarva sadṛśānām parasparam

original: buddhiḥ sarūpā tadviccet nedānīṃ vit sarūpikā // Pramāṇav_2.430 //
analyzed: buddhiḥ sarūpā tad vid ced na idānīm vid sarūpikā
svayam saḥ nubhavaḥ tasyāḥ na sa sārūpya kāraṇaḥ
kriyā karma vyavasthāyāḥ tat loke syāt nibandhanam
svabhāva bhūta tad ru pa saṃvid āropa viplavāt
nīladeḥ anubhūta ākhyā na anubhūteḥ parātmanaḥ
dhiyaḥ nīla ādi rūpa tve bādyaḥ rthaḥ kimpramāṇakaḥ
dhiyaḥ nīla ādi rūpa tve sa tasya anubhavaḥ katham

original: siddhaṃ tat svat evāsya kimarthenopanīyate // Pramāṇav_2.434 //
analyzed: siddham tat svat eva asya kimarthena upanīyate
na ca sarva ātmanā sāmyam ajñāna tva prasaṅgataḥ

original: na ca kenacidaṃśena sarva sarvasya vedanam // Pramāṇav_2.435 //
analyzed: na ca kenacid aṃśena sarva sarvasya vedanam
yathā nīla ādi rūpa tvāt nīla ādi anubhavaḥ mataḥ
tathā anubhava rūpa tvāt tasya api anubhavaḥ bhavet
na anubhūtaḥ nubhavaḥ iti artha vat hi viniścayaḥ

original: tasmādadoṣa iti cet nārthe 'pyastyeṣa sarvadā // Pramāṇav_2.437 //
analyzed: tasmāt adoṣaḥ iti ced na arthe pi asti eṣa sarvadā
kasmāt vā anubhave nā asti sati sattā nibandhane

original: api cedaṃ yadābhāti dṛśyamāne sitādike // Pramāṇav_2.438 //
analyzed: api ca idam yat ābhāti dṛśyamāne sita ādike
tat para rūpam atha ātmanaḥ
para rūpe prakāśāyām vyaktau vyaktam katham sitam

original: jñānaṃ vyaktirna sā vyaktetyavyaktamakhilaṃ jagat // Pramāṇav_2.440 //
analyzed: jñānam vyaktiḥ na sā vyaktā iti avyaktam akhilam jagat
vyakteḥ vyakti antara vyaktau api doṣa prasaṅgataḥ

original: dṛṣṭyā vājñātasambandhaṃ viśinaṣṭi tayā katham // Pramāṇav_2.441 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭyā vā ajñāta sambandham viśinaṣṭi tayā katham
yasmāt dvayoḥ eka gatau na dvitīyasya darśanam

original: dvayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayordṛṣṭau syād dṛṣṭamiti niścayaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.442 //
analyzed: dvayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ dṛṣṭau syāt dṛṣṭam iti niścayaḥ
sarūpam darśanam yasya dṛśyate cetasā

original: dṛṣṭākhyā tatra cet siddhaṃ sārūpyesya svavedanam // Pramāṇav_2.443 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa ākhyā tatra ced siddham sva vedanam

original: athātmarūpaṃ no vetti pararūpasya vit katham /
analyzed: atha ātma rūpam no vetti para rūpasya vid katham

original: sārūpyād vedanākhyā ca prāgeva prativarṇitā // Pramāṇav_2.444 //
analyzed: sārūpyāt vedanā ākhyā ca prāk eva prativarṇitā
dṛṣṭayoḥ eva sārūpya grahaḥ ca na dṛṣṭavān

original: prāk kathaṃ darśanenāsya sārūpyaṃ so 'dhyavasyati // Pramāṇav_2.445 //
analyzed: prāk katham darśanena asya sārūpyam saḥ dhī avasyati
sārūpyam api nā icchet yaḥ tasya nā ubhaya darśanam

original: tadārtho jñānamiti ca jñāte ceti gatā kathā // Pramāṇav_2.446 //
analyzed: tadā arthaḥ jñānam iti ca jñāte ca iti gatā kathā

original: atha svarūpam sā tarhi svayameva prakāśate /
analyzed: atha svarūpam sā tarhi svayam eva prakāśate
yat tasyām aprakāśāyām arthaḥ syāt aprakāśitaḥ
etena anātma vid pakṣe sarva artha adarśanena ye
apratyakṣām dhiyam prāhuḥ te nirvarṇita uttarāḥ
āśraya ālambana abhyāsa bhedāt bhinna pravṛttayaḥ
sukha duḥkha abhilāṣa ādi bhedāḥ buddhayaḥ eva tāḥ
pratyakṣāḥ tad viviktam ca na anyat kiñcid vibhāvyate

original: yattajjñānaṃ paro 'pyetān bhuñjītānyena vid yadi // Pramāṇav_2.450 //
analyzed: yat tat jñānam paraḥ pi etān bhuñjīta anyena vid yadi

original: tajjā tatpratibhāsā va yadi dhīrvetti nāparā /
analyzed: tad jā tad pratibhāsā yadi dhīḥ vetti na aparā
ālambamānasya anyasya api asti avaśyam idam dvayam
atha nā utpadyate tasmāt na ca tad pratibhāsinī

original: sā dhīrnirviṣayā prāptā sāmānyaṃ ca tadagrahe // Pramāṇav_2.452 //
analyzed: sā dhīḥ nirviṣayā prāptā sāmānyam ca tad agrahe

original: na gṛhyat iti proktam na ca tadvastu kiñcana /
analyzed: na gṛhyat iti proktam na ca tad vastu kiñcana
tasmāt artha avabhāsaḥ sau na anyaḥ tasyāḥ dhiyaḥ tatas
siddhe pratyakṣa bhāva ātma vidau gṛhṇāti tān punar

original: nādhyakṣamiti cedeṣa kuto bhedaḥ samārthayoḥ // Pramāṇav_2.454 //
analyzed: na adhyakṣam iti ced eṣa kutas bhedaḥ sama arthayoḥ
adṛṣṭa eka artha yoga ādeḥ saṃvidaḥ niyamaḥ yadi
sarvathā anyaḥ na gṛhṇīyāt saṃvid bhedaḥ pi apoditaḥ
yeṣām ca yoginaḥ nyasya pratyakṣeṇa sukha ādikam
vidanti tulya anubhavāḥ tadvat te syuḥ āturāḥ
viṣaya indriya sampāta abhāvāt teṣām tat udbhavam

original: nodeti duḥkhamiti cet na vai duḥkhasamudbhavaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.457 //
analyzed: na udeti duḥkham iti ced na vai duḥkha samudbhavaḥ
duḥkhasya vedanam kintu duḥkha jñāna samudbhavaḥ
na hi duḥkha ādi asaṃvedyam pīḍā anugraha kāraṇam

original: bhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ yadā /
analyzed: bhāsamānam sva rūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkham svayam yadā

original: na tadālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na tadaivaṃ prayujyate // Pramāṇav_2.459 //
analyzed: na tad ālambanam jñānam na tadā evam prayujyate
bhinne jñānasya sarvasya tena ālambana vedane

original: arthasārūpyamālamba ātmā vittiḥ svayaṃ sfuṭā // Pramāṇav_2.460 //
analyzed: artha sārūpyam ālambaḥ ātmā vittiḥ svayam sfuṭā
api ca adhyakṣa tā abhāve dhiyaḥ syāt liṅgataḥ gatiḥ

original: taccākṣamartho dhīḥ pūrvo manaskāro 'pi vā bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.461 //
analyzed: tat ca akṣam arthaḥ dhīḥ pūrvaḥ vā bhavet
kārya kāraṇa sāmagr yām asyām sambandhi na aparam
sāmarthya adarśanāt tatra na indriyam vyabhicārataḥ

original: tathārtho dhīmanaskārau jñānaṃ tau ca na sidhyataḥ /
analyzed: tathā arthaḥ dhī manaskārau jñānam tau ca na sidhyataḥ
na aprasiddhasya liṅga tvam vyaktiḥ arthasya cit matā

original: liṅgaṃ saiva nanu jñānaṃ vyakto 'rtho 'nena varṇitaḥ /
analyzed: liṅgam sā eva nanu jñānam vyaktaḥ rthaḥ nena varṇitaḥ
vyaktau ananubhūtāyām tad vyakta tva aviniścayāt
athā arthasya eva kaścid sa viśeṣaḥ vyaktiḥ iṣyate
na anutpāda vyayavataḥ viśeṣaḥ rthasya kaścana
tad iṣṭau vā pratijñānam kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ prasajyate

original: sa ca jñāto 'tha vājñāto bhavejjñātasya liṅgatā // Pramāṇav_2.466 //
analyzed: sa ca vā ajñātaḥ bhavet jñātasya liṅga tā
yadi jñāne paricchinne jñātaḥ saḥ iti tat kutas
jñāta tvena aparicchinnam api tat gamakam katham

original: adṛṣṭadṛṣṭayo 'nyena draṣṭrā dṛṣṭā na hi kvacit /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa dṛṣṭayaḥ nyena draṣṭrā dṛṣṭāḥ na hi kvacid
viśeṣaḥ saḥ ni adṛṣṭau api asti iti syāt sva dhī gatiḥ
tasmāt anumitiḥ buddheḥ svadharma nirapekṣiṇaḥ
kevalāt na artha dharmāt kaḥ svadharmaḥ paraḥ
pratyakṣa adhigataḥ hetuḥ tulya araṇa janmanaḥ

original: tasya bhedaḥ kuto buddhe rvyabhicāryanyajaśca saḥ // Pramāṇav_2.470 //
analyzed: tasya bhedaḥ kutas buddheḥ vyabhicārī anya jaḥ ca saḥ
rūpa ādīn pañca viṣayān indriyāṇi upalambhanam

original: muktvā na kāryamaparaṃ tasyāḥ samupalabhyate // Pramāṇav_2.471 //
analyzed: muktvā na kāryam aparam tasyāḥ samupalabhyate
tatra atyakṣam dvayam pañcasu artheṣu ekaḥ na īkṣyate
rūpa darśanataḥ jātaḥ yaḥ nyathā vyasta sambhavaḥ
yat evam apratītam tat liṅgam iti ati laukikam

original: vidyamāne 'pi liṅge tāṃ tena sārdhamapaśyataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.473 //
analyzed: vidyamāne pi liṅge tām tena sārdham apaśyataḥ
katham pratītiḥ liṅgam hi na adṛṣṭasya prakāśakam

original: tata evāsya liṅgāt prāk prasiddherupavarṇane // Pramāṇav_2.474 //
analyzed: tatas eva asya liṅgāt prāk prasiddheḥ upavarṇane
dṛṣṭānta antara sādhya tvam tasya api iti anavasthitiḥ

original: ityarthasya dhiyaḥ siddhiḥ nārthāt tasyāḥ kathañcana // Pramāṇav_2.475 //
analyzed: iti arthasya dhiyaḥ siddhiḥ na arthāt tasyāḥ kathañcana
tad aprasiddhau arthasya svayam eva aprasiddhitaḥ

original: pratyakṣāṃ ca dhiyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāśceṣṭābhidhādikam // Pramāṇav_2.476 //
analyzed: pratyakṣām ca dhiyam dṛṣṭvā tasyāḥ ceṣṭā abhidhā ādikam
para citta anumānam ca na syāt ātmani adarśanāt
sambandhasi manaḥ buddha vartha liṅga a prasiddhitaḥ

original: prakāśitā kathaṃ vā syāt buddhirbuddh yantareṇa vaḥ /
analyzed: prakāśitā katham vā syāt buddhiḥ buddh yantareṇa vaḥ
viṣayasya katham vyaktiḥ prakāśe rūpa saṃkramāt

original: sa ca prakāśastadrūpaḥ svayameva prakāśate // Pramāṇav_2.479 //
analyzed: sa ca prakāśaḥ tad rūpaḥ svayam eva prakāśate
tathā abhyupagame buddheḥ buddhau buddhiḥ sva vedikā

original: siddhānyathā tulyadharmā viṣayo 'pi dhiyā saha // Pramāṇav_2.480 //
analyzed: siddhā anyathā tulya dharmā viṣayaḥ pi dhiyā saha

original: iti prakāśarūpā naḥ svayaṃ dhīḥ samprakāśate /
analyzed: iti prakāśa rūpā naḥ svayam dhīḥ samprakāśate

original: anyo 'syāṃ rūpasaṃkrāntyā prakāśaḥ san prakāśate // Pramāṇav_2.481 //
analyzed: anyaḥ syām rūpa saṃkrāntyā prakāśaḥ san prakāśate

original: sādṛśye 'pi hi dhīranyā prakāśyā na tayā matā /
analyzed: sādṛśye hi dhīḥ anyā prakāśyā na tayā matā
svayam prakāśamāna arthaḥ tad rūpeṇa prakāśate
yathā pradīpayoḥ dīpa ghaṭayoḥ ca tad āśrayaḥ
vyaṅ gi a vyañjaka bhedena vyavahāraḥ pratanyate
viṣaya indriya mātreṇa na dṛṣṭam iti niścayaḥ

original: tasmād yato 'yaṃ tasyāpi vācyamanyasya daśanam // Pramāṇav_2.484 //
analyzed: tasmāt yatas yam tasya api vācyam anyasya daśanam
smṛteḥ api ātma vid siddhā jñānasya anyena vedane
dīrgha ādi grahaṇam na syāt bahu mātra anavasthiteḥ
avasthita avakramāyām sakṛt ābhāsanāt matau
varṇaḥ syāt kramaḥ dīrghaḥ kramavān akramām katham
upakuryāt asaṃśliṣyan varṇa bhāgaḥ parasparam
āntyam pūrva sthitāt ūrdhva vardhamānaḥ dhvaniḥ bhavet
akrameṇa grahāt ante kramavat dhīḥ ca naḥ bhavet

original: dhiyaḥ svayaṃ ca na sthānaṃ tadūrdhvaviṣayāsthiteḥ // Pramāṇav_2.488 //
analyzed: dhiyaḥ svayam ca na sthānam tad ūrdhva viṣaya asthiteḥ

original: sthāne svayaṃ na naśyet sā paścādapyaviśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: sthāne svayam na naśyet sā paścāt api aviśeṣatas
doṣaḥ yam sakṛt utpanna akrama varṇa sthitau api
sakṛt yatna udbhavāt vyarthaḥ syāt yatnaḥ ca uttarottaraḥ
vyaktau api eṣa varṇānām doṣaḥ samanuṣajyate
anekayā tad grahaṇe yāntyā dhīḥ sā anubhūyate

original: na dīrghagrāhikā sā ca tanna syād dīrghadhīsmṛtiḥ // Pramāṇav_2.491 //
analyzed: na dīrgha grāhikā sā ca tat na syāt dīrgha dhī smṛtiḥ

original: pṛthak pṛthak ca buddhīnāṃ saṃvittau taddhvaniśruteḥ /
analyzed: pṛthak pṛthak ca buddhīnām saṃvittau tad dhvani śruteḥ

original: avicchinnābhatā na syād ghaṭanaṃ ca nirākṛtam // Pramāṇav_2.492 //
analyzed: avicchinna ābha tā na syāt ghaṭanam ca nirākṛtam
vicchinnam śṛṇvataḥ pi asya yadi avicchinna vibhramaḥ
hrasva dvaya uccāraṇe syāt avicchinna vibhramaḥ
vicchinne darśane cākṣāt avicchinna adhiropaṇam
na ākṣāt sarva akṣa buddhīnām vitatha tva prasaṅgataḥ
sarva antyaḥ hi varṇa ātmā nimeṣa tulita sthitiḥ
sa ca kramāt aneka aṇu sambandhena nitiṣṭhati
eka aṇu atyaya kālaḥ ca kālaḥ lpīyān kṣaṇaḥ mataḥ

original: buddhiśca kṣaṇikā tasmāt kramād varṇān prapadyate // Pramāṇav_2.496 //
analyzed: buddhiḥ ca kṣaṇikā tasmāt kramāt varṇān prapadyate
iti varṇe pi r u pa ādau avicchinna avabhāsinī

original: vicchinnāpyanyathā buddhiḥ sarvā syād vitathārthikā // Pramāṇav_2.497 //
analyzed: vicchinnā api anyathā buddhiḥ sarvā syāt vitatha arthikā
ghaṭanam yat ca bhāvānām anyatra indriya vibhramāt
bheda alakṣaṇa vibhrāntam smaraṇam tat vikalpakam
tasya spaṣṭa avabhāsi tvam jalpa saṃsargiṇaḥ kutas
na akṣa grāhye sti śabdānām yojanā iti vivecitam
vicchinnam paśyataḥ pi akṣaiḥ ghaṭayet yadi kalpanā
arthasya tad saṃvitteḥ ca satatam bhāsamānayoḥ

original: bādhake sati sannyāye vicchinna iti tat kutaḥ /
analyzed: bādhake sati sat nyāye vicchinnaḥ iti tat kutas

original: buddhīnāṃ śaktiniyamāditi cet sa kuto bhataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.501 //
analyzed: buddhīnām śakti niyamāt iti ced sa kutas
yugapad buddhi adṛṣṭeḥ ced tat eva idam vicāryate
tāsām samāna jātīye sāmarthya niyamaḥ bhavet
tathā hi samyak lakṣyante vikalpāḥ krama bhāvinaḥ
etena yaḥ samakṣe rthe pratyabhi
yāna kalpanām
spaṣṭa avabhāsām pratyakṣām kalpayet vāritaḥ
keśa golaka dīpa ādau api spaṣṭa avabhāsanāt
pratīta bhede pi adhyakṣā dhīḥ katham tādṛśī bhavet
tasmāt na pratyabhijñānāt varṇa ādi eka tva niścayaḥ
pūrva anubhūta smaraṇāt tad dharma āropaṇāt vinā

original: sa evāyamiti jñānaṃ nāsti tacchakṣaje kutaḥ // Pramāṇav_2.506 //
analyzed: saḥ eva ayam iti jñānam na asti tat śakṣa je kutas
na ca artha jñāna saṃvittyoḥ yugapad sambhavaḥ yatas

original: lakṣyete pratibhāso dau nārthārthajñānayoḥ pṛthak // Pramāṇav_2.507 //
analyzed: lakṣyete pratibhāsaḥ dau na artha artha jñānayoḥ pṛthak

original: na hyarthābhāsi ca jñānamartho bāhyaśca kevalaḥ /
analyzed: na hi artha ābhāsi ca jñānam arthaḥ bāhyaḥ ca kevalaḥ
eka ākāra mati grāhye bheda bhāva prasaṅgataḥ

original: sūpalakṣeṇa bhedena yau saṃvittau na lakṣitau /
analyzed: sūpalakṣeṇa bhedena yau saṃvittau na lakṣitau

original: arthārthapratyayo paścāt smaryete tau pṛthak katham // Pramāṇav_2.509 //
analyzed: artha artha pratyayau paścāt smaryete tau pṛthak katham
krameṇa anubhava utpāde pi artha artha manasoḥ ayam
pratibhāsasya nānātva codya doṣaḥ duruddharaḥ
artha saṃvedanam tāvat tatas ṛtha ābhāsa vedanam

original: na hi saṃvedanaṃ śuddhaṃ bhavedarthasya vedanam // Pramāṇav_2.511 //
analyzed: na hi saṃvedanam śuddham bhavet arthasya vedanam

original: tathā hi nīlādyākāra eka ekaṃ ca vedanam /
analyzed: tathā hi nīla ādi ākāraḥ ekaḥ ekam ca vedanam

original: lakṣyate na tu nīlābhe vedane vedanaṃ param // Pramāṇav_2.512 //
analyzed: lakṣyate na tu nīla ābhe vedane vedanam param
jñāna antareṇa anubhavaḥ bhavet tatra api hi smṛtiḥ

original: dṛṣṭā tadvedanaṃ kena tasyāpyanyena ced imām // Pramāṇav_2.513 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭā tad vedanam kena tasya api anyena ced imām
mālām jñāna vidām kaḥ yam janayati anubandhinīm

original: pūrvā dhīḥ saiva cenna syāt sañcāro viṣayāntare // Pramāṇav_2.514 //
analyzed: pūrvā dhīḥ sā eva ced na syāt sañcāraḥ viṣaya antare
tām grāhya lakṣaṇa prāptām āsannām janikām dhiyam
a gṛhītvā uttaram jñānam gṛhṇīyāt aparam katham

original: ātmani jñānajanane svabhāve niyatāṃ ca tām /
analyzed: ātmani jñāna janane svabhāve niyatām ca tām
kaḥ nāma anyaḥ vibadhnīyāt bahis aṃge ntar aṅgikām

original: bāhyāḥ sannihito 'pyarthastāṃ vibadhnan hi na prabhuḥ /
analyzed: bāhyāḥ sannihitaḥ pi arthaḥ tām vibadhnan hi na prabhuḥ
dhiyam nā anubhavet kaścid anyathā arthasya sannidhau
na ca asannihita arthā asti daśā kācid atas dhiyaḥ
utkhāta mūlā smṛtiḥ api utsannā iti ujjvalam matam
atīta ādi vikalpānām yeṣām na arthasya sannidhiḥ
sañcāra karaṇa abhāvāt
ātma vijñāna janane śakti saṃkṣayataḥ śanais
viṣaya antara sañcāraḥ yadi sā eva artha dhīḥ kutas

original: śaktikṣaye pūrvādhiyo na hi dhīḥ prāgdhiyā vinā /
analyzed: śakti kṣaye pūrva adhiyaḥ na hi dhīḥ prāk dhiyā vinā
anya artha āsakti viguṇe jñāne jñāna udaya āgateḥ
sakṛt vijātīya jātau api ekena paṭīyasā
cittena āhita vaiguṇyāt ālāyāt na anya sambhavaḥ
na apekṣeta anyathā sāmyam manaḥ vṛtteḥ manaḥ ntaram
manaḥ jñāna krama utpattiḥ api apekṣā prasādhanī
eka tvāt manasaḥ saktasya anya āgateḥ yadi
jñāna antarasya anudayaḥ na kadācid saha udayāt
sama vṛttau ca tulya tvāt sarvadā anya āgatiḥ bhavet
janma vā ātma manaḥ yoga mātra jānām sakṛt bhavet

original: ekaiva cet kriyaikaḥ syāt kiṃ dīpo 'nekadarśanaḥ /
analyzed: ekā eva ced kriyā ekaḥ syāt kim dīpaḥ na eka darśanaḥ

original: krameṇāpi na śaktaṃ syāt paścādapyaviśeṣataḥ // Pramāṇav_2.526 //
analyzed: krameṇa api na śaktam syāt paścāt api aviśeṣataḥ
anena deha puruṣa abuktau saṃskārataḥ yadi

original: niyamaḥ sa kutaḥ paścāt buddheścedastu sammatam // Pramāṇav_2.527 //
analyzed: niyamaḥ sa kutas paścāt buddheḥ ced astu sammatam
na grāhya tā anyā jananāt jananam grāhya lakṣaṇam

original: agrāhyaṃ na hi tejo 'sti na ca saukṣamyādyanaṃśake // Pramāṇav_2.528 //
analyzed: agrāhyam na hi tejaḥ sti na ca saukṣamya ādi an aṃśake
syāt na anyasya janana ātmanaḥ
grāhyātāyāḥ na khalu anyat jananam grāhya lakṣaṇe
sākṣāt na hi anyathā buddhe rūpa ādi rūpa kārakaḥ
sya kaḥ
buddheḥ api tat asti iti sā api sattve vyavsthitā
grāhi upādāna saṃvittī cetasaḥ grāhya lakṣaṇam
rūpa ādeḥ cetasaḥ ca evam viśuddha dhiyam prati
grāhya lakṣaṇa cintā iyam acintyā yoginām gatiḥ
tatra sūkṣma ādi bhāvena grāhyam agrāhya tām vrajet

original: rūpādi buddheḥ kiṃ jātaṃ paścād yat prāṅ na vidyate // Pramāṇav_2.533 //
analyzed: rūpa ādi buddheḥ kim jātam paścāt yat prāk na vidyate
sati sva dhī grahe tasmāt yā evā anantara hetu tā

original: cetaso grāhyatā saiva tato nārthāntare gatiḥ // Pramāṇav_2.534 //
analyzed: cetasaḥ grāhya tā sā eva tatas na artha antare gatiḥ
na aneka śakti abhāve pi bhāvaḥ na aneka kārya kṛt

original: prakṛtyaiveti gaditam nānekasmānna ced bhavet // Pramāṇav_2.535 //
analyzed: prakṛtyā eva iti gaditam na anekasmāt na ced bhavet
na kiñcid ekasmāt sāmagrayāḥ sarva sambhavaḥ
ekam syāt api sāmagryoḥ iti uktam tat aneka kṛt

original: artha pūrvañca vijñānaṃ gṛhṇīyad yadi dhīḥ parā /
analyzed: vijñānam gṛhṇīyat yadi dhīḥ parā
abhilāpa dvayam nityam syāt dṛṣṭa kramam akramam
pūrva apara artha bhāsi tvāt cintā ādau eka cetasi
dvis dvis ekam ca bhāseta bhāsanāt ātma tad dhiyoḥ
viṣaya antara sañcāre yadi antyam na anubhūyate
para anubhūta vat sarva ananubhūtiḥ prasajyate
ātma anubhūta pratyakṣam na anubhūtam paraiḥ yadi

original: ātmānubhūtiḥ sā siddhā kuto yenaivamucyate // Pramāṇav_2.540 //
analyzed: ātma anubhūtiḥ sā siddhā kutas yena evam ucyate
vyakti hetu aprasiddhiḥ syāt na vyakteḥ vyaktam icchataḥ

original: vyaktyasiddhavapi vyaktaṃ yadi vyaktamidaṃ jagat // Pramāṇav_2.541 //
analyzed: vyaktam yadi vyaktam idam jagat
tṛtīyaḥ svārtha anumāna paricchedaḥ
pakṣa dharmaḥ tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ hetuḥ tridhā eva saḥ
avinābhāva niyamāt hetvābhāsāḥ pare
kārya svabhāvaiḥ yāvadbhiḥ avinābhāvi kāraṇe
hetuḥ svabhāve bhāvaḥ pi bhāva mātra anurodhini
apravṛttiḥ pramāṇānām apravṛtti phalā asati
asat jñāna phalā kācid hetu bheda vyapekṣayā
viruddha kāryoḥ siddhiḥ asiddhiḥ hetu bhāvayoḥ
dṛśya ātmanoḥ abhāva artha anupalabdhiḥ caturvidhā
tad viruddhi nimittasya yā upalabdhiḥ prayujyate
nimittayoḥ viruddha tva abhāve sā vyabhicāriṇī
iṣṭam viruddha kārye deśa kāla āadi apekṣaṇam
anyathā vyabhicāri syāt bhasma iva aśīta sādhane
hetunā yaḥ samagreṇa kāyāt pādaḥ numīyate
artha antara anapekṣa tvāt sa svabhāvaḥ
sāmagrī phala śaktīnām pariṇāma anubandhini
anaikāntika tā kārye pratibandhasya sambhavāt
eka sāmagrī adhīnasya rūpa ādeḥ rasataḥ gatiḥ
hetu dharma anumānena dhūma indhana vikāra vat
śakti pravṛttyā na vinā rasaḥ saḥ eva anya kāraṇam
iti atīta eka kālānām gatiḥ taḥ tad kārya liṅga jā
hetunā samagreṇa kārya utpādaḥ numīyate
tat śeṣavat asāmarthyāt dehāt rāga anumāna vat
vipakṣe dṛṣṭi mātreṇa kārya sāmānya darśanāt
hetu jñānam pramāṇa ābham vacanāt rāgi tā ādi vat
na ca adarśana mātreṇa vipakṣe vyabhicāri tā
sambhāvya vyabhicāri tvāt sthālī taṇḍula pāka vat
yasya adarśana mātreṇa vyatirekaḥ pradarśyate
tasya saṃśaya hetu tvāt śeṣavat tat udāhṛtam
hetoḥ triṣu api rūpeṣu niścayaḥ tena varṇitaḥ
asiddha viparīta artha vyabhicāri vipakṣataḥ
vyabhicāri vipakṣeṇa ca yat
yat yad dṛṣṭi phalam tat ca tad anukte gamyate

original: na ca nāstīti vacanāt tannāstyeva yathā yadi /
analyzed: na ca na asti iti vacanāt tat na asti eva yathā yadi

original: nāsti sa khyāpyate nyāyastadā nāstīti gamyate // Pramāṇav_3.17 //
analyzed: na asti sa khyāpyate nyāyaḥ tadā na asti iti gamyate
yadi adṛṣṭau nivṛttiḥ syāt śeṣavat vyabhicāri kim
vyatirekī api hetuḥ syāt na vācyā aasiddhi yojanā
viśeṣasya vyavaccheda hetu tā syāt adarśanāt
pramāṇa antara bādhā ced nā idānīm
tathā anyatra api sambhāvyam pramāṇa antara bādhanam
dṛṣṭa ayuktiḥ adṛṣṭeḥ ca syāt sparśasya avirodhinī
deśa ādi bhedāt dṛśyante bhinnāḥ dravyeṣu śaktayaḥ
tatra eka dṛṣṭyā na anyatra yuktaḥ tad bhāva niścayaḥ
ātma mṛd cetanā ādīnām yaḥ bhāvasya a prasādhakaḥ

original: sa evānupalambhaḥ kiṃ hetvabhāvasya sādhakaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.22 //
analyzed: saḥ eva anupalambhaḥ kim hetu abhāvasya sādhakaḥ
tasmāt tanmātra sambaddhaḥ svabhāvaḥ bhāvam eva vā
kāraṇam vā kāyam avyabhicārataḥ
anyathaka nivṛttayā anya vinivṛttiḥ katham bhavet

original: nāścavāniti martyena na bhāvyaṃ gomatāpi kim // Pramāṇav_3.24 //
analyzed: martyena na bhāvyam gomatā api kim
sannidhānāt tathā ekasya katham anyasya sannidhiḥ
gomān iti eva martyena bhāvyam aśvavatā api kim
tasmāt vaidharmya dṛṣṭānte na iṣṭaḥ vaśyam iha āśrayaḥ

original: tadabhāve ca tanneti vacanādapi tadgatiḥ // Pramāṇav_3.26 //
analyzed: tad abhāve ca tat na iti vacanāt api tad gatiḥ
tad bhāva hetu bhāvau hi dṛṣṭānte tad avedinaḥ

original: khyāpyete viduṣāṃ vācyo hetureva hi kevalaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.27 //
analyzed: khyāpyete viduṣām vācyaḥ hetuḥ eva hi kevalaḥ
tena eva jñāta sambandhe dvayoḥ anyatara uktitaḥ
arthāpattyā dvitīye pi smṛtiḥ samupajāyate
hetu svabhāva abhāvau taḥ pratiṣedhe ca kasyacid
hetuḥ yukta upalambhasya tasya ca anupalambhanam
iti iyam trividhā ukta pi anupalabdhiḥ anekadhā
tad tad viriddha ādi agati bheda prayogataḥ
kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt vā svabhāvāt vā niyāmakāt
avinābhāva niyamaḥ darśanāt na na darśanāt
avaśyaṃbhāva niyamaḥ kaḥ parasya anyathā paraiḥ

original: arthāntaranimitte vā dharme vāsasi rāgavat // Pramāṇav_3.32 //
analyzed: artha antara nimitte vā dharme vāsasi rāgavat

original: arthāntaranimitto hi dharmaḥ syādanya eva saḥ /
analyzed: artha antara nimittaḥ hi dharmaḥ syāt anyaḥ eva saḥ

original: paśyād bhāvānna hetutvaṃ phale 'pyekāntatā kutaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.33 //
analyzed: paśyāt bhāvāt na hetu tvam phale pi ekānta tā kutas
dhūmaḥ hutabhujaḥ kāya dharma anuvṛttitaḥ

original: tasyābhāve tu sa bhavan hetumatāṃ vilaṅghayet // Pramāṇav_3.34 //
analyzed: tasya abhāve tu sa bhavan hetumatām vilaṅghayet
nityam sattvam asattvam vā ahetoḥ anya anapekṣaṇāt
apekṣātaḥ ca bhāvānām kādācitkasya sambhavaḥ
agni svabhāvaḥ śakramya mūrdhā yadi agniḥ eva saḥ
atha anagni svabhāvaḥ sau dhūmaḥ tatra katham bhavet
dhūma hetu svabhāvaḥ hi vahniḥ tad śakti bhedavān
a dhūma hetoḥ dhūmasya bhāve sa syāt ahetukaḥ
anvaya vyatirekāt yaḥ yasya dṛṣṭaḥ nuvartakaḥ
svabhāvaḥ tasya tad hetuḥ atas bhinnāt na sambhavaḥ
svabhāve pi avinābhāvaḥ bhāva mātra anurodhini
tad bhāve svayambhāvasya abhāvaḥ syāt abhedataḥ
sarve bhāvāḥ svabhāvena sva svabhāva vyavasthiteḥ
svabhāva para bhāvābhyām yasmāt vyāvṛtti bhāginaḥ
tasmāt yatas yatas rthānām vyāvṛttiḥ tad nibandhanāḥ
jāti bhedāḥ prakalpyante tad viśeṣa avagāhinaḥ

original: tasmād viśeṣo yo yena dharmeṇa sampratīyate /
analyzed: tasmāt viśeṣaḥ yaḥ yena dharmeṇa sampratīyate

original: na da śakyastato 'nyena tena bhinnā vyavasthitiḥ // Pramāṇav_3.42 //
analyzed: na śakyaḥ tatas tena bhinnā vyavasthitiḥ
ekasya artha svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam

original: ko 'nyo bhāgo na dṛṣṭaḥ syād yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate // Pramāṇav_3.43 //
analyzed: kaḥ nyaḥ bhāgaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate
no ced bhrānti nimittena saṃyojyeta guṇa antaram
śuktau vā rajata ākāraḥ rūpa sādharmya darśanāt

original: tasmād dṛṣṭasya bhāvasya dṛṣṭa evākhilo guṇaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt dṛṣṭasya bhāvasya dṛṣṭaḥ eva akhilaḥ guṇaḥ
bhrānteḥ niścīyate na iti sādhanam sampravartate
vastu grahe manumānāt ca dharmasya ekasya niścaye

original: sarvagraho hyapohe tu nāyaṃ doṣaḥ prasajyate // Pramāṇav_3.46 //
analyzed: sarva grahaḥ hi apohe tu na ayam doṣaḥ prasajyate
tasmāt apoha viṣayam iti liṅgam prakīrtitam

original: anyathā dharmiṇaḥ siddhavasiddhaṃ kimataḥ param // Pramāṇav_3.47 //
analyzed: anyathā dharmiṇaḥ kim atas param
kvacid sāmānya viṣayam dṛṣṭe jñānam aliṅga jam
katham anya upoha viṣayam tanmātra apoha gocaram
niścaya āropa manasiḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvataḥ
samāropa viveke sya pravṛttiḥ iti gamyate
yāvantaḥ śa samāropāḥ tad nirāse viniścayāḥ

original: tāvanta eva śabdāśca tena te bhinnagocarāḥ // Pramāṇav_3.50 //
analyzed: tāvantaḥ eva śabdāḥ ca tena te bhinna gocarāḥ
anyathā ekena śabdena vyāpte ekatra vastuni

original: buddh yā vā nānyavisaya iti paryāyatā bhavet // Pramāṇav_3.51 //
analyzed: yā vā na anya visaye iti paryāya tā bhavet
yasya api nānā upādheḥ dhīḥ grāhikā arthasya bhedinaḥ
nānā upādhi upakāra aṅga śakti abhinna ātmanaḥ grahe
sarva ātmanā upakāryasya kaḥ bhedaḥ syāt aniścitaḥ
tayoḥ ātmani sambandhāt eka jñāne dvaya grahaḥ
dharma upakāra śaktīnām bhede tāḥ tasya kim yadi
na upakāraḥ tatas tāsām tadā syāt anavasthitiḥ
eka upakārake grāhye na upakārāḥ pare
dṛṣṭe tasmin adṛṣṭāḥ ca tad grahe sakala grahaḥ
yadi bhrānti nivṛtti artha gṛhīte pi anyat iṣyate
tad vyavaccheda viṣayam siddham tadvat param
a samāropa viṣaye vṛtteḥ api ca niścayaiḥ

original: yanna niścīyate rūpaṃ tat teṣāṃ viṣayaḥ katham // Pramāṇav_3.57 //
analyzed: yat na niścīyate rūpam tat teṣām viṣayaḥ katham
pratyakṣeṇa gṛhīte pi śavi barjite
yad viśeṣa avasāye sti pratyayaḥ sa pratīyate
tatra api ca anya vyāvṛttiḥ anya vyāvṛttaḥ iti api
śabdāḥ ca niścayāḥ ca eva nimittam anurindhate
dvayoḥ eka abhidhāne pi bibhaktiḥ vyatirekiṇī
bhinnam artham iva anveti vācya leśa viśeṣataḥ
bheda antara pratikṣe pa apratikṣepau tayoḥ dvayoḥ
padam saṃketa bhedasya
bhedaḥ yam eva sarvatra dravya bhāva abhidhāyinoḥ
śabdayoḥ na tayoḥ vācye viśeṣaḥ tena kaścana

original: jijñāpayiṣurartha taṃ taddhitena taṃ taddhitena kṛtāpi vā /
analyzed: jijñāpayiṣuḥ artha tam taddhitena tam taddhitena kṛtā api vā

original: antena vā yadi brū yāt bhedo nāsti tataḥ paraḥ // Pramāṇav_3.63 //
analyzed: antena vā yadi bhedaḥ na asti tatas paraḥ
tena anya apoha viṣaye tadvat pakṣa upavarṇanam

original: pratyākhyātaṃ pṛthaktve hi syād doṣo jātitadvatoḥ // Pramāṇav_3.64 //
analyzed: pratyākhyātam pṛthaktve hi syāt doṣaḥ jāti tadvatoḥ
yeṣām vastu vaśāḥ vācaḥ na

original: ṣaṣṭhīvacanabhedādi codyaṃ tān prati yuktimat // Pramāṇav_3.65 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī vacana bheda ādi codyam tān prati yuktimat
yat yathā vācaka tvena vaktṛbhiḥ viniyamyate

original: anapekṣitavāhyārtha tat tathā vācakaṃ vacaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.66 //
analyzed: an apekṣita vāhya artha tat tathā vācakam vacaḥ
dārāḥ ṣaṇṇagarī ityādau bheda abheda vyavasthiteḥ

original: khasya svabhāvaḥ khatvaṃ cetyatra vā kiṃ nibandhanam // Pramāṇav_3.67 //
analyzed: khasya svabhāvaḥ kha tvam ca iti atra vā kim nibandhanam
para rūpam sva rūpeṇa yayā saṃvriyate dhiyā
eka artha pratibhāsinyā bhāvān āśritya bhedinaḥ
tayā saṃvṛta nānātvāḥ saṃvṛtyā bhedinaḥ svayam

original: abhedina ivābhānti bhāvā rūpeṇa kenacit // Pramāṇav_3.69 //
analyzed: abhedinaḥ iva ābhānti bhāvāḥ rūpeṇa kenacid
tasyāḥ abhiprāya vaśāt sāmānyam sat prakīrtitam

original: tadasat paramārthena yathā saṅkalpitaṃ tayā // Pramāṇav_3.70 //
analyzed: tat asat paramārthena yathā saṅkalpitam tayā
vyaktayaḥ na anuyanti anya sanuyāyi na bhāsate
jñānāt avyatiriktam vā katham artha antaram vrajet
tasmāt mithyā vikalpaḥ yam artheṣu eka ātma tā grahaḥ
itaretara bhedaḥ sya bījam saṃjñā yad arthikā
eka pratyavamarśa artha jñāna ādye kātha sādhane
bhede pi niyatāḥ kecid svabhāvena indriya ādi vat
jvara ādi śamane kāścid saha pratyekam eva vā

original: dṛṣṭā yathā vauṣadhayo nānātve 'pi na cāparāḥ // Pramāṇav_3.74 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ yathā vā oṣadhayaḥ nānātve na ca aparāḥ
aviśeṣāt na sāmānyam aviśeṣa prasaṅgataḥ
tāsām kṣetra ādi bhede dhrauvyāt ca anupakārataḥ
tad svabhāva grahāt yā dhīḥ tad arthe vā api anarthikā
tasyām yat rū pam ābhāti bāhyam ekam iva anyatas
vyāvṛttam iva nistattvam parīkṣā anaṅga bhāvataḥ
arthāḥ jñāna niviṣṭāḥ te evam vyāvṛtta rūpakāḥ

original: abhinnā iva cābhānti vyāvṛttāḥ punaranyataḥ // Pramāṇav_3.78 //
analyzed: abhinnāḥ iva ca ābhānti vyāvṛttāḥ punar anyatas
te eva teṣām sāmānya samāna ādhāra gocaraiḥ
jñāna abhidhānaiḥ mithyā arthaḥ vyavahāraḥ pratanyate
sa ca sarvaḥ padārthānām anyonya abhāva saṃśrayaḥ
tena anya apoha viṣayaḥ vastum ābhasya ca āśrayaḥ
yatra asti vastu sambandhaḥ yathā ukta anumitau yathā

original: nānyatra bhrāntisāmye 'pi dīpatejo maṇau yathā // Pramāṇav_3.81 //
analyzed: na anyatra bhrānti sāmye dīpa tejaḥ maṇau yathā
tatra eka kāryaḥ na ekaḥ pi tad akārya anya tā āśrayaḥ
eka tvena abhidhā jñānaiḥ vyavahāraḥ pratāryate
tatas na eka kṛt ekaḥ pi tad bhāva paridīpane
yathāprati iti kathitaḥ saḥ avasan api

original: samānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca vastunyasya na sambhavaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.84 //
analyzed: samānādhikaraṇyam ca vastuni asya na sambhavaḥ
bhedaḥ bhedaḥ ca yādṛśaḥ
asamīkṣita tattva arthaḥ yathā loke pratīyate
tam tathā eva samāśritya sādhya sādhanam saṃsthitiḥ
parama artha avatārāya vidvadbhiḥ avakalpyate
saṃsṛjyante na bhidyante svatas rthāḥ pāramārthikāḥ
rūpam ekam anekam ca teṣu buddheḥ upaplavaḥ
bhedaḥ tatas yam bauddhe rthe sāmānyam bhedaḥ iti api
tasya eva ca anya vyāvṛttyā dharma bhedaḥ prakalpyate
sādhya sādhana saṃkalpe vastu darśana hānitaḥ

original: bhedaḥ sāmānyasaṃsṛṣṭo grāhyo nātra svalakṣaṇam // Pramāṇav_3.89 //
analyzed: bhedaḥ sāmānya saṃsṛṣṭaḥ grāhyaḥ na atra sva lakṣaṇam
samāna bhinna ādi ākāraiḥ na tat grāhyam kathaṃcana
bhedānām bahu bhedānām tatra ekasmin ayogataḥ

original: tadrū paṃ sarvato bhinnaṃ tathā tatpratipādikā /
analyzed: tad rū pam sarvatas bhinnam tathā tad pratipādikā

original: na śrutiḥ kalpanā vāsti samānyenaiva vṛttitaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.91 //
analyzed: na śrutiḥ kalpanā vā asti samānyena eva vṛttitaḥ
śabdāḥ saṃketitam prāhuḥ vyavahārāya sa smṛtaḥ

original: tadā svalakṣaṇaṃ nāsti saṃketastena tatra na // Pramāṇav_3.92 //
analyzed: tadā sva lakṣaṇam na asti saṃketaḥ tena tatra na
api pravartteta pumān vijñāya artha kriyā kṣamān
tad sādhanāya iti artheṣu saṃyojyante bhidhā kriyāḥ
tatra anartha kriyā yogyā jātiḥ tadvā analam sa ca
sākṣāt na yojyate kasmāt ānantyāt ced idam samam
tad kāriṇām a tad kāri bheda sāmye na kim kṛtaḥ
tadvat doṣasya sāmyāt ced astu jātiḥ alam parā
tad anya parihāreṇa pravarteta iti ca dhvaniḥ

original: ucyate tena tebhyo 'syāvyavacchede kathaṃ ca saḥ // Pramāṇav_3.96 //
analyzed: ucyate tena tebhyaḥ syāḥ vyavacchede katham ca saḥ
vyavacchedaḥ sti ced asya nanu etāvat prayojanam

original: śabdānāmiti kiṃ tatra sāmānyenāpareṇa vaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.97 //
analyzed: śabdānām iti kim tatra sāmānyena apareṇa vaḥ

original: jñānādyarthakriyāṃ tāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhede 'pi kuvataḥ /
analyzed: jñāna ādi artha kriyām tām tām dṛṣṭvā bhede
arthān s tad anya viśleṣa viṣayaiḥ dhvanibhiḥ saha
saṃyojya pratyabhijñānam kuryāt api anya darśane

original: parasyāpi na sā buddhiḥ sāmānyādeva kevalāt // Pramāṇav_3.99 //
analyzed: parasya api na sā buddhiḥ sāmānyāt eva kevalāt
nityam tanmātra vijñāne vyakti ajñāna prasaṅgataḥ
tadā kadācid sambaddhasya agṛhītasya tadvataḥ
tadvattā niścayaḥ na syāt vyavahāraḥ tatas katham
eka vastu sahāyāḥ ced vyaktayaḥ jñāna kāraṇam

original: tadekaṃ vastu kiṃ tāsāṃ nānātvaṃ samapohati /
analyzed: tat ekam vastu kim tāsām nānātvam samapohati
nānātvāt ca eka vijñāna hetu tā tāsu nā iṣyate
anekam api yat ye kam apekṣya abhinna buddhi kṛt

original: tābhirvināpi pratyakaṃ kriyamāṇāṃ dhiyaṃ prati // Pramāṇav_3.103 //
analyzed: tābhiḥ vinā api pratyakam kriyamāṇām dhiyam prati
tena ekena api sāmarthya tāsām na iti agrahaḥ dhiyā
nīla ādeḥ netra vijñāne pṛthak sāmarthya darśanāt
śakti siddhiḥ samūhe nā evam vyakteḥ kathañcana
tāsām anyatām āpekṣyam tat ced śaktam na kevalam
tat ekam upakuryuḥ tāḥ katham ekām dhiyam ca na

original: kārya ca tāsāṃ prāpto 'sau jananaṃ yadupakriyā // Pramāṇav_3.106 //
analyzed: ca tāsām jananam yat upakriyā
abhinna pratibhāsā dhīḥ na bhinneṣu iti ced matam

original: pratibhāso dhiyā bhinnaḥ samānā iti tadgrahāt // Pramāṇav_3.107 //
analyzed: pratibhāsaḥ dhiyā bhinnaḥ samānāḥ iti tad grahāt
katham tāḥ bhinna dhī grāhyāḥ samāḥ ced eka kāryatā

original: sādṛśyaṃ nanu dhīḥ kārya tāsāṃ sā ca vibhidyate // Pramāṇav_3.108 //
analyzed: sādṛśyam nanu dhīḥ kārya tāsām sā ca vibhidyate
eka pratyavamarśasya hetu tvāt dhīra bhedinī
eka dhī hetu bhāvena vyaktīnām api abhinna tā
sā ca a tad kārya viśleṣaḥ tad anyasya anuvartinaḥ
adṛṣṭeḥ pratiṣedhāt ca saṃketaḥ tad vid arthikaḥ
akārya kṛti tad kāri tulya rūpa avabhāsinīm
dhiyam vastu pṛthagbhāva mātra bījām anarthikām
janayanti api a tad kāri parihāra aṅga bhāvataḥ
vastu bheda āśrayāt ca arthe na visaṃvādikā matā
tatas nyā apoha viṣayā tad kartṛ āśrita bhāvataḥ
a vṛkṣa vyatirekeṇa vṛkṣa artha grahaṇe dvayam
anyonya āśrayam iti eka graha abhāve dvaya agrahaḥ
saṅketa asambhavaḥ tasmāt iti kecid pracakṣate

original: teṣāmavṛkṣāḥ saṃṅkete vyavacchinnā na vā yadi // Pramāṇav_3.115 //
analyzed: teṣām avṛkṣāḥ saṃṅkete vyavacchinnāḥ na vā yadi
vyavacchinnāḥ katham jñātāḥ prāk vṛkṣa grahaṇāt ṛte
a nirākaraṇe teṣām saṃkete vyavahāriṇām
na syāt tad parihāreṇa pravṛttiḥ vṛ kṣa bheda vat

original: avidhāya niṣidhyānyat pradarśyaikaṃ puraḥ sthitam // Pramāṇav_3.117 //
analyzed: a vidhāya niṣidhya anyat pradarśya ekam puras sthitam
vṛkṣaḥ yam iti saṃketaḥ kriyate tat prapadyate

original: vyavahāre 'pi tenāyamadoṣa iti cet taruḥ // Pramāṇav_3.118 //
analyzed: vyavahāre pi tena ayam adoṣaḥ iti ced taruḥ
ayam api ayam eva iti prasaṅgaḥ na nivartate

original: ekapratyavamarśākhye jñāne ekatra hi sthitaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.119 //
analyzed: eka pratyavamarśa ākhye jñāne ekatra hi sthitaḥ
prapattā tad a tad hetūn arthān vibhajate svayam

original: tadbuddhivartino bhāvān bhāto hetutayā dhiyaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.120 //
analyzed: tad buddhi vartinaḥ bhāvān bhātaḥ hetutayā dhiyaḥ
ahetu rūpa vikala aneka rūpān iva svayam
bhedena pratipadyeta iti uktiḥ bhede niyujyate

original: taṃ tasyā pratiyatī dhīḥ bhrāntyaikaṃ vastvivekṣate /
analyzed: tam pratiyatī dhīḥ bhrāntyā ekam vastu iva īkṣate
kvacid niveśanāya arthe vinivartya kutaścana
buddheḥ prayujyate śabdaḥ tad arthasya avadhāraṇāt
vyarthaḥ nyathā prayogaḥ syāt tad jñeya ādi padeṣu api
vyavahāra upanīteṣu vyavacchedyaḥ sti kaścana

original: niveśanaṃ ca yo yasmād bhidyate vinivartya tam // Pramāṇav_3.124 //
analyzed: niveśanam ca yaḥ yasmāt bhidyate vinivartya tam
tad bhede bhidyamānānām samāna ākāra bhāsini

original: sa cāyamanyavyāvṛttyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.125 //
analyzed: sa ca ayam anya vyāvṛttyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ

original: kaścid bhāga iti prokto rūpaṃ nāsyāpi kiñcina /
analyzed: kaścid bhāgaḥ iti proktaḥ rūpam na asya api
tad gatau eva śabdebhyaḥ gamyate

original: na tatra gamyate kaścid viśiṣṭaḥ kenacit paraḥ /
analyzed: na tatra gamyate kaścid viśiṣṭaḥ kenacid paraḥ

original: na cāpi śabdo dvayakṛdanyonyābhāva ityasau // Pramāṇav_3.127 //
analyzed: na ca api śabdaḥ dvaya kṛt anyonya abhāvaḥ iti asau
arūpaḥ darśanam buddhi viplavaḥ
tena eva aparama arthaḥ sau anyathā na hi vastunaḥ
vyāvṛttiḥ vastu bhavati
eka artha śleṣa vicchedaḥ ekaḥ vyāpriyate dhvaniḥ

original: liṅgaṃ vā tatra vicchinnaṃ vācyaṃ vastu na kiñcana /
analyzed: liṅgam vā tatra vicchinnam vācyam vastu na kiñcana
yasya abhidhānataḥ vastu sāmarthyāt akhile gatiḥ
bhavet nānā phalaḥ śabdaḥ eka ādhāraḥ bhavati atas
vicchedam sūcayan ekam a pratikṣipya vartate

original: yadānyat tena sa vyāpta ekatvena ca bhāsate /
analyzed: yadā anyat tena sa vyāptaḥ eka tvena ca bhāsate
sāmānadhikaraṇyam syāt tadā buddhayanurodhataḥ
vastu dharmasya saṃsparśaḥ viccheda karaṇe dhvaneḥ

original: syāt satyaṃ sa hi tatreti naikavastvabhidhāyini // Pramāṇav_3.133 //
analyzed: syāt satyam sa hi tatra iti na eka vastu abhidhāyini
buddha avabhāsamānasya dṛśyasya abhāva niścayāt
tena anya apoha viṣayāḥ proktāḥ sāmānya agocarāḥ
śabdāḥ ca buddhayaḥ ca eva vastuni eṣām asambhavāt

original: ekatvād vasturūpasya bhinnarūpā matiḥ kutaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.135 //
analyzed: eka tvāt vastu rūpasya bhinna rūpā matiḥ kutas
anvaya vyatirekau vā na ekasya eka artha gocarau
abheda vyavahārāḥ ca bhede syuḥ a nibandhanāḥ
sarvatra bhāvat vyāvṛtteḥ na ete doṣāḥ prasaṅginaḥ
eka akāryeṣu bhāveṣu tad kārya paricodane
gaurava aśakti vaiphalyāt bheda ākhyāyāḥ samā śrutiḥ
kṛtā bṛddhaiḥ a tad kārya vyāvṛtti vinibandhanā
na bhāve sarva bhāvānām sva svabhāva vyavasthiteḥ

original: yad rūpaṃ śābaleyasya bāhuleyasya nāsti tat // Pramāṇav_3.139 //
analyzed: yat rūpam śābaleyasya bāhuleyasya na asti tat
a tad kārya parāvṛttiḥ dvayoḥ api ca vidyate

original: arthābhedena ca vinā śabdābhedo na yujyate // Pramāṇav_3.140 //
analyzed: artha abhedena ca vinā śabda abhedaḥ na yujyate
tasmāt tad kārya tā api iṣṭā tad kāryāt eva bhinna tā

original: cakṣu rādau yathā rūpavijñānaikaphale kvacit // Pramāṇav_3.141 //
analyzed: cakṣu ra ādau yathā rūpa vijñāna eka phale kvacid
tad kārya codana sambhave sati

original: sakṛt sarvapratītyartha kaścit sāṃketikīṃ śrutim // Pramāṇav_3.142 //
analyzed: sakṛt sarva pratīti artha kaścid sāṃketikīm śrutim
kuryāt ṛte tad rū pa sāmānyāt vyatirekiṇaḥ
eka vṛtteḥ anekaḥ yadi eka śrutimān bhavet
vṛttiḥ ādheyatā vyaktiḥ iti tasmin na yujyate
nityasya an upakārya sva anna ādhāraḥ pravisarpataḥ
śaktiḥ tad deśa jananam kuṇḍa ādeḥ badara ādiṣu
na sambhavati sā api atra tad abhāve pi avasthiteḥ
na sthitiḥ sā api ayuktā eva bheda abheda vivecane
vijñāna utpatti yogya tvāya ātmani anya anurodhi yat

original: tad vyaṅgyaṃ yogyatāyāśca kāraṇaṃ kārakaṃ matam /
analyzed: tat vyaṅgyam yogyatāyāḥ ca kāraṇam kārakam matam

original: prāgevāsya ca yogyatve tadapekṣā na yujyate // Pramāṇav_3.147 //
analyzed: prāk eva asya ca yogya tve tad apekṣā na yujyate
sāmānyasya avikāryasya tat sāmānyavataḥ kutas

original: añjanāderiva vyakteḥ saṃskāro nendriyasya ca // Pramāṇav_3.148 //
analyzed: añjana ādeḥ iva vyakteḥ saṃskāraḥ na indriyasya ca
pratipatteḥ abhinna tvāt tad bhāva abhāva kālayoḥ

original: vyañjakasya ca jātīnāṃ jātimattā yadīṣyate // Pramāṇav_3.149 //
analyzed: vyañjakasya ca jātīnām jātimat tā yadi iṣyate
prāptaḥ go tva ādinā tadvān pradīpa ādiḥ prakāśakaḥ

original: vyakteranyātha vānanyā yeṣāṃ jātistu vidyate // Pramāṇav_3.150 //
analyzed: vyakteḥ anyā atha vā ananyā yeṣām jātiḥ tu vidyate
teṣām vyaktiṣu apūrvāsu katham sāmānya buddhayaḥ
ekatra tat sataḥ nyatra darśana asambhavāt sataḥ
ananya tve nvaya abhāvāt anya tve pi anapāśrayāt

original: na yāti na ca tatrāsīdasti paścānna cāṃśavat // Pramāṇav_3.152 //
analyzed: na yāti na ca tatra āsīt asti paścāt na ca aṃśavat
jahāti na ādhāram aho vyasana santatiḥ
anyatra varttamānasya tatas nyasthāna janmani
svasmāt acalataḥ sthānāt vṛttiḥ iti ati yuktimat

original: yatrāsau varttate bhāvastena sambadhyate 'pi na // Pramāṇav_3.154 //
analyzed: yatra asau varttate bhāvaḥ tena sambadhyate na
tad deśinaḥ ca vyāpnoti kim api etat mahā adbhutam

original: vyaktyaivaikatra sā vyaktāabhedāt sarvatragā yadi // Pramāṇav_3.155 //
analyzed: vyaktyā evā ekatra sā vyaktā abhedāt sarvatragā yadi
sarvatra dṛśyeta abhedāt sā api na vyakta apekṣiṇī

original: byañjakasyāpratītau na vyaṅgyaṃ samyak pratīyate // Pramāṇav_3.156 //
analyzed: byañjakasya apratītau na vyaṅgyam samyak pratīyate
viparyayaḥ punar kasmāt iṣṭaḥ sāmānya tadvatoḥ
pācaka ādiṣu abhinnena vinā api arthena vācakaḥ

original: bhedānna hetuḥ karmāsya na jātiḥ karmasaṃśrayāt /
analyzed: bhedāt na hetuḥ karma asya na jātiḥ karma saṃśrayāt
śruti antara nimitta tvāt sthiti abhāvāt ca karmaṇaḥ
asambandhāt na sāmānyam na ayuktam śabda kāraṇāt
ati prasaṃgāt karma api na asat jñāna abhidhānayoḥ
anaimittika tā āpatteḥ na ca śaktiḥ ananvayāt

original: sāmānyaṃ pācakatvādi yadi prāgeva tad bhavet // Pramāṇav_3.160 //
analyzed: sāmānyam pācaka tva ādi yadi prāk eva tat bhavet
vyaktam sat tad ivat no ced na paścāt aviśeṣataḥ
kriyā upakāra apekṣasya vyañjaka tve vikāriṇaḥ
na apekṣā atiśaye pi asya kṣaṇika tvāt kriyā kutas

original: tulye bhede yayā jāti pratyāsattyā prasarpati // Pramāṇav_3.162 //
analyzed: tulye bhede yayā jāti pratyāsattyā prasarpati
kvacid nā anyatra sā evā astu śabda jñāna nibandhanam

original: na nivṛttiṃ vihāyāsti yadi bhāvānvayo 'paraḥ // Pramāṇav_3.163 //
analyzed: na nivṛttim vihāya asti yadi paraḥ
ekasya kāryam anyasya na syāt atyanta bhedataḥ
yadi eka ātma tayā anekaḥ kāryasya ekasya kārakaḥ

original: ātmaikatrāpi vā so 'stīti vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā ekatra api vā saḥ sti iti vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ

original: napaityabhinnaṃ tad rūpaṃ viśeṣāḥ khalvapāyinaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.165 //
analyzed: napaiti abhinnam tat rūpam viśeṣāḥ khalva pāyinaḥ
eka apāye phala abhāvāt viśeṣebhyaḥ tad udbhavaḥ

original: sa pāramārthiko bhāvo ya evārthakriyākṣamaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.166 //
analyzed: sa pāramārthikaḥ bhāvaḥ yaḥ eva artha kriyā kṣamaḥ

original: sa ca nānveti yonveti na tasmāt kāryasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca na anveti yaḥ nu eti na tasmāt kārya sambhavaḥ

original: tenātmanāpi bhede hi hetuḥ kaścinna cāparaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.167 //
analyzed: tena ātmanā api bhede hi hetuḥ kaścid na ca aparaḥ
svabhāvaḥ yama bhede tu syātām na uśa udbhavau sakṛt

original: bhedo 'pi tena naivaṃ cet ya ekasmin vinaśyati // Pramāṇav_3.168 //
analyzed: tena na evam ced yaḥ ekasmin vinaśyati

original: tiṣṭhatyātmā na tasyāto na syāt sāmānyabhedadhīḥ /
analyzed: tiṣṭhati ātmā na tasya atas na syāt sāmānya bheda dhīḥ
nivṛtteḥ niḥsvabhāva tvāt na asthāna sthāna kalpanā
upaplavaḥ ca sāmānya dhiyaḥ tena api adūṣaṇā

original: yat tasya janakaṃ rūpaṃ tato 'nyo janakaḥ katham // Pramāṇav_3.170 //
analyzed: yat tasya janakam rūpam tatas nyaḥ janakaḥ katham

original: bhinnā viśeṣā janakāḥ astyabhedo 'pi teṣu cet /
analyzed: bhinnāḥ viśeṣāḥ janakāḥ teṣu ced

original: tena te 'janakāḥ proktāḥ pratibhāso 'pi bhedakaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.171 //
analyzed: tena te janakāḥ proktāḥ pratibhāsaḥ pi bhedakaḥ
an anya bhāj saḥ eva arthaḥ tasya pare

original: tat kāryakāraṇaṃ coktaṃ tat svalakṣaṇamiṣyate // Pramāṇav_3.172 //
analyzed: tat kārya kāraṇam ca uktam tat sva lakṣaṇam iṣyate
tad tyāga āpti phalāḥ sarvāḥ puruṣāṇām pravṛttayaḥ

original: yathā bhedāviśeṣe 'pi na sarva sarvasādhanam // Pramāṇav_3.173 //
analyzed: yathā bheda aviśeṣe na sarva sarva sādhanam
tathā bheda aviśeṣe na sarva sarva sādhanam

original: bhede hi kārakaṃ kiñcid vastudharmatayā bhavet // Pramāṇav_3.174 //
analyzed: bhede hi kārakam kiñcid vastu dharma tayā bhavet
abhede tu virudhyate tasya ekasya kriyā akriye
bhedaḥ u pi asti akriyātaḥ ced na kuryuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ

original: paryāyeṇātha kartṛtvaṃ sa kiṃ tasyaiva vastunaḥ /
analyzed: paryāyeṇa atha kartṛ tvam sa kim tasya eva vastunaḥ

original: atyantabhedābhedau tu syātāṃ tadvati vastuni // Pramāṇav_3.176 //
analyzed: atyanta bheda abhedau tu syātām tadvati vastuni
anyonyam vā tayoḥ bhedaḥ sadṛśa asadṛśa ātmanoḥ

original: tayorapi bhaved bhedo yadi yenātmanā tayoḥ // Pramāṇav_3.177 //
analyzed: tayoḥ api bhavet bhedaḥ yadi yena ātmanā tayoḥ
bhedaḥ sāmānyam iti etat yadi bhedaḥ tadā ātmanā

original: bheda eva tathā ca syānniḥsāmānyaviśeṣatā // Pramāṇav_3.178 //
analyzed: bhedaḥ eva tathā ca syāt niḥsāmānya viśeṣa tā
bheda sāmānyayoḥ yadvat ghaṭa ādīnām parasparam
yam ātmānam puraskṛtya puruṣaḥ yam pravartate
tad sādhya phala vāñchāvān bheda abhedau tad āśrayau

original: cintyete svātmanā bhedo vyāvṛttyā ca samānatā // Pramāṇav_3.180 //
analyzed: cintyete sva ātmanā bhedaḥ vyāvṛttyā ca samāna tā
asti eva vastu na anveti pravṛtti ādi prasaṅgataḥ
etena eva yat ahrīkāḥ kim api aślīlam ākulam
pralapanti pratikṣiptam tat api ekānta sambhavāt
sarvasya ubhaya rūpa tve tad viśeṣa nirākṛteḥ
coditaḥ dadhi khāda iti kim uṣṭram na abhidhāvati

original: athāstyatiśayaḥ kaścid yena bhedena varttate // Pramāṇav_3.183 //
analyzed: atha asti atiśayaḥ kaścid yena bhedena varttate

original: sa eva dadhi so 'nyatra nāstītyanubhayaṃ param /
analyzed: saḥ eva dadhi saḥ nyatra na asti iti anubhayam param

original: sarvātmatve ca sarveṣāṃ bhinnau syātāṃ na dhīdhvanī // Pramāṇav_3.184 //
analyzed: sarva ātma tve ca sarveṣām bhinnau syātām na dhī dhvanī
bheda saṃhāra vādasya tad abhedāt asambhavaḥ
rūpa abhāvāt abhāvasya śabdāḥ rūpa abhidhāyinaḥ
na āśaṃkyāḥ eva siddhāḥ te tas vyavaccheda vācakāḥ

original: upādhibhedāpekṣo vā svabhāvaḥ kevalo 'tha vā // Pramāṇav_3.186 //
analyzed: upādhi bheda apekṣaḥ vā svabhāvaḥ vā
ucyate sādhya siddh yartha nāśe kārya tva sattva vat

original: sattāsvabhāvo hetuścet sā sattā sādhyate katham // Pramāṇav_3.187 //
analyzed: sattā svabhāvaḥ hetuḥ ced sā sattā sādhyate katham
ananvayaḥ hi bhedānām vyāhataḥ hetu sādhyayoḥ
bhāva upādāna mātre tu sādhye sāmānya dharmiṇi

original: na kaścidarthaḥ siddhaḥ syādaniṣiddhaṃ ca tādṛśam /
analyzed: na kaścid arthaḥ siddhaḥ syāt aniṣiddham ca tādṛśam
upātta bhede sādhye smin bhavet hetuḥ ananvayaḥ

original: sattāyāṃ tena sādhyāyāṃ viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavet /
analyzed: sattāyām tena sādhyāyām viśeṣaḥ sādhitaḥ bhavet
aparāmṛṣṭa tad bhede vastu mātre tu sādhane
tad mātra vyāpinaḥ sādhyasya anvayaḥ na vihanyate
na asiddhe bhāva dharmaḥ sti vyabhicārī ubhaya āśrayaḥ

original: dharmo viruddho 'bhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham /
analyzed: dharmaḥ viruddhaḥ bhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham

original: siddhaḥ svabhāvo gamako vyāpakastasya niścitaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.192 //
analyzed: siddhaḥ svabhāvaḥ gamakaḥ vyāpakaḥ tasya niścitaḥ
gamyaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya ayam nivṛttau vā nivartakaḥ
anitya tve yathā kāryam akārya vā avināśini
ahetu tvāt vināśasya svabhāvāt anubandhi tā
sāpekṣāṇām hi bhāvānām na avaśyambhāvitā īkṣyate
bāhulye hi tad hetoḥ bhavet kvacid asambhavaḥ
etena vyabhicāri tvam uktam kārya avyavasthiteḥ
sarveṣām nāśa hetūnām hetumat nāśa vādinām
asāmarthyāt ca tad hetoḥ bhavati eva svabhāvataḥ
yatra nāma bhavati asmāt anyatra api svabhāvataḥ
yā kācid bhāva viṣayā anumitiḥ dvividhā eva sā
sva sādhye kārya bhāvābhyām sambandha niyamāt tayoḥ
pravṛtteḥ buddhi pūrva tvāt tad bhāva anupalambhane
pravarttitavyam na iti ukta anupalabdheḥ pramāṇa tā
śāstra adhikāre sambaddhāḥ bahavaḥ rthāḥ atīndriyāḥ
aliṅgāḥ ca katham teṣām abhāvaḥ nupalabdhitaḥ
sat asat niścaya phalā na iti syāt vā apramāṇa tā
pramāṇam api kācid syāt liṅga atiśaya bhāvinī
svabhāva jñāpaka ajñānasya ayam nyāyaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
kārye tu kāraka ajñānam bhāvasya eva sādhakam
svabhāva anupalambhaḥ ca svabhāve rthasya liṅgini
tad abhāvaḥ pratīyeta hetunā yadi kenacid
dṛśyasya darśana abhāva kāraṇa asambhave sati
bhāvasya anupalabdhasya bhāva abhāvaḥ pratīyate

original: viruddhasya ca bhāvasya bhāve tadbhāvabādhanāt // Pramāṇav_3.204 //
analyzed: viruddhasya ca bhāvasya bhāve tad bhāva bādhanāt
tad viruddha upalabdhau syāt asattāyāḥ viniścayaḥ
śabda arthaḥ trividhaḥ dharmī bhāva abhāva ubhaya āśrayaḥ
tasmin bhāva anupādāne sādhye sya anupalambhanam
tathā hetuḥ na śabda prayogataḥ
paramārtha ekatāna tve śabdānām anibandhanā
na syāt pravṛttiḥ artheṣu darśana antara bhediṣu
atīta ajātayoḥ vā api na ca syāt anṛta artha tā
vācaḥ kasyāścid iti eṣā baiddha artha viṣayā matā
śabda artha apahnave sādhye dharma ādhāra nirākṛteḥ

original: na sādhyaḥ samudāyaḥ syāt siddhau dharmaśca kevalaḥ /
analyzed: na sādhyaḥ samudāyaḥ syāt siddhau dharmaḥ ca kevalaḥ
sat asat pakṣa bhedena śabda artha anapavādibhiḥ

original: vastveva cityate h yatra pratibaddhaḥ phalodayaḥ /
analyzed: vastu eva cityate h yatra pratibaddhaḥ phala udayaḥ
artha kriyā samarthasya vicāraiḥ kim parīkṣayā

original: ṣaṇḍhasya rūpe vairūpye kāminyāḥ kiṃ parīkṣayā /
analyzed: ṣaṇḍhasya rūpe vairūpye kāminyāḥ kim parīkṣayā
śabda arthaḥ kalpanā jñāna viṣaya tvena kalpitaḥ
dharmaḥ vastu āśraya asiddhiḥ asya uktaḥ nyāya vādinā
nāntarīyaka tā bhāvāt śabdānām vastubhiḥ saha
na artha siddhiḥ tatas te hi vaktṛ abhiprāya sūcakāḥ
āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt anumāna tā
sambaddha anuguṇa upāyam puruṣa artha abhidhāyakam
parīkṣā adhikṛtam vākyam atas na adhikṛtam param
pratakṣeṇa anumānena dvividhena api a bādhanam
dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa athairoḥ asya avisaṃvādaḥ tad arthayoḥ
āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt anumāna tā
buddheḥ agatyā abhihitā niṣiddhā api asya gocare
heya upādeya tattvasya sa upāyasya prasiddhitaḥ
pradhāna artha avisaṃvādāt anumānam paratra vā
puruṣa atiśaya apekṣam yathārtham apare biduḥ

original: iṣṭo 'yamarthaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyaḥ so 'tiśayo yadi // Pramāṇav_3.219 //
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ yam arthaḥ pratyetum śakyaḥ saḥ u tiśayaḥ yadi
ayam evam na vā iti anya doṣā nirdoṣa tā api vā
durlabha tvāt pramāṇānām durbodhā iti apare viduḥ
sarveṣām sa vipakṣa tvāt nirhrāsa atiśaya śritām
sātmībhāvāt tad abhyāsāt dīyeran āsravāḥ kvacid
nirupadrava bhūta atha svabhāvasya viparyayaiḥ
na bādhā yatna vapve pi buddheḥ tad pakṣapātataḥ
sarvāsām doṣa jātīnām jātiḥ sat kāya darśanāt
sā avidyā tatra tad snehaḥ tasmāt dveṣa ādi sambhavaḥ
mohaḥ nidānam doṣāṇām atas eva abhidhīyate
satkāya dṛṣṭiḥ anyatra tad prahāṇe prahāṇataḥ
girām mithyātva hetūnām doṣāṇām puruṣa āśrayāt
apauruṣeyam satya artham iti kecid pracakṣate
girām satya tva hetūnām guṇānām puruṣa āśrayāt

original: apauruṣeyaṃ mithyārtha kiṃ netyanye pracakṣate // Pramāṇav_3.226 //
analyzed: apauruṣeyam mithyā artha kim nā iti anye pracakṣate
artha jñāna pana hetuḥ hi saṃketaḥ puruṣa āśrayaḥ
girām apauruṣeya tve pi atas mithyātva sambhavaḥ
sambandha apauruṣeya tve syāt pratītiḥ asaṃvidaḥ
saṃketāt tad abhivyaktau asamarthā anya kalpanā
girām eka artha niyame na syāt artha antare gatiḥ
aneka artha abhisambandhe viruddha vyakti sambhavaḥ
apauruṣeya tāyāḥ ca vyarthā syāt parikalpanā
vācyaḥ ca hetuḥ bhinnānām sambandhasya vyavasthiteḥ
a saṃskārya tayā pumbhiḥ sarvathā syāt nirartha tā
saṃskāra upagame mukhyam gajasnānam idam bhavet
sambandhinām anitya tvāt na sambandhe sti nitya tā
nityasya an upakārya tvāt akurvāṇaḥ ca na āśrayaḥ
sa śabdānām saṃskāryaḥ puruṣaiḥ dhiyā
arthaiḥ eva saha utpāde na svabhāva viparyayaḥ

original: śabdeṣu yuktaḥ sambandhe nāyaṃ doṣo vikalpite /
analyzed: śabdeṣu yuktaḥ sambandhe na ayam doṣaḥ vikalpite
nitya tvāt āśraya apāye pi anāśaḥ yadi jāti vat
nitya iṣu āśraya sāmathrya kim yena iṣṭaḥ sa ca āśrayaḥ
jñāna utpādana hetūnām sambandhāt sahakāriṇām
tad utpādana yogya tvena utpattiḥ vyaktiḥ iṣyate
ghaṭa ādiṣu api yukti jñaiḥ aviśeṣe vikāriṇām

original: vyañjakaiḥ svaiḥ kṛtaḥ ko 'rtho vyaktāstaiste yato matāḥ /
analyzed: vyañjakaiḥ svaiḥ kṛtaḥ kaḥ rthaḥ vyaktāḥ taiḥ te yatas matāḥ

original: sambandhasya ca vastutve syād bhedād buddhicitratā // Pramāṇav_3.237 //
analyzed: sambandhasya ca vastu tve syāt bhedāt buddhi citra tā
tābhyām abhede tau eva na atas nyā vastunaḥ gatiḥ
bhinna tvāt vastu rūpasya sabandhaḥ kalpanā kṛtaḥ

original: sad dravyaṃ syāt parādhīnaṃ sambandho 'nyasya vā katham /
analyzed: sat dravyam syāt para adhīnam sambandhaḥ nyasya vā katham

original: varṇā nirarthakāḥ santaḥ padādi parikalpitam // Pramāṇav_3.239 //
analyzed: varṇāḥ nirarthakāḥ santaḥ pada ādi parikalpitam
avastuni katham vṛttiḥ sambandhasya asya vastunaḥ
apauruṣeya tā api iṣṭā kartṛṇām asmṛteḥ kila
santi asya api anuvaktāraḥ iti dhik vyāpakam tamaḥ
yathā ayam anyatas śrutvā na imam varṇa pada kramam
vastum samarthaḥ puruṣaḥ tathā anyaḥ pīti kaścana

original: anyo vā racito granthaḥ sampradāyād ṛte paraiḥ // Pramāṇav_3.242 //
analyzed: anyaḥ vā racitaḥ granthaḥ sampradāyāt ṛte paraiḥ
dṛṣṭaḥ kaḥ abhihitaḥ yena saḥ pi evam na anumīyate
yad jātīyaḥ yatas siddhaḥ saḥ viśiṣṭaḥ gni kāṣṭha vat
adṛṣṭa hetuḥ api anyaḥ tad bhavaḥ sampratīyate
tatra a pradarśya ye bhedam kārya sāmānya darśanāt
hetavaḥ pravitanyante sarve te vyabhicāriṇaḥ
sarvathā anādi tā sidhyet evam na a puruṣa āśrayaḥ
tasmāt apauruṣeya tve syāt anyaḥ pi anara āśrayaḥ
mleccha divya vahārāṇām nāstikya vacasām api
anādi tvāt tathā bhāvaḥ pūrva saṃskāra santateḥ

original: tādṛśe 'pauruṣeyatve kaḥ siddhe 'pi guṇo bhavet // Pramāṇav_3.247 //
analyzed: tādṛśe pauruṣeya tve kaḥ siddhe guṇaḥ bhavet
artha saṃskāra bhedānām darśanāt saṃśayaḥ punar

original: anyāviśeṣād varṇānāṃ sādhane ki phalaṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_3.248 //
analyzed: anya aviśeṣāt varṇānām sādhane ki phalam bhavet
vākyam bhinnam na varṇebhyaḥ vidyate n upalambhataḥ
aneka avayava ātma tve pṛthak teṣām nirartha tā
a tad rūpe ca tādrūpyam kalpitam siṃha tā ādi vat
pratyekam sārthaka tve pi mithyā aneka tva kalpanā
eka avayava gatyā ca vākya artha pratipad bhavet

original: sakṛcchrutau ca sarveṣā kālabhedo na yujyate // Pramāṇav_3.251 //
analyzed: sakṛt śrutau ca sarveṣām kāla bhedaḥ na yujyate
eka tve pi hi abhinnasya kramaśas gati asambhavāt

original: anityaṃ yatnasambhūtaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ kathaṃ na tat // Pramāṇav_3.252 //
analyzed: anityam yatna sambhūtam pauruṣeyam katham na tat
nitya upalabdhiḥ nitya tve pi anāvaraṇa sambhavāt
aśrutiḥ vikala tvāt ced kasyacid sahakāriṇaḥ
kāmam anya pratīkṣāḥ tu niyamaḥ tu virudhyate
sarvatra anupalambhaḥ syāt teṣām avyāpi tā yadi
sarveṣām upalambhaḥ syāt yugapad vyāpitā yadi
saṃskṛtasya upalambhe ca kaḥ saṃskarttā avikāriṇaḥ

original: indriyasya syāt saṃskāraḥ śrṛṇuyānnikhilaṃ ca tat /
analyzed: indriyasya syāt saṃskāraḥ śrṛṇuyāt nikhilam ca tat
saṃskāra bheda bhinna tvāt eka artha niyamaḥ yadi
aneka śabda saṃdhāte śrutiḥ kalakale katham

original: dhvanathaḥ kevalaṃ tatra śrū yante cenna vācakāḥ // Pramāṇav_3.257 //
analyzed: dhvanathaḥ kevalam tatra śrū yante ced na vācakāḥ
dhvanibhyaḥ bhinnam asti iti śraddheyam ati bahu idam

original: sthiteṣvanyeṣu śabdeṣu śrūyate vācakaḥ katham // Pramāṇav_3.258 //
analyzed: sthiteṣu anyeṣu śabdeṣu śrūyate vācakaḥ katham
katham vā śakti niyamāt bhinna dhvani gatiḥ bhavet

original: dhvanayaḥ sammatā yaiste doṣaiḥ kairapyavācakāḥ // Pramāṇav_3.259 //
analyzed: dhvanayaḥ sammatāḥ yaiḥ te doṣaiḥ kaiḥ api avācakāḥ
dhvanibhiḥ vyajyamāne smin vācake katham na te
varṇa ānupūrvī vākyam ced na varṇānām abhedataḥ
teṣām ca na vyavasthānam krama antara virodhataḥ
anitya avyāpi tāyām ca doṣaḥ prāk eva kīrtitaḥ
vākyam na nitya vyakti nirākṛteḥ
vyāpāra deva tad siddhe kāraṇānām ca kārya tā
sva jñānena anya dhī hetuḥ siddhe rthe vyañjakaḥ mataḥ

original: yathā dīpo 'nyathā vāpi ko viśeṣo 'sya kārakāt /
analyzed: yathā dīpaḥ nyathā vā api kaḥ kārakāt
karaṇānām samagrāṇām vyāpārāt upalabdhitaḥ
niyamena ca kārya tvam vyañjake tad asambhavāt

original: tadrū pāvaraṇānāṃ ca vyaktiste vigamo yadi // Pramāṇav_3.265 //
analyzed: ca vyaktiḥ te vigamaḥ yadi
abhāve karaṇa grāma sāmarthya kim nu tat bhavet
śabda viśeṣāt anyeṣām api vyaktiḥ prasajyate
tathā amyupagame sarva kāraṇānām nirartha tā
sādhanam pratyabhijñānam sat prayoga ādi yat matam
anudāharaṇam sarva bhāvānām kṣaṇa bhaṅgataḥ
dūṣyaḥ ku hetuḥ anyaḥ buddheḥ apuruṣa āśraye
bādhā abhyupeta pratyakṣa pratīta anumitaiḥ samam

original: ānupūrvyāśca varṇebhyo bhedaḥ sfoṭena cintitaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.269 //
analyzed: ānupūrvyāḥ ca varṇebhyaḥ bhedaḥ sfoṭena cintitaḥ
kalpanā āropitā sā syāt katham vā a puruṣa āśrayā
sattā mātra anubandhi tvāt nāśasya anitya tā dhvaneḥ
agneḥ artha antara utpattau bhavet kāṣṭhasya darśanam

original: avināśāt sa evāsya vināśa iti cet katham // Pramāṇav_3.271 //
analyzed: avināśāt saḥ eva asya vināśaḥ iti ced katham
anyaḥ nyasya vināśaḥ u stu kāṣṭham kasmāt na dṛśyate
tad parigrahataḥ ced na tena anāvaraṇam yatas
vināśasya vināśi tvam syāt utpatteḥ tatas punar
kāṣṭhasya darśanam hantṛ ghāte caitrā punarbhavaḥ
yathā atra api evam iti ced hantuḥ nā amaraṇa tvataḥ

original: ananyatve vināśasya syānnāśaḥ kāṣṭhameva tu // Pramāṇav_3.274 //
analyzed: ananya tve vināśasya syāt nāśaḥ kāṣṭham eva tu
tasya tattvāt ahetu tvam na atas nyā vidyate gatiḥ
ahetu tve pi nāśasya nitya tvāt bhāva nāśayoḥ
sahabhāva prasaṅgaḥ ced asataḥ nitya tā kutas
asattve bhāva nāśi tva prasaṅgaḥ na yujyate
nāśena yasmāt bhāvasya na vināśanam iṣyate

original: naśyan bhāvo 'parāpekṣa iti tajjñāpanāya sā // Pramāṇav_3.277 //
analyzed: naśyan para apekṣaḥ iti tad jñāpanāya sā
avasthā hetuḥ uktā asyāḥ bhedam āropya cetasā
svatas pi bhāve bhāvasya vikalpaḥ ced ayam samaḥ

original: na tasya kiñcid bhavati na bhavatyeva kevalam /
analyzed: na tasya kiñcid bhavati na bhavati eva kevalam

original: bhāve hyeṣa vikalpaḥ syād vidyervastvanuridhataḥ // Pramāṇav_3.279 //
analyzed: bhāve hi eṣa vikalpaḥ syāt
na bhāvaḥ bhavati iti uktam abhāvaḥ bhavati iti na

original: apekṣyeta paraḥ kārya yadi vidyeta kiñcana // Pramāṇav_3.280 //
analyzed: apekṣyeta paraḥ kārya yadi vidyeta kiñcana
yat akiñcitkaram vastu kim kenacid apekṣyate
etena ahetuka tve pi hi a bhūtvā nāśa bhāvataḥ
sattā nāaśi tva doṣasya pratyākhyātam prasañjanam

original: yathā keṣāñcideveṣṭaḥ pratigho janmināṃ yathā // Pramāṇav_3.282 //
analyzed: yathā keṣāñcid evā iṣṭaḥ pratighaḥ janminām yathā
nāśaḥ svabhāvaḥ bhāvānām na anutpattimatām yadi
svabhāva niyamāt hetoḥ svabhāva niyamaḥ phale
na anitye rūpa bhedaḥ sti bhedakānām abhāvataḥ
pratyākhyeyā atas eva eṣām sambandhasya api nitya tā
sambandha doṣaiḥ prāc uktaiḥ śabda śaktiḥ ca dūṣitā
na apauruṣeyam iti eva yathā artha jñāna sādhanam
dṛṣṭaḥ nyathā api vahni ādiḥ aduṣṭaḥ puruṣa āgasā

original: na jñānahetutaiva syāt tasminnakṛtake mate // Pramāṇav_3.286 //
analyzed: na jñāna hetu tā eva syāt tasmin akṛtake mate

original: nityebhyo vastusāmarthyāt na hi janmāsti kasyacit /
analyzed: nityebhyaḥ vastu sāmarthyāt na hi janma asti kasyacid
vikalpa vāsanā udbhūtāḥ samāropita gocarāḥ
jāyante buddhayaḥ tatra kevalam na artha gocarāḥ
mithyātvam kṛtakeṣu eva dṛṣṭam iti akṛtam vacaḥ
satya artha vyatirekasya virodhi vyāpanāt yadi
hetau asambhave nu kte bhāvaḥ tasya api śaṅkyate
viruddhānām padārthānām api vyāpaka darśanāt
na asattā siddhiḥ iti uktam sarvatas na upalambhanāt
asiddhāyām asattāyām sandigdhā vyatireki tā

original: anvayo vyatireko vā sattvaṃ vā sādhyadharmiṇi // Pramāṇav_3.291 //
analyzed: anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā sattvam vā sādhya dharmiṇi
tad niścaya phalaiḥ jānaiḥ siddhi anti yadi sādhanam
yatra sādhya vipakṣasya varṇyate vyatireki tā

original: sa evāsya sapakṣaḥ syāt sarvo heturatonvayī /
analyzed: saḥ eva asya sapakṣaḥ syāt sarvaḥ hetuḥ atonvayī

original: samayatve hi mantrāṇāṃ kasyacit kāryasādhanam // Pramāṇav_3.293 //
analyzed: samaya tve hi mantrāṇām kasyacid kārya sādhanam
athā api bhāva śaktiḥ syāt anyathā api aviśeṣataḥ
kramasya artha antara tvam ca pūrvam eva nirākṛtam
nityam tad artha siddhiḥ syāt asāmarthyam apekṣaṇe
sarvasya sādhanam te syuḥ bhāva śaktiḥ yat īdṛśī
prayoktṛ bheda apekṣā ca na a saṃskāryasya yujyate

original: saṃskāryasyāpi bhāvasya vastubhedo hi bhedakaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.296 //
analyzed: saṃskāryasya api bhāvasya vastu bhedaḥ hi bhedakaḥ
prayoktṛ bhedāt niyamaḥ śaktau na samaye bhavet
anādheya viśeṣāṇām ki kurvāṇaḥ prayojakaḥ
prayogaḥ yadi abhivyaktiḥ sā prāk eva nirākṛtā

original: vyaktiśca buddhiḥ sā yasmāt sa phalairyadi yujjate // Pramāṇav_3.298 //
analyzed: vyaktiḥ ca buddhiḥ sā yasmāt sa phalaiḥ yadi yujjate
syāt śrotuḥ phala sambandhaḥ vaktā hi vyakti kāraṇam
an abhivyakta śabdānām karaṇānām prayojanam

original: manojapo vā vyarthaḥ syācchabdo hi śrotragocaraḥ /
analyzed: manojapaḥ vā vyarthaḥ syāt śabdaḥ hi śrotra gocaraḥ

original: pāramparyeṇa tajjatvāt tadv yaktiḥ sāpi cenmatiḥ // Pramāṇav_3.300 //
analyzed: pāramparyeṇa tad ja tvāt yaktiḥ sā api ced matiḥ
te pi tathā syuḥ tad arthā ced asiddham kalpanā anvayāt
sva sāmānya svabhāvānām eka bhāva vivakṣayā
ukteḥ samaya kārāṇām avirodhaḥ na vastuni

original: ānupūrvyāmasatyāṃ syāt saro rasa iti śruto // Pramāṇav_3.302 //
analyzed: ānupūrvyām asatyām syāt saraḥ rasaḥ iti

original: na kāryabheda iti ced asti sā puruṣāśrayā /
analyzed: na kārya bhedaḥ iti ced asti sā puruṣa āśrayā
yaḥ yad varṇa samutthāna jñāna jāt jñānataḥ dhvaniḥ

original: jāyate tadupādhiḥ sa śru tyā samavasīyate /
analyzed: jāyate tad upādhiḥ sa śru tyā samavasīyate
tad jñāna janita jñānaḥ sa
apekṣya tad smṛtim paścāt smṛtim ādhatte ātmani
iti eṣā pauruṣeyī eva tad hetu grāhi cetasām
kārya kāraṇa tā varṇeṣu ānupūrvī iti kathyate

original: anyadeva tato rūpaṃ tadvarṇānāṃ pade pade // Pramāṇav_3.306 //
analyzed: anyat eva tatas rūpam tat varṇānām pade pade
kartṛ saṃskārataḥ bhinnam sahitam kārya bheda kṛt

original: sā cānupūrvī varṇānāṃ pravṛttā racanākṛtaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.307 //
analyzed: sā ca ānupūrvī varṇānām pravṛttā racanā kṛtaḥ
icchā viruddha siddhīnām sthita krama virodhataḥ
kārya kāraṇa tā siddheḥ pumbhyaḥ varṇa kramasya ca
sarvaḥ varṇa kramaḥ pubhyaḥ dahana indhana yukti vat
puṃsām jñāna prabhāvābhyām anyeṣām tad abhāvataḥ

original: ye 'pi tantravidaḥ kecid mantrān kāṃścana kuvaṃte // Pramāṇav_3.310 //
analyzed: ye pi tantra vidaḥ kecid mantrān kāṃścana kuvaṃte
prabhoḥ prabhāvaḥ teṣām sa tad ukta nyāya vṛttitaḥ

original: kṛtakāḥ pauruṣeyāśca mantrā vācyāḥ phalepsunā // Pramāṇav_3.311 //
analyzed: kṛtakāḥ pauruṣeyāḥ ca mantrāḥ vācyāḥ phala īpsunā
aśakti sādhanam puṃsām anena eva nirākṛtam
buddhīndriya ukti puṃs tu ādi sādhanam yat tu varṇyate

original: pramāṇābhaṃ yathārthāsti na hi śeṣavato gatiḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇa ābham yathā arthā asti na hi śeṣavataḥ gatiḥ

original: artho 'yaṃ nāyamartho na iti śabdā vadanti na // Pramāṇav_3.313 //
analyzed: arthaḥ yam na ayam arthaḥ naḥ iti śabdāḥ vadanti na
kalpyaḥ yam arthaḥ puruṣaiḥ te ca rāga ādi saṃyutāḥ
tatra ekaḥ tattva vid na anyaḥ iti bhedaḥ ca kiṃkṛtaḥ

original: tadvt puṃstve kathamapi jñānī kaścit katha na vaḥ /
analyzed: tad vt puṃstve katham api jñānī kaścid katha na vaḥ

original: yasya pramāṇamavisaṃvādi vacanaṃ so 'rthavid yadi // Pramāṇav_3.315 //
analyzed: yasya pramāṇam avisaṃvādi vacanam saḥ ṛtha vid yadi
na hi atyanta parokṣeṣu prāmāṇasya asti sambhavaḥ

original: yasya prāmāṇasaṃvādi vacanaṃ tatkṛtaṃ vacaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.316 //
analyzed: yasya prāmāṇa saṃvādi vacanam tat kṛtam vacaḥ
saḥ āgam iti prāptam nirartha apauruṣeya tā
yadi atyanta parokṣe rthe na āgama jñāna sambhavaḥ
atīndriya artha vid kaścid asti iti abhimatam bhavet

original: svayaṃ rāgādimānnārtha vetti vedasya nānyataḥ // Pramāṇav_3.318 //
analyzed: svayam rāga ādimān na artha vetti vedasya nā anyatas

original: na vedayati vado 'pi vedārthasya kuto gatiḥ /
analyzed: na vedayati veda arthasya kutas gatiḥ

original: tenāgnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma iti śrutau // Pramāṇav_3.319 //
analyzed: tena agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti śrutau

original: khādet śvamāṃsamityeṣa nārtha ityatra kā pramā /
analyzed: khādet śva māṃsam iti eṣa na arthaḥ iti atra kā pramā
prasiddhaḥ lokavādaḥ ced tatra kaḥ tīndriya artha dṛś
aneka artheṣu śabdeṣu yena arthaḥ yam vivecitaḥ
svarga urvaśī ādi śabdaḥ ca dṛṣṭaḥ rūḍha artha vācakaḥ
śabda antareṣu tādṛkṣu tādṛśī evā astu kalpanā

original: prasiddhiśca nṛṇāṃ vādaḥ pramāṇaṃ sa ca neṣyate // Pramāṇav_3.322 //
analyzed: prasiddhiḥ ca nṛṇām vādaḥ pramāṇam sa ca nā iṣyate
tatas ca bhūyas ṛtha gatiḥ kim etat dviṣṭha kāmitam

original: atha prasiddhimullaṃdhya kalpane na nibandhanam // Pramāṇav_3.323 //
analyzed: atha prasiddhim ullaṃdhya kalpane na nibandhanam
prasiddheḥ apramāṇa tvāt tad grahe kim nibandhanam
utpāditā prasiddhyā eva śaṃkā śabda artha niścaye
yasmāt nānā artha vṛtti tvam śabdānām tatra dṛśyate
anyathā sambhava abhavāt nānā śakteḥ svayam dhvaneḥ
avaśyam śaṃkayā bhāvyam niyāmakam apaśyatām

original: eṣa sthāṇurayaṃ mārga iti vaktīti kaścana // Pramāṇav_3.326 //
analyzed: eṣa sthāṇuḥ ayam mārgaḥ iti vakti iti kaścana
anyaḥ svayam bravīmi iti tayoḥ bhedaḥ parīkṣyatām
sarvatra yogyasya eka artha dyotane niyamaḥ kutas
jñātāḥ vā atīndriyāḥ kena vivakṣā vacanāt ṛte
vivakṣā niyame hetuḥ saṃketaḥ tad prakāśanaḥ

original: apauruṣeyai sā nāsti tasya saikārthatā kutaḥ /
analyzed: sā na asti tasya sā eka artha tā kutas

original: svabhāvaniyame 'nyatra na yojyeta tayā punaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.329 //
analyzed: svabhāva niyame nyatra na yojyeta tayā punar

original: saṃketaśca nirarthaḥ syād vyaktau ca niyamaḥ kutaḥ /
analyzed: saṃketaḥ ca nirarthaḥ syāt vyaktau ca niyamaḥ kutas

original: yatra svātantryamicchāyā niyamo nāma tatra kaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.330 //
analyzed: yatra svātantryam icchāyāḥ niyamaḥ nāma tatra kaḥ
dyotayet tena saṃketaḥ na iṣṭām eva asya yogya tām

original: yasmāt kiledṛśaṃ satyaṃ yathāgniḥ śītanodanaḥ // Pramāṇav_3.331 //
