analyzed: yasmāt kila īdṛśam satyam yathā agniḥ śīta nodanaḥ
vākyam veda eka deśa tvāt anyat api aparaḥ bravīt
rasavat tulya rūpa tvāt eka bhāṇḍe ca pākavat
śeṣa vat vyabhicāri tvāt kṣiptam nyāya vidā īdṛśam

original: nityasya puṃsaḥ kartṛtvaṃ nityān bhāvānatīndriyān // Pramāṇav_3.333 //
analyzed: nityasya puṃsaḥ kartṛ tvam nityān bhāvān atīndriyān

original: ebnriyān viṣamaṃ hetuṃ bhāvānāṃ viṣamāṃ sthitim /
analyzed: viṣamam hetum bhāvānām viṣamām sthitim

original: nivṛttiṃ ca pramāṇābhyāmanyad vā vyastagocaram // Pramāṇav_3.334 //
analyzed: nivṛttim ca pramāṇābhyām anyat vā vyasta gocaram
viruddham āgama apekṣeṇa anumānena vā vadat
virodham a samādhāya śāstra artha ca a pradarśya saḥ
satya artha pratijānānaḥ jayet dhārṣṭyena bandhakīm

original: sidhyet pramāṇaṃ yadyevam apramāṇamatheha kim // Pramāṇav_3.336 //
analyzed: sidhyet pramāṇam yadi evam apramāṇam atha iha kim

original: na hyokaṃ nāsti satyārtha puruṣe bahubhāṣīṇi /
analyzed: na hi okam na asti satya artha puruṣe bahu bhāṣīṇi

original: nāyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kārya vā vastūnāṃ vaktari dhvaniḥ // Pramāṇav_3.337 //
analyzed: na ayam svabhāvaḥ vā vastūnām vaktari dhvaniḥ
na ca tad vyatiriktasya vidyate vyabhicāri tā
pravṛttiḥ vācakānām ca vācya dṛṣṭi kṛtā iti ced
paraspara viruddha arthā katham ekatra sā bhavet
vastubhiḥ na āgamāḥ tena karthān ca ān nāntarīyakāḥ
pratipattuḥ na sidhyanti kutas tebhyaḥ rtha niścayaḥ
tasmāt na tad nivṛttyā api bhāva abhāvaḥ prasidhyati
tena asat niścaya phala anupalabdhiḥ na sidhyati
caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ
parasya pratipādya tvāt adṛṣṭaḥ pi svayam paraiḥ
dṛṣṭa sādhanam iti eke tad kṣepāya ātma dṛś vacaḥ
anumā viṣaye na iṣṭam parīkṣita parigrahāt

original: vācaḥ prāmāṇyamasmin hi nānumānaṃ pravartate // Pramāṇav_4.2 //
analyzed: vācaḥ prāmāṇyam asmin hi na anumānam pravartate
bādhanāya āgamasya ukteḥ sādhanasya param prati
saḥ pramāṇam tat āsiddham tat siddham akhilam tatas

original: tadāgamavataḥ siddhaṃ yadi kasya ka āgamaḥ /
analyzed: tat āgamavataḥ siddham yadi kasya kaḥ āgamaḥ

original: bādhyamānaḥ pramāṇena sa siddhaḥ kathāmāgamaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.4 //
analyzed: bādhyamānaḥ pramāṇena sa siddhaḥ kathām āgamaḥ
tad viruddha abhyupagamaḥ tena eva ca katham bhavet
tad anya upagame tasya
tat kasmāt sādhanam nā uktam sva pratītiḥ yad udbhavā

original: yuktyā yayāgamo grāhyaḥ parasyāpi ca sā na kim // Pramāṇav_4.6 //
analyzed: yuktyā yayā āgamaḥ grāhyaḥ parasya api ca sā na kim
prākṛtasya sataḥ prāk yaiḥ
sādhanaiḥ sādhanāni artha sakti jñāne tāni alam
vicchinna anugamāḥ ye sāmānyena api agocarāḥ
sādhya sādhana cintā asti na teṣu artheṣu kācana
puṃsām abhiprāya vaśāt tattva atattva vyavasthitau
luptau hetu tad ābhāsau tasya vastu asamāśrayāt
san arthaḥ jñāna sāpekṣaḥ na asān jñānena sādhakaḥ
vastu asaṃśliṣṭa asaṃgatyā sadṛśī gatiḥ

original: liṅgaṃ svabhāvaḥ kārya vā dṛśyādarśanameva vā /
analyzed: liṅgam svabhāvaḥ vā dṛśya adarśanam eva vā
sambaddham vastutas siddham tat asiddham kim ātmanaḥ
pareṇa api anyatas gantum ayuktam para kalpitaiḥ
prasaṅgaḥ dvaya sambandhāt eka apāye
tad artha grahaṇam śabda kalpanā āropita ātmanām
aliṅga tva prasiddhi artham arthāt arthasya siddhitaḥ
kalpanā āgamayoḥ kartuḥ
vastunaḥ ca anyathābhāvāt tad kṛtāḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ
arthāt artha gateḥ śaktiḥ pakṣa hetu abhidhānayoḥ

original: nārthe tena tayornāsti svataḥ sādhanasaṃsthitiḥ // Pramāṇav_4.15 //
analyzed: na arthe tena tayoḥ nā asti svatas sādhana saṃsthitiḥ
tat pakṣa vacanam vaktuḥ abhiprāya nivedane
pramāṇam saṃśaya utpatteḥ tatas sākṣāt na sādhanam
sādhyasya eva abhidhānena pāramparyeṇa nā api alam
śaktasya sūcakam hetu vacaḥ śaktam api svayam
hetvartha viṣaya tvena tad aśakta uktiḥ īritā
śaktiḥ tasya api ced hetu vacanasya pravarttanāt
tad saṃśayena jijñāsoḥ bhavet prakaraṇa āśrayaḥ
vipakṣa upagame tulyam iti anavasthiniḥ

original: antaraṅgaṃ tu sāmarthya triṣu rūpeṣu saṃsthitam /
analyzed: antaraṅgam tu sāmarthya triṣu rūpeṣu saṃsthitam
tatra smṛti samādhānam saṃsthitam
a khyāpite hi viṣaye hetu vṛtteḥ asambhavāt

original: viṣayakhyāpanādeva siddhau cet tasya śaktatā // Pramāṇav_4.21 //
analyzed: viṣaya khyāpanāt eva siddhau ced tasya śakta tā
uktam atra vinā api asmāt kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ īdṛśāḥ
sarve nityāḥ prokte pi arthāt tad nāśa dhīḥ bhavet
anuktau api pakṣasya siddhe pratibandhataḥ
triṣu anyatama rūpasya eva anuktiḥ nyu na tā uditā

original: sādhyoktiṃ vā pratijñāṃ sa vadan doṣairna yujyate /
analyzed: sādhya uktim vā pratijñām sa vadan doṣaiḥ na yujyate
sādhana adhikṛteḥ eva hetvābhāsa aprasaṅgataḥ
aviśeṣa uktiḥ api eka jātīye saṃśaya āvahā
anyathā sarva sādhya ukteḥ pratijñā tvam prasajyate
siddhokteḥ sādhana tvāt ca parasya api na duṣyati
idānīm sādhya nirdeśaḥ sādhana avayavaḥ katham
sa ābhāsa ukti ādi upakṣepa parihāra viḍambanā

original: asambaddhā tathā hyeṣa na nyāyya iti varṇitam // Pramāṇav_4.27 //
analyzed: asambaddhā tathā hi eṣa na nyāyyaḥ iti varṇitam
gamya artha tve pi sādhya ukteḥ asammohāya lakṣaṇam
rūpa nipāteṣu svayaṃpadaiḥ
anuktaḥ u pi icchayā vyāptaḥ sādhyaḥ ātma artha vat mataḥ

original: vṛtto svayaṃśrutenāha kṛtā caiṣā tadarthikā // Pramāṇav_4.30 //
analyzed: svayaṃśrutena āha kṛtā ca eṣā tad arthikā
viśeṣaḥ tad vyapekṣa tvāt kathitaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ

original: anuktāvapi vāñchāyā bhavet prakaraṇād gatiḥ // Pramāṇav_4.31 //
analyzed: anuktau api vāñchāyāḥ bhavet prakaraṇāt gatiḥ
dṛṣṭānte doṣaḥ tasya yathā uditam

original: ātmā paraścet so 'siddhaḥ iti tatreṣṭaghātakṛt // Pramāṇav_4.32 //
analyzed: ātmā paraḥ ced saḥ siddhaḥ iti tatra iṣṭa ghāta kṛt

original: sādhanaṃ yadvivāde na nyastaṃ taccenna sādhyate /
analyzed: sādhanam yat vivāde na nyastam tat ced na sādhyate

original: kiṃ sādhyamanyathāniṣṭaṃ bhaved vaiphalyameva vā // Pramāṇav_4.33 //
analyzed: kim sādhyam anyathā aniṣṭam bhavet vaiphalyam eva vā
sa dvitīya prayogeṣu

original: etena kathite sādhyaṃ sāmānyenātha sammatam // Pramāṇav_4.34 //
analyzed: etena kathite sādhyam sāmānyena atha sammatam
tat eva artha antara abhāvāt deha anāptau na sidhyati
vācya śūnyam pralapatām tat etat jāḍya varṇitam
tulyam nāśe ced śabda ghaṭa bhedena kalpane

original: na siddhena vināśena tadvataḥ sādhanād dhvaneḥ // Pramāṇav_4.36 //
analyzed: na siddhena vināśena tadvataḥ sādhanāt dhvaneḥ
tathā artha antara bhāve syāt tadvān kumbhaḥ pi anitya tā
viśiṣṭā dhvaninā anveti no ced na ayoga vāraṇāt
dvividhaḥ hi vyavacchedaḥ viyoga apara yogayoḥ
vyavchedāt ayoge tu vārye na ananvaya āgamaḥ
sāmānyam eva tat sādhyam na ca siddha prasādhanam

original: viśiṣṭaṃ dharmiṇā tacca na niranvayadoṣavat // Pramāṇav_4.39 //
analyzed: viśiṣṭam dharmiṇā tat ca na niranvaya doṣavat
etena dharmi dharmābhyām viśiṣṭau dharma dharmiṇau
pratyākhyātaḥ nirākurvan dharmiṇī evam asādhanāt
samudāya apavāhaḥ hi na dharmiṇi virudhyate

original: sādhyaṃ yatastathā neṣṭaṃ sādhyo dharmo 'tra kevalaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.41 //
analyzed: sādhyam yatas tathā na iṣṭam sādhyaḥ kevalaḥ
ekasya dharmiṇaḥ śāstre nānā dharma sthitau api
sādhyaḥ syāt ātmanā eva iṣṭaḥ iti upāttā svayaṃśrutiḥ
śāstra abhyupagamāt eva sarva ādānāt prabādhane

original: tatraikasyāpi doṣaḥ syād yadi hetupratijñyoḥ // Pramāṇav_4.43 //
analyzed: tatra ekasya api doṣaḥ syāt yadi hetu pratijñyoḥ
śabda anāśe prasādhye syāt gandha bhū guṇa tā kṣateḥ
prakṛteḥ no ced anyatra sā samā
atha atra dharmī prakṛtaḥ tatra śāstra artha bādhanam
atha vā adi iṣṭa tām bruyāt dharmi dharma ādi sādhanaiḥ

original: kaiścit prakaraṇairiccha bhavet sā gamyate ca taiḥ /
analyzed: kaiścid prakaraṇaiḥ iccha bhavet sā gamyate ca taiḥ
valāt tava iccheyam iti vyaktam īśvara ceṣṭitam
vadan akārya liṅgām tām vyabhicāreṇa bādhyate

original: anāntarīyake cārthe bādhite 'nyasya kā kṣati // Pramāṇav_4.47 //
analyzed: anāntarīyake ca arthe bādhite nyasya kā
uktam ca na āgama apekṣam anumānam sva gocare

original: siddhaṃ tena susiddhaṃ tanna tadā śāstramīkṣyate // Pramāṇav_4.48 //
analyzed: siddham tena su siddham tat na tadā śāstram īkṣyate
vāda tyāgaḥ tadā syāt ced na tadā anabhyupāyataḥ

original: upāyo hyabhyupāye 'yamanaṅgaṃ sa tadāpi san // Pramāṇav_4.49 //
analyzed: upāyaḥ hi abhyupāye yam anaṅgam sa tadā api san
tadā viśuddhe viṣaya dvaye śāstra parigraham

original: cikirṣoḥ sa hi kālaḥ syāt tadā śāstreṇa bādhanam // Pramāṇav_4.50 //
analyzed: cikirṣoḥ sa hi kālaḥ syāt tadā śāstreṇa bādhanam
tad virodhena cintāyāḥ tad siddhartheṣu ayogataḥ
tṛtīya sthāna saṃkrāntau nyāyyaḥ śāstra parigrahaḥ
tatra api sādhya dharmasya nāntarīka bādhanam
parihārya na ca anyeṣām anavasthā prasaṅgataḥ
kena iyam sarva cintāṣu śāstram grāhyam iti sthitiḥ
kṛta idānīm asiddhāntaiḥ grāhyaḥ dhūmena na analaḥ
riktasya jantoḥ jātasya guṇa doṣam apaśyataḥ
vilabdhāḥ vata siddhānta viṣama grhāḥ
yadi sādhane ekatra sarva śāstram nidarśane

original: darśayet sādhanaṃ syādityeṣā lokottarā sthitiḥ // Pramāṇav_4.55 //
analyzed: darśayet sādhanam syāt iti eṣā loka uttarā sthitiḥ
asambaddhasya dharmasya kim asiddhaḥ na sidhyati
hetuḥ tad sādhanāya uktaḥ kim duṣṭaḥ tatra sidhyati
dṛṣṭānte dharmiṇaḥ khilān
vāc dhūma ādi ijam naḥ nu eti caitanya dahana ādikam
svabhāvam kāraṇam ca arthaḥ vyabhicāreṇa sādhayan
kasyacid vāda bādhāyām svabhāvāt na nivartate
prapadyamānaḥ ca anyaḥ tam nāntarīyakam īpsitaiḥ
sādhya arthaiḥ hetunā tena katham apratipāditaḥ
uktaḥ tena katham a pratipāditaḥ
vā hetuḥ viroddhā vādinaḥ kim

original: na hi tasyoktidoṣeṇa sa jātaḥ śāstrabādhanaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.60 //
analyzed: na hi tasya ukti doṣeṇa sa jātaḥ śāstra bādhanaḥ
bādhakasya abhidhānāt ced doṣaḥ yadi vadet na saḥ

original: kinna bādheta so 'kurvannayuktaṃ kena duṣyati // Pramāṇav_4.61 //
analyzed: kinna bādheta saḥ u kurvan ayuktam kena duṣyati
anyeṣu hetvābhāseṣu sva iṣṭasya eva aprasādhanāt

original: duṣyed vyarthābhidhānena nātra tasya prasādhanāt // Pramāṇav_4.62 //
analyzed: duṣyet vyartha abhidhānena na atra tasya prasādhanāt
yadi kiñcid kvacid śastrena yuktam pratiṣidhyate
bruvāṇaḥ yuktam api anyat iti rāja kula sthitiḥ

original: sarvānarthān samīkṛtya vaktuṃ śakyaṃ na sādhanam /
analyzed: sarvān arthān samīkṛtya vaktum śakyam na sādhanam
sarvatra tena utsannā iyam sādhya sādhana saṃsthitiḥ
viruddhayoḥ eka dharmiṇī ayogāt astu bādhanam
viruddha aikāntike na atra tadvat asti virodhi tā
a bādhya bādhaka tve pi tayoḥ śāstra artha viplavāt

original: asabhbadde 'pi bādhā cet syāt sarva sarvabādhanam // Pramāṇav_4.66 //
analyzed: asabhbadde pi bādhā ced syāt sarva sarva bādhanam
sambandhaḥ tena tatra eva bādhanāt asti ced asat

original: hetoḥ sarvasya cintyatvāt svasādhye guṇadoṣayoḥ // Pramāṇav_4.67 //
analyzed: hetoḥ sarvasya cintya tvāt sva sādhye guṇa doṣayoḥ
nāntarīyaka tā sādhye sambandhaḥ sā iha na īkṣyate

original: kevalaṃ śāstrapīḍeti doṣaḥ sānyakṛte samā // Pramāṇav_4.68 //
analyzed: kevalam śāstra pīḍā iti doṣaḥ sā anya kṛte samā
śāstra abhyupagamāt sādhyaḥ sa astra dṛṣṭaḥ khilaḥ yadi
pratijñā siddha dṛṣṭānta hetuvādaḥ prasajyate
uktayoḥ sādhana tvena no ced īpsita vādataḥ

original: nyāyaprāptaṃ na sādhyatvaṃ vacanād vinivarttate // Pramāṇav_4.70 //
analyzed: nyāya prāptam na sādhya tvam vacanāt vinivarttate
anīpsitam asādhyam ced vādinā anyaḥ pi anīpsitaḥ
sādhyaḥ tadā asādhyam bādhamānam virodhi kim
pakṣa lakṣaṇa bāhya arthaḥ svayam śabdaḥ api anarthakaḥ
śāstre ṣu icchā pravṛtti arthaḥ yadi śaṅkā akutonu iyam
saḥ niṣiddhaḥ pramāṇena gṛhṇān kena nivāryate

original: niṣiddhaścet pramāṇena vācā kena pravartyate // Pramāṇav_4.73 //
analyzed: niṣiddhaḥ ced pramāṇena vācā kena pravartyate
pūrvam api eṣa siddhantam sva icchayā eva gṛhītavān

original: kiñcidanyaṃ satu punargrahītuṃ labhate na kim // Pramāṇav_4.74 //
analyzed: kiñcid anyam satu punar grahītum labhate na kim
dṛṣṭeḥ vipratipattīnām atra akārṣīt svayam śrutim
iṣṭa akṣatim asādhya tvam anavasthām ca darśayan
samaya āhita bhedasya parihāreṇa dharmiṇaḥ
prasiddhasya gṛhīti arthā jagāda anyaḥ svayaṃśrutim
vicāra prastuteḥ eva prasiddhaḥ siddhaḥ āśrayaḥ
sva icchā kalpita bhedeṣu padārtheṣu avivādataḥ
asādhya tām atha prāha siddha deśena dharmiṇaḥ

original: svarūpeṇaiva nirdeśya ityanenaiva tad gatam // Pramāṇav_4.78 //
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa eva nirdeśyaḥ iti anena eva tat gatam
siddha sādhana rūpeṇa nirdeśasya hi sambhave

original: sādhyatvenaiva nirdeśya itīdaṃ phalavad bhavet // Pramāṇav_4.79 //
analyzed: sādhya tvena eva nirdeśyaḥ iti idam phalavat bhavet
anumānasya sāmānya viṣaya tvam ca varṇītam

original: ihaivaṃ na hyanukte 'pi kiñcit pakṣe virudhyate // Pramāṇav_4.80 //
analyzed: iha evam na hi an ukte kiñcid pakṣe virudhyate

original: kuryācced dharmiṇaṃ sādhyaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tanna śaktyate /
analyzed: kuryāt ced dharmiṇam sādhyam tatas kim tat na śaktyate
kasmāt hetu anvaya abhāvāt na ca doṣaḥ tayoḥ api
na doṣaḥ pakṣaḥ iṣyate
tathā hetu ādi doṣaḥ pi pakṣa doṣaḥ prasajyate
sarvaiḥ pakṣasya bādhātaḥ tasmāt tanmātra saṅginaḥ
pakṣa doṣāḥ matāḥ nā anye pratyakṣa ādi virodha vat
hetu ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ vādhyam muktvā pakṣasya lakṣaṇam
ucyate parihāra artham avyāpti vyatirekayoḥ
svayam nipāta rūpa ākhyāḥ vyatirekasya bādhikāḥ
saha anirākṛtena iṣṭa śrutiḥ avyāpti bādhanī
sādhya abhyupagamaḥ pakṣa lakṣaṇam teṣu apakṣa tā
nirākṛte bādhanataḥ śeṣe lakṣaṇa vṛttitaḥ
svayam iṣṭa abhidhānena gata arthe pi avadhāraṇe
kṛtyā antena abhisambandhāt uktam kāla antara chide
iha anaṅgam iṣeḥ niṣṭhā tena īpsita pade punar
aṅgam eva tayā asiddha hetu ādi pratiṣidhyate
avācaka tvāt ca ayuktam tena iṣṭam svayam ātmanā
an apekṣya akhilam śāstram tad vādi iṣṭasya sādhya tā
tena an abhīṣṭa saṃsṛṣṭasya isyā api hi bādhane
yathāsādhyam abādhātaḥ pakṣa hetū na duṣyataḥ
a niṣiddhaḥ pramāṇābhyām sa ca upagamaḥ iṣyate
sandigdhe hetu vacanāt vyastaḥ hetoḥ anāśrayaḥ
anumānasya bhedena sā bādhā uktā caturvidhā
tatra abhyupāyaḥ kārya aṅgam svabhāva aṅgam jagat sthitiḥ
ātma aparodha abhimataḥ bhūta niścaya yukta vāc

original: āptaḥ svavacanaṃ śastraṃ caikamuktaṃ samatvataḥ // Pramāṇav_4.93 //
analyzed: āptaḥ sva vacanam śastram ca ekam uktam samatvataḥ
yathā ātmanaḥ pramāṇa tve vacanam na pravarttate
śāstra siddhe tathā na arthe vicāraḥ tad anāśraye
tad prastāva āśraya tve hi śāstram bādhakam iti amum
vaktum artha sva vācā asya saha uktiḥ sāmya dṛṣṭaye
udāharaṇam api atra sadṛśam tena varṇitam
pramāṇānām abhāve hi śāstra vācoḥ ayogataḥ
sva vāc virodhe vispaṣṭam udāharaṇam āgame
diś mātra darśanam tatra sukha pradaḥ
śāstriṇaḥ pi a tad ālambe viruddha uktau tu vastuni

original: na bādhā pratibandhaḥ syāt tulyakakṣatayā tayoḥ // Pramāṇav_4.98 //
analyzed: na bādhā pratibandhaḥ syāt tulya kakṣa tayā tayoḥ
yathā sva vāci tat ca asya tadā sva vacana ātmakam

original: tayoḥ pramāṇaṃ yasyāsti tat syādanyasya bādhakam // Pramāṇav_4.99 //
analyzed: tayoḥ pramāṇam yasya asti tat syāt anyasya bādhakam
pratijñām anumānam vā pratijñāpeta yuktikā
yathārtha vā bādheta katham anyathā
prāmāṇyam āgamānām ca prāk eva vinivāritam
abhyupāya vicāreṣu tasmāt doṣaḥ yam iṣyate
tasmāt viṣaya bhedasya darśana artha pṛthak kṛtaḥ
anumāna abahirbhūtaḥ pi abhyupāyaḥ prabādhanāt
anyathā atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt vyartha tā vā pṛthakkṛteḥ
bhedaḥ vāc mātra vacane pratibandhaḥ sva vācī api
tena abhyupagamāt śāstra pramāṇam sarva vastuṣu

original: bādhakam yadi necchet sa bādhakaṃ kiṃ punarbhavet // Pramāṇav_4.104 //
analyzed: bādhakam yadi na icchet sa bādhakam kim punar bhavet
sva vāc virodhe abhedaḥ syāt sva vāc śāstra virodhayoḥ
puruṣa icchā kṛtā ca asya paripūrṇā pramāṇa tā
tasmāt prasiddheṣu artheṣu śāstra tyāge pi na kṣatiḥ
na cintā eva pravarttate
virodha udbhāvana prāyā parīkṣā api atra tat yathā
adharma mūlam rāga ādi snānam ca adharma nāśanām

original: śāstraṃ yatsiddhayā yuktyā svavācā ca na bādhyate /
analyzed: śāstram yat siddhayā yuktyā sva vācā ca na bādhyate
dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭe tat grāhyam iti cintā pravartyate
artheṣu apratiṣiddha tvāt puruṣa icchā anurodhinaḥ
iṣṭa śabda abhidheyasya āptaḥ trākṣata vāc janaḥ
uktaḥ prasiddha śabdena dharmaḥ tad vyavahāra jaḥ
pratyakṣa ādi mitāḥ māna śruti āropeṇa su citāḥ
tad āśraya bhuvām icchā anurodhāt aniṣedhinām

original: kṛtānāmakṛtānāṃ ca yogyaṃ viśvaṃ svabhāvataḥ // Pramāṇav_4.111 //
analyzed: kṛtānām akṛtānām ca yogyam viśvam svabhāvataḥ
artha mātra anurodhinyā bhāvinyā bhūtayā api vā
bādhyate pratirundhānaḥ śabda yogya tayā atayā
tad yogyatā balāt eva vastutas ghaṭitaḥ dhvaniḥ
syām apratīte tasmin tad siddha tā tatas
asādharaṇa tā na syāt bādhā hetoḥ iha anyathā
tad niṣedhaḥ numānāt syāt śabda arthe na kṣa vṛttitaḥ
asādhāraṇa tā tatra hetūnām yatra na anvayi
sattvam iti api udāhāraḥ hetoḥ evam kutas mataḥ
saṃketa saṃśrayāḥ śabdāḥ sa ca icchā mātra saṃśrayaḥ
na asiddhiḥ śabda siddha nām iti śābda prasiddhi vāc
anumāna prasiddheṣu viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ
abhāvam darśayati evam pratīreḥ anumātvataḥ

original: atha vā bru vato lokasyānumābhāva ucyate /
analyzed: atha vā bru vataḥ lokasya anumā bhāvaḥ ucyate
kim tena bhinna viṣayā pratītiḥ anumānataḥ
tena anumānāt vastūnām sat asatā anurodhinaḥ
bhinnasya a tad vaśā vṛttiḥ tad icchā jā iti sūcitam

original: candratāṃ śaśino 'nicchan kāṃ pratītiṃ sa vāñchati /
analyzed: candra tām śaśinaḥ nicchan kām pratītim sa vāñchati

original: iti taṃ pratyadṛṣṭāntaṃ tadasādhāraṇaṃ matam // Pramāṇav_4.120 //
analyzed: iti tam prati adṛṣṭāntam tat asādhāraṇam matam
na udāharaṇam eva ekam adhikṛtya idam ucyate

original: lakṣaṇatvāt tathā vṛkṣo dhātrītyuktau ca bādhanāt // Pramāṇav_4.121 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇa tvāt tathā vṛkṣaḥ dhātrī iti uktau ca bādhanāt
atrā api loke dṛṣṭa tvāt karpūra rajata ādiṣu
samayāt vartamānasya kāsa ādhāraṇa tā api vā

original: yadi tasya kvacit sidhyet siddhaṃ vastubalena tat /
analyzed: yadi tasya kvacid sidhyet siddham vastu balena tat
pratīti siddha upagame śaśini api anivāraṇam
tasya vastuni siddhasya śaśini api anivāraṇam

original: tadvastvabhāve śaśini vāraṇe 'pi na duṣyati // Pramāṇav_4.124 //
analyzed: tad vastu abhāve śaśini na duṣyati
tasmāt avastu niyata saṃketa bala bhāvinām
yogyāḥ padārthāḥ dharmāṇām icchāyāḥ a niridhanāt
tām yogya tām virundhānam saṃketa a pratiṣedha jā
pratihanti prati iti ākhyā yogyatā viṣaye
śabdānām artham iyamaḥ saṃketa anuvidhāyinām
na iti anena uktam atra eṣām pratiṣedhaḥ virudhyate
naimittikyāḥ śruteḥ artham artha vā pāramārthikam
śabdānām pratirundhānaḥ bādhana arhaḥ hi varṇitaḥ
tasmāt viṣaya bhedasya darśānāya pṛthakkṛtā
pratītiḥ api pūrvavat
siddhayoḥ pṛthak ākhyāne darśayan ca prayojanam
ete sa hetuke prāha na anumā adhyakṣa bādhane
atra api adhyakṣa bādhāyām nānā rūpa tayā dhvanau

original: prasiddhasya śrutau rūpaṃ yadeva pratibhāsate // Pramāṇav_4.131 //
analyzed: prasiddhasya śrutau rūpam yat eva pratibhāsate
advayam śabala ābhāsasya adṛṣteḥ buddhi janmanaḥ
tad artha artha uktiḥ asya iva kṣepe dhyakṣeṇa bādhanam
tat eva rūpam tatra arthaḥ śeṣa vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam
avastu bhūtam sāmānyam atas tat na akṣa gocaraḥ
tena sāmānya dharmāṇām apratyakṣa tva siddhitaḥ
pratikṣepe śrāvaṇa uktyā prakāśitam
sarvathā avācya rūpa tvāt siddhyā tasya samāśrayāt
bādhanāt tad balena uktaḥ śrāvaṇena akṣa gocaraḥ
sarvatra vādinaḥ dharmaḥ yaḥ sva sādhya tayā īpsitaḥ
tad dharmavati bādhā syāt na anya dharmeṇa dharmiṇi
anyathā asya uparodhaḥ kaḥ bādhite nyatra dharmiṇi
gata arthe lakṣaṇena asmin svadharmi vacanam punar
bādhāyām syāt bādhā iti asya prasiddhaye
āśrayasya tad āśrita avirodhanāt
anyathā evaṃvidhaḥ dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ iti abhidhānataḥ
tad bādhām eva manyeta svadharmi grahaṇam tatas
nanu etat api artha śiddham satyam kecid tu dharmiṇaḥ
kevalasya uparodhe doṣavat tam upāgatāḥ
yathā paraiḥ an utpādya a pūrva rūpam na kha ādikam
sakṛt śabda ādi ahetu tvāt iti ukte prāha dūṣakaḥ
tadvat san dharmī vyoma ādiḥ iti api

original: naivamiṣṭasya sādhyasya bādhā kācana vidyate // Pramāṇav_4.142 //
analyzed: na evam iṣṭasya sādhyasya bādhā kācana vidyate
dvayasya api hi sādhya tve sādhya dharma uparodhi yat
bādhanam dharmiṇāḥ tatra bādhā iti etena varṇitam
tathā eva dharmiṇaḥ pi atra sādhya tvāt kevalasya na
yadi evam atra bādhā syāt na anya anutpādya śaktikaḥ
sakṛt śabda ādi ahetu tvāt sukha ādiḥ iti pūrvavat
virodhitā bhavet atra hetuḥ aikāntikaḥ yadi
krama krīya nitya tayoḥ avirodhāt vipakṣataḥ

original: vyāvṛtteḥ saṃśayānnāyaṃ śeṣavad bheda iṣyate // Pramāṇav_4.146 //
analyzed: vyāvṛtteḥ saṃśayāt na ayam śeṣa vat bhedaḥ iṣyate
svayam iṣṭaḥ yatas dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ tasmāt tad āśrayaḥ

original: bādhyo na kevalo nānyasaṃśrayo veti sūcitam // Pramāṇav_4.147 //
analyzed: bādhyaḥ na kevalaḥ na anya saṃśrayaḥ vā iti sūcitam
svayam śrutyā anya dharmāṇām bādhā bādhā iti kathyate
tathā svadharmiṇā anyaḥ tadharmiṇaḥ pi iti kathyate
sarva sādhana doṣeṇa pakṣaḥ eva uparodhyate
tathā api pakṣa doṣa tvam pratijñā mātra bhāvinaḥ
yaḥ doṣaḥ saḥ nubadhyate
tena iti uktam atas pakṣa doṣaḥ siddha āśraya ādikaḥ
dharmi dharma viśeṣāṇām svarūpasya ca dharmiṇaḥ
bādhā sādhya aṅga bhūtānām anena eva upadarśitā
tatra udāhṛti diś mātram ucyate rthasya dṛṣṭaye
dravya lakṣaṇa yuktaḥ saṃyoge sti dṛṣṭi bhāj
adṛśyasya viśiṣṭasya pratijñā niṣprayojanā
iṣṭaḥ hi avayavī dṛṣṭvā adṛśyeṣu asambhavi
a viśiṣṭasya ca anyasya sādhane siddha sādhanam

original: gurutvādhogatī syātāṃ yadyasya syāt tulānatiḥ // Pramāṇav_4.154 //
analyzed: gurutva adhogatī syātām yadi asya syāt tulā ānatiḥ
tat nirguṇa kriyaḥ tasmāt samavāyi na kāraṇam

original: tata eva na dṛśyo 'sāvadṛṣṭeḥ kāryarūpayoḥ // Pramāṇav_4.155 //
analyzed: tatas eva na saḥ adṛṣṭeḥ kārya rūpayoḥ
tad bādhā anya viśeṣasya nāntarīyaka bhāvinaḥ
ā sūkṣmāt dravya mālāyāḥ tolya tvāt aṃśu pāta vat
dravya antara guru tvasya gatiḥ nā iti aparaḥ bravīt

original: tasya krameṇaṃ saṃyukte pāṃśurāśau sakṛd yute // Pramāṇav_4.157 //
analyzed: tasya krameṇam saṃyukte pāṃśu rāśau sakṛt yute

original: bhedaḥ syād gaurave tasmāt pṛthak saha ca tolite /
analyzed: bhedaḥ syāt gaurave tasmāt pṛthak saha ca tolite
suvarna māṣaka ādīnām saṃkhyā sāmyam na yujyate
sarṣapa ādāḥ mahārāśeḥ uttara uttara vṛddhimat
gauravam kārya mālāyāḥ yadi nā evā upalabhyate
ā sarṣapāt gauravam tu durlakṣitam analpakam
tolyam tat kāraṇam kārya gaurava anupalakṣaṇāt
nanu adṛṣṭa ūm saḥ ṛthaḥ na ca tat kāryam īkṣyate
guru tva agati vat sarva tad guṇa an upalakṣaṇāt
māṣaka ādeḥ anādhikyam anatiḥ sa upalakṣaṇam
yathāsvam akṣeṇa adṛṣṭe rūpa ādau adhika adhike
abhyupāyaḥ sva vāc ādi abādhāyāḥ sambhavena tu
udāharaṇam api anya diśā gamyam yathā uktyā
tri kāla viṣaya tvāt tu kṛtyānām a tathā ātmakam

original: tathā paraṃ prati nyastaṃ sādhyaṃ neṣṭaṃ tadāpi tat // Pramāṇav_4.164 //
analyzed: tathā param prati nyastam sādhyam na iṣṭam tadā api tat
pratyayana adhikāre tu sarva asiddha varodhinī
yasmāt sādhya śrutiḥ na iṣṭam viśeṣam avalambate
tena aprasiddha dṛṣṭānta hetu dāharaṇam kṛtam
anyathā śaśa śrṛṅga ādau sarva asiddhe sādhya tā

original: sarvasya cāprasiddhatvāt kathañcit tena na kṣamāḥ /
analyzed: sarvasya ca a prasiddha tvāt kathañcid tena na kṣamāḥ
karma ādi bheda upakṣepa parihāra vivecane
prāk asiddha svabhāva tvāt sādhyaḥ vayavaḥ iti asat

original: tulyā siddhāntatā te hi yenopagamalakṣaṇāḥ // Pramāṇav_4.168 //
analyzed: tulyā siddhānta tā te hi yena upagama lakṣaṇāḥ
samudāyasya sādhya tve pi anyonyasya viśeṣaṇam
sādhyam dvayam tat asiddham hetu dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam
asambhavāt sādhya śabdaḥ dharmi vṛttiḥ yadi iṣyate

original: śāstreṇālaṃ yathāyogaṃ loka eva pravarttatām // Pramāṇav_4.170 //
analyzed: śāstreṇa alam yathāyogam lokaḥ eva pravarttatām
sādhana ākhyāna sāmarthyāt tad arthe sādhya tā matā
hetu ādi vacanaiḥ vyāpteḥ anāśaṃkyam ca sādhanam
pūrva avadhāraṇe tena pratijñā lakṣaṇa abhidhā

original: byarthā vyaptiphalā soktiḥ sāmarthyād gamyate tataḥ // Pramāṇav_4.172 //
analyzed: byarthā vyapti phalā sa uktiḥ sāmarthyāt gamyate tatas
viruddha tā iṣṭa asambandhaḥ n upakāra saha āsthitī
evam sarva aṅga doṣāṇām pratijñā doṣa tā bhavet
pakṣa doṣaḥ para apekṣaḥ na iti ca pratipāditam
iṣṭa asambhavya siddhaḥ ca saḥ eva syāt nirākṛtaḥ
anitya tva sa hetu tve śabde evam prakīrttayet
daṣṭānta ākhyānataḥ kim asti atra artha anudarśanam
viśeṣa bhinnām ākhyāya sāmānyasya anuvartane

original: na tadvyāptiḥ phalaṃ vā kiṃ sāmānyenānuvartane // Pramāṇav_4.176 //
analyzed: na tad vyāptiḥ phalam vā kim sāmānyena anuvartane
syāt nirākaraṇam śabde sthitena evā iti atas bravīt
viruddha viṣaye vadan āha anyatām śruteḥ

original: sa ca bhedāpratikṣepāt sāmānyānāṃ na vidyate /
analyzed: sa ca bheda a pratikṣepāt sāmānyānām na vidyate

original: vṛkṣo na śiṃśapaiveti yathā prakaraṇe kvacit // Pramāṇav_4.178 //
analyzed: vṛkṣaḥ na śiṃśapā eva iti yathā prakaraṇe kvacid
sarva śruteḥ eka vṛtti niṣedhaḥ syāt na ca iyatā
saḥ savaḥ sarva bhedānām atattve tad asambhavāt
jñāpya jñāpakayoḥ bhedāt dharmiṇaḥ hetu bhāvinaḥ
asiddheḥ jāpaka tvasya dharmya siddhaḥ sva sādhane
dharma dharmi vivekasya sarva bhāveṣu asiddhitaḥ
sarvatra doṣaḥ tulyaḥ ced na saṃvṛttyā viśeṣataḥ
parama artha vicāreṣu tathā bhūta aprasiddhitaḥ
tattva anyatvam padārtheṣu sāṃvṛteṣu niṣidhyate
anumāna anumeya artha vyahāra sthitiḥ tu iyam
bhedam pratyaya saṃsiddham avalambya ca kalpyate
yathāsvam bheda niṣṭheṣu pratyayeṣu vivekinaḥ
dharmī dharmāḥ ca bhāsante vyavahāraḥ tad āśrayaḥ
vyavahāra upanītaḥ tra saḥ eva āśliṣṭa bheda dhīḥ
sādhyaḥ sādhana tām nītaḥ tena asiddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ
bheda sāmānyayoḥ dharma bhedāt aṃgāṃgi tā tatas
yathā anityaḥ prayatna utthaḥ pratyatna uttha tayā dhvaniḥ
pakṣa aṅga tve pi abādha tvāt na asiddhiḥ bhinna dharmiṇi

original: yathāśvo na viṣāṇitvādeṣa piṇḍo viṣāṇavān // Pramāṇav_4.187 //
analyzed: yathā aśvaḥ na viṣāṇi tvāt eṣa piṇḍaḥ viṣāṇavān
sādhya kāla aṅga tā vā na nivṛtteḥ upalakṣya tat
viśeṣaḥ pi pratijñā arthaḥ dharma bhedāt na yujyate
pakṣa dharma prabhedena sukha grahaṇa siddhaye
hetu prakaraṇa arthasya sūtra saṃkṣepaḥ ucyate
ayogam yogam aparaiḥ atyanta ayogam eva ca
vyavacchinatti dharmasya nipātaḥ vyatirecakaḥ
viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyābhyām kriyayā ca saha uditaḥ
vivakṣātaḥ prayoge sarvaḥ rthaḥ yam pratīyate
vyavaccheda phalam vākyam yatas caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ

original: pārtho dhanurdharo nīlaṃ sarojamiti vā yathā // Pramāṇav_4.192 //
analyzed: pārthaḥ dhanuḥ dharaḥ nīlam sarojam iti vā yathā
pratiyogi vyacchedaḥ tatra api artheṣu gamyate

original: tathā prasiddheḥ samārthyās vivakṣānugamād dhvaneḥ // Pramāṇav_4.193 //
analyzed: tathā prasiddheḥ vivakṣā anugamāt dhvaneḥ
tad ayoga vyavacchedāt dharmī dharma viśeṣaṇam
tad viśiṣṭa tayā dharmaḥ na niranvaya doṣa bhāj
svabhāva kārya siddhi artha dvau dvau hetu viparyayau
vivādāt bheda sāmānye śeṣaḥ vyāvṛtti sādhanaḥ
na hi svabhāvāt anyena vyāptiḥ gamyasya kāraṇe
sambhavāt vyabhicārasya dvidhā āvṛti phalam tatas

original: prayatnānantaraṃ jñānaṃ prāk sato niyamena na /
analyzed: prayatna anantaram jñānam prāk sataḥ niyamena na
tasya āvṛti akṣa śabdeṣu sarvathā anupayogataḥ
kadācid tirapekṣasya kārya ākṛti virodhataḥ
kādācitka phalam siddham tat liṅgam jñānam īdṛśam
etāvatā eva siddhe pi svabhāvasya pṛthak kṛtiḥ

original: kāryeṇa saha nirdeśe mā jñāsīt sarvamīdṛśam // Pramāṇav_4.199 //
analyzed: kāryeṇa saha nirdeśe mā jñāsīt sarvam īdṛśam
vyutpatti arthā ca hetu uktiḥ ukta artha anumitau kṛtā

original: atra prabheda ākhyātaḥ lakṣaṇaṃ tu na bhidyate // Pramāṇav_4.200 //
analyzed: atra prabhedaḥ ākhyātaḥ lakṣaṇam tu na bhidyate
tena atra kārya liṅgena svabhāvaḥ pi eka deśa bhāj
sadṛśa udāhṛtiḥ ca atas pratyatnāt vyakti janmanaḥ
yat nāntarīkā sattā yaḥ vā ātmani avibhāgavān
sa tena avyabhicārī syāt iti artha tad prabhedanam
saṃyogi ādiṣu yeṣu asti pratoibandhaḥ na tādṛśaḥ

original: na te hetava ityuktaṃ vyabhicārasya sambhavāt // Pramāṇav_4.203 //
analyzed: na te hetavaḥ iti uktam vyabhicārasya sambhavāt

original: sati vā pratibandhe 'stu sa eva gatisādhanaḥ /
analyzed: sati vā pratibandhe stu saḥ eva gati sādhanaḥ

original: niyamo hyavinābhāvo niyataśca na sādhanam // Pramāṇav_4.204 //
analyzed: niyamaḥ hi avinābhāvaḥ niyataḥ ca na sādhanam
ekāntika tvam vyāvṛtteḥ avinābhāvaḥ ucyate
tat ca na apratibaddheṣu tatas eva anvaya sthitiḥ

original: svātmatve hetubhāve vā siddhe hi vyatirekitā /
analyzed: sva ātma tve hetu bhāve vā siddhe hi vyatireki tā

original: sidhyedato 'viśeṣe na vyatirekā na vānvayaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.206 //
analyzed: sidhyet atas viśeṣe na vyatirekāḥ na vā anvayaḥ
adṛṣṭi mātram ādāya kevalam vyatireki tā
uktaḥ na aikāntikaḥ tasmāt anyathā gamakaḥ bhaveta
prāṇa ādi abhāvaḥ nairātmya vyāpī iti vinivarttane

original: ātmano vinivartteta prāṇādiryadi tacca na // Pramāṇav_4.208 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ vinivartteta prāṇa ādiḥ yadi tat ca na
anyasya vinivṛttyā anya vinivṛtteḥ ayogataḥ
tad ātmā tad prasūtiḥ ced na tat ātma upalambhane
tasya upalabdha avagata avagatau ca prasidhyati

original: te cātyantaparokṣasya dṛṣṭyadṛṣṭī na sidhyataḥ // Pramāṇav_4.210 //
analyzed: te ca atyanta parokṣasya dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭī na sidhyataḥ
anyatra adṛṣṭa rūpasya ghaṭa ādau na iti vā kutas
ajñāta vyatirekasya vyāvṛtteḥ vyāpi tā kutas
prāṇa ādeḥ ca kvacid dṛṣṭyā sattva asattvam pratīyate

original: tathātmā yadi dṛśyeta sattvāsattvaṃ pratīyate // Pramāṇav_4.212 //
analyzed: tathā ātmā yadi dṛśyeta sattva asattvam pratīyate
yasya hetoḥ abhāvena ghaṭe prāṇaḥ dṛśyate

original: dehe 'pi yadyasau na syād yukto dehe na sambhavaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.213 //
analyzed: dehe yadi asau na syāt yuktaḥ dehe na sambhavaḥ

original: bhinne 'pi kiñcit sādharmyād yadi tattvaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: bhinne kiñcid sādharmyāt yadi tattvam pratīyate

original: prameyatvād ghaṭādīnāṃ sātmatvaṃ kinna mīyate // Pramāṇav_4.214 //
analyzed: prameya tvāt ghaṭa ādīnām sātmatvam kin na mīyate
aniṣṭeḥ ced pramāṇam hi sarva iṣṭīnām nibandhanam

original: bhāvābhāvavyavasthāṃ kaḥ kartu tena vinā prabhuḥ // Pramāṇav_4.215 //
analyzed: bhāva abhāva vyavasthām kaḥ kartu tena vinā prabhuḥ
smṛti icchā yatna jaḥ prāṇa nimeṣa ādiḥ tad udbhavaḥ
viṣaya indriya cittebhyaḥ tāḥ sva jāti samudbhavāḥ
anyonya pratyaya apekṣā anvaya vyatireka bhāj
etāvati ābhāvaḥ yam anavasthā anya kalpane
śrāvaṇa tvena tat tulyam prāṇa ādi vyabhicārataḥ

original: na tasya vyabhicāritvād vyatireke 'pi cet katham // Pramāṇav_4.218 //
analyzed: na tasya vyabhicāri tvāt vyatireke ced katham
na asādhyāt eva viśleṣaḥ tasya nanu evam ucyate
sādhye nu vṛtti abhāvaḥ rthāt tasya anyatra api asau samaḥ
asādhyāt eva vicchedaḥ iti sādhye stitā ucyate
arthāpattyā atas eva uktam ekena ubhaya darśanam
īdṛś avyabhicāraḥ nanu ayiṣu na sidhyati
pratiṣedha niṣedhaḥ ca vidhānāt paraḥ
nivṛttiḥ nā asataḥ sādhyāt asādhyeṣu eva no tatas

original: neti saiva nivṛttiḥ kiṃ nivṛtterasato matā // Pramāṇav_4.222 //
analyzed: na iti sā eva nivṛttiḥ kim nivṛtteḥ asataḥ matā
nivṛtti abhāvaḥ tu bidhiḥ vastu bhāvaḥ sataḥ pi san
vastu abhāvaḥ tu nā asti iti paśya bāndhya vijṛmbhitam
nivṛttiḥ yadi tasmin na hetoḥ vṛttiḥ kim iṣyate

original: sāpi na pratiṣedho 'yaṃ nivṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate // Pramāṇav_4.224 //
analyzed: sā api na pratiṣedhaḥ yam nivṛttiḥ kim niṣidhyate

original: vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ ca muktvā śābdo 'sti nāparaḥ /
analyzed: vidhānam pratiṣedham ca muktvā śābdaḥ sti nā aparaḥ

original: vyavahāraḥ sa cāsatsu neti prāptātra mūkatā // Pramāṇav_4.225 //
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ sa ca asatsu nā iti prāptā atra mūka tā

original: satāṃ ca na niṣedho 'sti so 'satsu ca na vidyate /
analyzed: satām ca na niṣedhaḥ sti saḥ satsu ca na vidyate

original: jagatyanena nyāyena nañarthaḥ pralayaṃ gataḥ // Pramāṇav_4.226 //
analyzed: jagati anena nyāyena nañ arthaḥ pralayam gataḥ
deśa kāla niṣedhaḥ ced yathā asti sa niṣidhyate

original: na thā na yathā so 'sti tathāpi na niṣidhyate // Pramāṇav_4.227 //
analyzed: na thā na yathā saḥ sti tathā api na niṣidhyate
tasmāt āśritya
abāhya āśrayam atra iṣṭam sarva vidhi niṣedhanam

original: tābhyāṃ sa dharmi sambaddhaḥ khyātyabhavo 'pi tādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: tābhyām sa dharmi sambaddhaḥ tādṛśaḥ
śabda pravṛtteḥ asti iti saḥ u pi iṣṭaḥ vyavahāra bhāj
anyathā syāt padārthānām vidhāna pratiṣedhane
eka dharmasya sarva ātma vidhāna prariṣedhanam
a nānā ātma tayā bhede nānā vidhi niṣedha vat
eka dharmiṇī asaṃhāraḥ vidhāna pratiṣedhayoḥ
eka dharmiṇam uddiśya nānā dharma samāśrayam
vidhau ekasya tad bhājām iva anyeṣām upekṣakam
niṣedhe tat viviktam ca tad anyeṣām apekṣakam
vyavahāram asatya artha prakalpayati dhīḥ yathā
tam tathā eva a vikalpa artha bheda āśrayam upāgatāḥ
anādi vāsanā udbhūtam bādhante na laukikam
tad phalaḥ tad phalaḥ ca arthe bhinnaḥ ekaḥ tatas tatas
taiḥ taiḥ upaplavaiḥ nītaḥ sañcaya apacayaiḥ iva
a tadvān api sambandhāt kutaścid upanīyate
dṛṣṭim bheda āśrayaiḥ te tasmāt ajñāta viplavāḥ
sattā sādhana vṛtteḥ ca sandigdhaḥ syāt asān na saḥ
asatvam ca abhyupagamāt apramānam na yujyate
asataḥ vyatireke sapakṣāt vinivarttanam

original: sandigghaṃ tasya sandehād vipakṣād vinivarttanam // Pramāṇav_4.238 //
analyzed: sandiggham tasya sandehāt vipakṣāt vinivarttanam
ekatra niyame siddhe sidhyati anya nivarttanam

original: dvairāśye sati dṛṣṭeṣu syāddṛṣṭe 'pi saṃśayaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.239 //
analyzed: dvairāśye sati dṛṣṭeṣu syāt dṛṣṭe saṃśayaḥ
avyakti vyāpinaḥ pi arthāḥ santi tad jāti bhāvinaḥ
kvacid na niyamaḥ dṛṣṭyā pārthiva āloha lekhya vat
bhāve virodhasya adṛṣṭe kaḥ sandeham nivārayet

original: kvacid viniyamāt ko 'nyastatkāryātmatayā sa ca // Pramāṇav_4.241 //
analyzed: kvacid viniyamāt kaḥ nyasta kārya ātma tayā sa ca
nara ātmyāt api tena asya sandigdham vinivartanam

original: astu nāma tathāpyātmā nānairātmyāt prasidhyati // Pramāṇav_4.242 //
analyzed: astu nāma tathā api ātmā na anairātmyāt prasidhyati
yena asau vyatirekasya na abhāvam bhāvam icchati
yathā na avyatireke prāṇa ādiḥ na sapakṣataḥ
sapakṣa avyatirekī ced hetuḥ hetuḥ atas nvayī
ced anairātmyam na sātmakam
yad nāntarīyakaḥ svātmā yasya siddhaḥ pravṛttiṣu

original: nivarttakaḥ sa evātaḥ pravṛttau ca pravartakaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.245 //
analyzed: nivarttakaḥ saḥ eva atas pravṛttau ca pravartakaḥ
nāntarīyaka tā sā ca sādhanam
kārye dṛṣṭiḥ adṛṣṭiḥ ca kārya kāraṇa tā hi sā
artha antarasya tad bhāve bhāva aniyamataḥ gatiḥ
abhāva asambhavāt teṣām abhāve nitya bhāvinaḥ
kārya svabhāva bhedānām kāraṇebhyaḥ samudbhavāt

original: tairvinā bhavato 'nyasmāt tajjaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_4.248 //
analyzed: taiḥ vinā bhavataḥ nyasmāt tad jam rūpam katham bhavet
sāmagrī śakti bhedāt hi vastūnām viśva rūpa tā

original: sā cenna bhedikā prāptamekarūpamidaṃ jagat // Pramāṇav_4.249 //
analyzed: sā ced na bhedikā prāptam eka rūpam idam jagat
bhedaka abhedaka tve syāt vyāhatā bhinna rūpa tā

original: ekasya nānārūpatve dve rūpe pāvaketarau // Pramāṇav_4.250 //
analyzed: ekasya nānā rūpa tve dve rūpe pāvaka itarau

original: tat tasyā jananaṃ rūpamanyasya yadi saiva sā /
analyzed: tat tasyāḥ jananam rūpam anyasya yadi sā eva sā

original: na tasyā jananaṃ rūpaṃ tadasyāḥ sambhavet katham // Pramāṇav_4.251 //
analyzed: na tasyāḥ jananam rūpam tat asyāḥ sambhavet katham
tatas svabhāvau niyatau anyonyam hetu kāryayoḥ

original: tasmāt svadṛṣṭāviva tad dṛṣṭe kārye 'pi gamyate // Pramāṇav_4.252 //
analyzed: tasmāt sva dṛṣṭau iva tat dṛṣṭe kārye gamyate
ekam katham anekasmāt kleda vat dugdha vāriṇaḥ

original: dravaśakteḥ yataḥ kledaḥ sā tvekaiva dvayorapi // Pramāṇav_4.253 //
analyzed: drava śakteḥ yatas kledaḥ sā tu ekā eva dvayoḥ api
bhinna abhinnaḥ kim asya ātmā drava tā katham
abhinnā iti ucyate buddheḥ tad rūpāyāḥ abhedataḥ
tadvat bhede pi dahanaḥ dahana pratyaya āśrayaḥ

original: yenāṃśenādadhad dhūmaṃ tenāṃśena tathā gatiḥ // Pramāṇav_4.255 //
analyzed: yena aṃśena ādadhat dhūmam tena aṃśena tathā gatiḥ
dahana pratyaya aṅgāt eva anya apekṣāt samudbhavāt
tad vyabhicāri iti tadvat tathā aparam
dhūma indhana vikāra aṅga tā pade dahana sthiteḥ

original: anagnicedadhūmo 'sau sa dhūmaścet sa pāvakaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.257 //
analyzed: an agni ced a dhūmaḥ sau sa dhūmaḥ ced sa pāvakaḥ
nāntarīyaka tā jñeyā yathāsvam hetu apekṣayā
svabhāvasya yathā uktam prāk vināśa kṛtaka tvayoḥ
ahetu tva gati nyāyaḥ sarvaḥ yam vyatirekiṇaḥ
abhyūhyaḥ śrāvaṇā tva ukteḥ kṛtāyāḥ sāmya dṛṣṭaye
hetu svabhāva anuvṛtya eva artha nivṛtti varṇanāt
sandeha hetu tā khyātyā dṛśye rthe sā iti sūcitam
an aṅgīkṛta vastu aṃśaḥ niṣedhaḥ sādhyate nayā

original: vastunyapi tu pūrvābhyāṃ paryudāso vidhānataḥ // Pramāṇav_4.262 //
analyzed: vastuni api tu pūrvābhyām paryudāsaḥ vidhānataḥ
tatra upalabhyeṣu astitvam upalabdheḥ na ca aparam
iti ajñjñāpanāya ekā anupākhyā udāhṛtiḥ matā
viṣaya asattvataḥ tra viṣayi pratiṣidhyate
jñāna abhidhāna sandeham yathā dāhāt apāvakaḥ
tathā anyā na upalabhyeṣu nāstitā anupalambha bhanāt
tad jñāna śabdāḥ sādhyante tad bhāvāt tad nibandhanāḥ
siddhaḥ hi vyavahāraḥ yam dṛśya adṛṣṭau asan iti
tasyāḥ siddhau asandigdhau tad kāya tve pi dhī dhvanī
vidyamāne pi viṣaye mohāt atra an anubruvan

original: kevalaṃ siddhasādharmyāt smāryate samayaṃ paraḥ // Pramāṇav_4.267 //
analyzed: kevalam siddha sādharmyāt smāryate samayam paraḥ
kārya kāraṇa tā yadvat sādhyate dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭitaḥ
kārya ādi śabdāḥ hi tayoḥ vyavahārāya kalpitāḥ
kāraṇāt kārya saṃsiddhiḥ svabhāva antargamāt iyam
hetu pre bheda ākhyāne na darśitā udāhṛtiḥ pṛthak
eka upalambha anubhavāt idam na upalabhe iti
buddheḥ upalabhe vā iti kalpikāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ
viśeṣaḥ gamyate rthānām viśiṣṭāt eva vedanāt
s tathābhūta ātma sampattiḥ bheda dhī hetuḥ asya ca
tasmāt svatas dhiyoḥ bheda siddhiḥ tābhyām tad arthayoḥ

original: anyathā hyanavasthāto bhedaḥ sighyenna kasyacit // Pramāṇav_4.272 //
analyzed: anyathā hi anavasthātaḥ bhedaḥ sighyet na kasyacid
viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavāt anyathā anya nirākriyā
tad viśiṣṭa upalambhaḥ tasya api anupalambhanam
tasmāt anupalambhaḥ yam svayam pratyakṣataḥ gataḥ
sva mātra vṛtteḥ gamaka sta bhāva vyavasthiteḥ
anyathā arthasya nāstitvam gamyate nupalambhataḥ
upalambhasya nāstitvam anyena iti anabasthitiḥ
adṛśye niścaya ayogāt sthitiḥ anyatra bādhyate
yathā liṅgaḥ nya sattveṣu vikalpa ādiḥ na sidhyati
aniścaya phalā hi eṣā na alam vyāvṛtti sādhane
ādyā adhikriyate hetoḥ niścitena eva sādhane

original: tasyāḥ svayaṃ prayogeṣu svarūpaṃ vā prayujyate /
analyzed: tasyāḥ svayam prayogeṣu sva rūpam vā prayujyate
artha bādhana rūpam vā bhāve bhāvāt abhāvataḥ
anyonya bheda siddheḥ vā
pramāṇa antara bādhāt vā sāpekṣa dhru va bhāva vat
hetu antara samutthasya sannidhau niyataḥ kutas
bhāva hetu bhava tve kim pāramparya pariśramaiḥ
nāśanam janayitvā anyam sa hetuḥ tasya nāśakaḥ

original: tameva naśvaraṃ bhāvaṃ janayed yadi kiṃ bhavet // Pramāṇav_4.281 //
analyzed: tam eva naśvaram bhāvam janayet yadi kim bhavet

original: ātmopakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddhatmanaḥ sataḥ /
analyzed: ātma upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddha tmanaḥ sataḥ

original: nātmopakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate // Pramāṇav_4.282 //
analyzed: na ātma upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate
anapekṣaḥ ca tathābhūtaḥ kadācana

original: yathā na kṣepabhāgiṣṭaḥ sa evodbhūtanāśakaḥ // Pramāṇav_4.283 //
analyzed: yathā na kṣepa bhāj iṣṭaḥ saḥ eva udbhūta nāśakaḥ
kṣaṇam api anapekṣa tve bhāvaḥ bhāvasya na iti ced

original: bhāvo hi sa tathā bhūto 'bhāva bhāvastathā katham // Pramāṇav_4.284 //
analyzed: bhāvaḥ hi sa tathā bhūtaḥ bhāva bhāvaḥ tathā katham
ye para apekṣa tad bhāvāḥ tad bhāva niyatāḥ hi te
asambhavat vibandhā ca samagrī kārya karmaṇi
